game.name: Foot 2 Rue : Nicolas Anelka
game.desc: Foot 2 Rue : Nicolas Anelka reprend le scénario de la saison 2. Pour vous qualifier au Mondial, vous avez à votre disposition 7 nouveaux mini-jeux, des bonus que vous pouvez obtenir en accumulant des points durant l'aventure et l'aide non négligeable de Nicolas Anelka comme coach personnel.

game.path: ./Football Academy - Build and Prove Your Football Knowledge (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: Football Academy - Build and Prove Your Football K
game.desc:
Football Academy is a mix of a football trivia game and a card game. In it the player gets to enter the academy where he under the supervision of former Chelsea and Portugal manager Luiz Felipe Scolari gets to create his own team and test his knowledge about the sport. When starting out at the academy the player gets two packs of cards with footballers. Once the player has picked his starting eleven out of these he will be able to go to the stadium and compete against unlocked teams. Victory in matches and the player is awarded badges, trophies and better card packs that allows him to improve his team.
The player can't go directly to the stadium however. First he must prove his knowledge about game at the classroom. Here the player gets to take a Football IQ test consisting of three mini games. The accumulated points from the mini games is the player's football IQ which determines how good footballers the player can acquire. Early on the player only has access to bronze packs but by defeating teams in the stadium silver and gold packs will be unlocked. The test can be redone at any time but first it might be wise for the player to practice the mini games on the training pitch.
Once the player has a team it is time to go to the changing room and manage it. Here the player gets to pick a formation and a starting eleven. Each footballer has a number of attributes such as position, nation and skill rating. The team also has a chemistry rating which is based on the footballers' home country as well as their preferred position and formation. Therefore it's important not only to pick the best ones, but also makes sure that they fit with their team mates.
The actual matches of the game are played similarly to manager games such as Championship Manager where the player only gets to see an overview of the action. The tactical possibilities available are more limited here as the only options available are where to attack (left, right or center) and the mentality of the team (push up, sit back or balanced). What special however is that at different times throughout the matches the player will face dribbling, passing and shooting battles. Here one of the footballers will face one of the opponents. Before the battle the footballers' ratings are recalculated based on their mentality, chemistry and energy. Then each player gets to choose one of two actions and depending on if he is successful or not the footballer's rating increases or decreases. The footballer with the highest rating wins the battle. Being successful leads to more and more battles until a goal scoring opportunity appears.
Football Academy has support for two player multi-card play. The players can test out their teams against each other but it is also possible to trade footballers.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Football Academy - Build and Prove Your Football Knowledge (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png
game.video: ./snap/Football Academy - Build and Prove Your Football Knowledge (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Football Academy - Build and Prove Your Football Knowledge (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png

game.name: Football Director DS
game.desc: Football Director DS est un jeu de management de club de football qui possède une base de données de 3800 joueurs, un système de transfert international, des options tactiques pointues (stratégies, degré d'agressivité, style) et des simulations de matches réalistes avec des analyses basées sur tous les anciens résultats.

game.name: Ford Racing 3
game.desc:
The handheld versions of Ford Racing 3 allow players to race in a number of Ford-licensed cars, from classics (Model T) to new models (2005 Mustang GT), cars from movies, off-road tracks and even concepts vehicles such as the Mustang GT-R Concept.
From the main driver profile where all statistics are recorded, players can do a quick race of one of the three competitions: Ford Competition, Ford Challenge and Ford Collection. Most of the game's features need to be unlocked first. Next to the regular racing controls there is also a button used for boost. The different competitions offer ten racing types:
1. Standard: race for the first place.
2. Elimination: race five opponents over three laps. After the first and the second lap, the last two cars are knocked out and a duel ensues in the final lap.
3. Duel: a 3-lap race against six challengers in succession. After each won lap, a new one starts.
4. Drafting: stay in the opponent's slipstream to raise a power bar.
5. Driving Skills: race against the time and keep the timer going by passing through gates that award time bonuses.
6. Seconds Out: race against the time while collecting bonuses.
7. Time Attack: a straightforward timed race.
8. Boost: race with two boosts per lap.
9. Relay: transfer a baton three times around the track.
10. Overtake: overtake a number of vehicles before time runs out.

game.name: Fossil Fighters Champions
game.desc: Fossil Fighters : Champions est un jeu de combat sur DS. Le joueur doit déterrer des fossiles de monstres et les nettoyer grâce au stylet de la console afin de les ressusciter et les faire combattre contre d'autres espèces.

game.name: Fossil Fighters
game.desc: Fossil Fighters est un jeu de combat sur DS. Destiné aux plus jeunes joueurs, ce soft vous invite à partir à la chasse aux dinosaures pour tenter de déterrer des fossiles d'animaux préhistoriques. Se jouant entièrement au stylet, ce sont plus de 100 espèces différentes que vous serez amené à découvrir. Et une fois ressuscitées, affrontez leurs congénères dans des combats sans pitié.

game.path: ./Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends - Imagination Invaders (USA).zip
game.name: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends : Imagination
game.desc: Imagination Invaders is a 3D adventure/action game based on the popular Cartoon Network cartoon. Players control Bloo in a 3D world as he tries to help his friends and rescue Madame Foster. Players can jump, shoot spitwads, and search objects in the wor
game.marquee: ./wheel/Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends - Imagination Invaders (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends - Imagination Invaders (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends - Imagination Invaders (USA).png

game.name: Foto Frenzy : Spot the Difference
game.desc: Foto Frenzy : Spot the Difference est un puzzle-game sur Nintendo DS. Le jeu consiste simplement à trouver les différences entre deux images presque similaires.

game.name: Freddi Fish - ABC under the Sea
Freedom Wings
game.desc:
As a man living in the island cities of Sorgele, air pirates loom over the population. They shot down your parents and you are out to avenge their deaths and kill the pirate responsible.
This game is an action flight sim with a twist - it also has RPG elements. Each enemy plane you shoot down earns your experience points and gold, which unlocks better parts and planes for you to buy. Occasionally during flight you receive mayday calls from other planes under attack - if you are able to save them you can meet them back at the nearest airfield for a reward.
If the action is too much for you to handle, it has an autopilot mode which allows you to select targets and waypoints via the touchscreen. There is also a 4 player multicard mode where you can go head to head with friends.

game.name: Freshly-Picked : Tingle's Rosy Rupeeland
game.desc: Freshly-Picked : Tingle's Rosy Rupeeland est un jeu d'action/aventure sur Nintendo DS. Personnage déjà présent dans de nombreux épisodes de la série des Zelda, Tingle est un lutin odieux, vil et voleur. Un jour, il se voit imposé par les dieux d'ériger une tour suffisamment haute pour lui permettre d'atteindre RubisLand, le paradis des gens cupides. A vous de l'aider à extorquer le plus de rubis possible à son entourage.

game.name: Frogger - Helmet Chaos
game.desc: Frogger: Helmet Chaos is a top-down platform game with the eighties' arcade frog as the protagonist, but now in 3d. The basic gameplay is still the game, as the frog moves one (invisible) square per key press, which maintains the feel of the original arca

game.name: From the Abyss
game.desc:
From the Abyss is a dungeon crawling RPG where the player takes command of a custom created character. The story takes place in a small country called Rubenhaut where for many years the world has been free of monster when the Dimensional Abyss was created by the Saint of Light to seal them off in a parallel dimension, afterwards Rubenhaut was built to guard the gate. However, one day the seal was broken and the monster that was once sealed off have been released again and is wreaking havoc on the world and it is up to the player to explore the dungeons of the world and collect parts of a magical crystal called the Abyss Gate in order to re-seal the rift.
The gameplay consists of exploring the world and dungeons, collecting items, defeating enemies afterwards absorbing their souls and steal their skills and combine them with their existing skills and weapons for a multitude of different attacks. What makes From the Abyss different from other RPGs is that every time the player starts a new game, everything is randomized ensuring an unique experience each time.
There is also multiplayer mode where two friends can play co-op and advance through the game and fight the main boss, The Abyss Lord.

game.name: Front Mission
game.desc:
The Nintendo DS release of the long running Front Mission series, the story takes place on Huffman Island which is located in the neutral zone between two nations Oceania Community Union (O.C.U.) and the Unified Continental States (U.C.S.).
In the year 2070, a war broke out between the two nations that lasted for two years before finally peace was achieved and the island was split in half, both sides being used for each nations base. In 2090, however, a U.C.S factory is mysteriously attacked, leading to another conflict.
The player can choose either side to use: they can choose either Royd Clive, leader of the mercenary outfit Canyon Crows for the O.C.U. or Kevin Greenfield, leader of the U.C.S. Special Forces squad Black Hounds fighting against enemy mechs (known as wanzers), tanks and helicopters in a turn-based fashion, using the stylus pen to bring up interface menus to select units and choosing which enemy units to attack among many other options.
There is also multiplayer capabilities using DS wireless, where players can compete head-to-head, using battlefields filled with wanzers. Yoshitaka Amano also is involved, responsible for the graphic art for the game and is most notably been involved with the Final Fantasy series.

game.name: Fullmetal Alchemist - Dual Sympathy
game.desc: FullMetal Alchemist : Dual Sympathy est un jeu d'action sur Nintendo DS qui plonge le joueur dans l'univers du manga Full Metal Alchemist. Vous contrôlez Ed, accompagné par Alphonse, dans un beat'em all pour avoir des alchimies spéciales, déclenchables avec le stylet. Notez que vous pouvez aussi jouer avec Mustang et Amstrong si vous finissez le jeu une première fois.

game.name: FutureU : The Prep Game for SAT
G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
game.desc: G.I. Joe : Le Réveil du Cobra est un jeu d'action sur Nintendo DS. Basé sur l'univers des figurines G.I. Joe, ce titre sorti conjointement avec une oeuvre cinématographique se veut non pas l'adaptation de cette dernière mais le complément. Plutôt axé sur le jeu en coopération, le titre vous propose de retrouver Heavy Duty, le ninja Snake Eyes ou encore une dizaine d'autres personnages dans une aventure riche en action !

game.name: Galactic Taz Ball
game.desc: Dans le jeu d'action Galactic Taz Ball sur Nintendo DS, vous incarnez le déjanté personnage Taz issu des dessins animés Looney Toons. Après avoir été kidnappé par Marvin le Martien qui veut voler les paysages de la Terre pour les implanter sur Mars, vous devez aider Taz à s'échapper et sauver la Terre ! Le jeu mélange alors action, exploration, plates-formes et résolution d'énigmes dans 2 univers différents.

game.name: Galactik Football
game.desc: Galactik Football est un jeu de football sur Nintendo DS. Dans un monde futuriste, les peuples de la galaxie maîtrisent des pouvoirs fantastiques appelés fluides. Il y a 15 ans, une terrible explosion secoua la planète Akillian et fit disparaître le fluide. Toutes les chances d'accéder à la Galactik Football Cup semblaient balayées, mais aujourd'hui l'espoir renaît !

game.name: Galaxy Racers
game.desc: Galaxy Racers sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de course cartoon qui vous plonge dans une chasse aux martiens effrénée ! De la planète Terre à la planète Chaos 19 missions vous attendent. Courses et aventure sont au programme !

game.name: Game & Watch Collection 2
game.desc:
Like Game & Watch Collection, Game & Watch Collection 2 is a collection of Game & Watch games onto a Nintendo DS cart. As with the previous collection, it was not available for purchase and could only be obtained through the Japanese points program, Club Nintendo. The games included are:
Parachute: Parachuters are jumping from the helicopter into the ocean! Catch them before they fall in and get gobbled up by the shark!
Octopus: Dive underwater and dodge the octopus' tentacles. Grab the treasure, but don't get too greedy!
Parachute X Octopus: Parachute and Octopus combined into one game! Catch the parachuters, then dive underwater when prompted to grab the treasure. Be sure to come back up again before more parachuters start falling!
Again, each Game & Watch has both the clock and alarm function, like the original Game & Watch toys.

game.name: Game & Watch Collection
game.desc:
Game & Watch Collection is a compilation cartridge featuring three of Nintendo's Multi-Screen Game & Watch games. Not available for purchase, this game could only be obtained through the customer loyalty program, Club Nintendo. The included games are:
Oil Panic: Oil is dripping from the ceiling! Catch the oil in your bucket, then tip it out the window to your friend holding the oil barrel. Don't spill any oil!
Donkey Kong: A giant ape has kidnapped your girlfriend! Climb to the top of the construction site to rescue her. Dodge barrels as you climb, then pull out the girder's pins to defeat Donkey Kong.
Green House: Look after the four plants in your green house. Spray any bugs with your bug spray, and don't forget about the spiders on the lower levels!
Each Game & Watch game can function as a clock by using the internal clock of the Nintendo DS. An alarm can also be set through the game's main menu.

game.path: ./Gardening Guide - How to Get Green Fingers (Europe) (En,Fr,De).zip
game.name: Gardening Guide : How to Get Green Fingers
game.marquee: ./wheel/Gardening Guide - How to Get Green Fingers (Europe) (En,Fr,De).png
game.video: ./snap/Gardening Guide - How to Get Green Fingers (Europe) (En,Fr,De).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Gardening Guide - How to Get Green Fingers (Europe) (En,Fr,De).png

game.name: Gardening Mama
game.desc: Gardening Mama sur DS est le mariage improbable entre un livre de jardinage et une compilation de mini-jeux. Sous la férule de la petite Mama, vous êtes mené à la baguette pour cultiver vos plantes. Creuser, rempoter, arroser ou fertiliser sont autant d'opérations qui vous feront découvrir petit à petit la vie d'un jardinier.

game.name: Garfield Gets Real
game.desc: Garfield Gets Real, players switch between Garfield and Odie as they play through seven areas of the game that all connect from the cartoon universe to the real world. Each area has a key story challenge that progresses the player through the game's chapters while completing 150 smaller tasks that will help them reach the key story challenges.

game.name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
game.desc: Garfield 2 sur DS est un jeu d'action mêlé à de la plate-forme dans lequel vous incarnez le chat le plus feignant du monde de la BD et pour l'occasion, du cinéma. Adaptation du film, Garfield 2 propose un nombre de challenges variés ainsi que trois personnages à diriger pour un humour toujours aussi décapant.

game.name: Garfield's Fun Fest
game.desc: Play as Garfield and Odie to try and get Garfield's humor back. Travel to the magical pond in hopes to win back Arlene's heart in this 2D platformer where you will be jumping, attacking, and collecting different items. The controls are simple, you'll be using the D-pad and buttons for most actions. The stylus and touch screen will be used for the rhythm based mini games. There is also an interactable world map to get to each level.

game.name: Gem Quest - 4 Elements
game.desc: 4 Elements sur DS est un jeu de réflexion se déroulant dans un univers féerique. Vous devrez résoudre des grilles de puzzle en formant des chaînes de joyaux les plus longues possible afin de restaurer la magie des quatre éléments.

game.name: Generator Rex : Agent of Providence
game.desc: Generator Rex : Agent of Providence est un jeu d'action sur DS qui reprend l'univers de la série télévisée éponyme. Vous y incarnez Rex, un jeune homme doté de super pouvoirs qui part à la chasse aux terribles EVO. Notre héros dispose de la capacité de transformer ses poings en masses d'acier, en épée ou encore en lance-roquettes.

game.path: ./GEO Wunder Natur Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: Geo Puzzle
game.marquee: ./wheel/GEO Wunder Natur Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png
game.image: ./boxart/GEO Wunder Natur Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png

game.name: Geometry Wars : Galaxies
game.desc: Faisant tout d'abord office de mini-jeu bonus dans Project Gotham Racing 2 sur Xbox, Geometry Wars Galaxies est désormais un jeu à part entière sur DS. A bord de votre vaisseau spatial, il vous faut affronter les hordes d'ennemis géométriques qui déferlent en permanence dans l'aire de jeu. Shoot'em up à l'ancienne, Geometry Wars Galaxies est un titre exigeant à ne pas mettre entre toutes les mains.

game.path: ./George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret (USA).zip
game.name: George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret
game.marquee: ./wheel/George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret (USA).png

game.name: Ghost Trick - Phantom Detective
game.desc: Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective, known in Japan as simply Ghost Trick, is an adventure game developed by Capcom for the Nintendo DS. Ghost Trick's story centers on the recently deceased protagonist Sissel, and his ghost's struggle to discover who he was when he was alive and who killed him. The player assumes the role of this ghost, who has the ability to perform various Ghost Tricks to solve puzzles and navigate the world around him.

game.name: Ghostbusters - The Video Game
game.desc: Ghostbusters: The Video Game is a 2009 action-adventure game based on the Ghostbusters media franchise. The DS version of Ghostbusters: The Video Game uses the same stylized aesthetic as the Redfly Studios versions for the Nintendo Wii and Sony Playstation2 but was developed by Zen Studios. Rather than a third person chase camera perspective, the DS version uses a top-down perspective for most of the game. The story is the same as the other versions but the Ghostbusters receive side missions as well as story missions which they can use to boost the populace's opinion of them. Unlike the other versions in this there is no rookie character and the player takes control of the four original Ghostbusters one at a time while issuing commands to the other three. The money earned from missions can be used to buy new equipment and take part in the resource management aspect of the game. Also, between the game hub of the Firehouse & the missions, there are driving segments which uses a chase camera perspective where the player takes Ecto-1 from location to location, catching ghosts along the way.

game.name: Giana Sisters DS
game.desc:
Giana Sisters DS is a modern 2009 remake of the cult game The Great Giana Sisters from the year 1987. The original game appeared on the C64 and Amiga, but had to be pulled from the shelves after Nintendo threatened to sue over similarities to the Super Mario games. Surprisingly, more than 20 years later the sisters make an appearance on the Nintendo DS.
Giana Sisters DS is a classic platformer. Giana is caught in a dream world and must now recover her lost diamonds and find a way to the mysterious castle. The game features more than 80 new levels (i.e. is not a one-to-one remake). There are also new special items that make use of the features of the DS. Giana can, for example, collect a bubble gum item that can be activated using the touch screen. The bubble enables Giana to fly and is controlled by blowing into the microphone. Another new feature is a world map that allows the player to select and replay levels.

game.path: ./Girl Time - Everything You Need for a Hip, Happening Life! (USA) [b].zip
game.name: Girl Time - Everything You Need for a Hip, Happening Life!
game.marquee: ./wheel/Girl Time - Everything You Need for a Hip, Happening Life! (USA) [b].png
game.video: ./snap/Girl Time - Everything You Need for a Hip, Happening Life! (USA) [b].mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Girl Time - Everything You Need for a Hip, Happening Life! (USA) [b].png

game.name: Glory Days 2
game.desc:
Glory Days 2 takes the premise of Choplifter! and cranks it up a few notches. A strategic component was added that melds old gameplay with new game concepts. There are a lot of playable vehicles that become unlocked as you advance in the game.
The overall goal of the game is to provide air support for your ground troops as they advance and capture enemy bunkers, ultimately pushing them back enough that they retreat. Players can choose from three aviators and there are sixteen missions in total, moving on in time from classic WWII aircraft to modern day helicopters and F14's.
The strategical component allows the player to take command of ground units and manage funds to build new units. These funds are acquired by completing missions such as saving civilians or capturing bases. Progressively, more powerful units and weapons become available. Multiplayer is supported for up to eight players over Wi-Fi, split into two cooperative teams where the enemy's command centre needs to be taken out. The setup of the battles is completely customizable for different parameters.
Optionally, 3D glasses are supported to add more depth to the action on the screens.

game.name: Glory of Heracles
game.desc: Glory of Heracles features the eponymous Greek hero in a pick-up-and-play role-playing game that has a rich storyline in a Greek motif and a deep battle system. The story begins when Heracles washes up on a beach with amnesia. Players must journey far and wide to figure out Heracles' story and unravel the mysterious pasts of the other main characters in this new adventure. The game uses ancient Greece as its backdrop, and players can visit cities like Sparta and Athens on their travels.

game.name: Go Diego ! Mission Construction
game.desc: Go Diego ! Mission Construction est un jeu d'aventure et de plates-formes sur Nintendo DS. Dans ce jeu, utilisez les Mega Blocks pour construire des ponts et des véhicules et explorez des zones comme la région arctique ou la forêt tropicale.

game.name: Go West! - A Lucky Luke Adventure
Go! Go! Cosmo Cops!
game.desc: Go! Go! Cosmo Cops! est un jeu d'action et de plates-formes sur DS qui vous amène à incarner Leo et Jenny, tout deux possédant un bracelet aux pouvoirs magiques. Chargé de lutter contre l'invasion des Babools venus de l'espace, vous devez traverser les 50 niveaux de jeu et affronter les boss pour sauver le monde. Le jeu se joue en tenant la console verticalement et propose également un mode multijoueurs à quatre.

game.name: Go, Diego, Go!: Great Dinosaur Rescue
game.desc: Go Diego ! Au Secours du Dinosaure est un jeu de plates-formes sorti sur Wii. Diego et ses amis remontent le temps pour aider Maia, un petit dinosaure, à retrouver sa famille. A vous de les guider dans des niveaux remplis de pièces.

game.name: Go, Diego, Go!: Safari Rescue
game.desc: Go Diego ! Mission Safari est un jeu sur DS destiné aux enfants de moins de trois ans. En compagnie de Diego, le cousin de Dora l'exploratrice, relevez les nombreux mini-jeux proposés par le titre, comme effrayer des lions ou peindre les rayures des zèbres. Ces petites épreuves sont étudiées spécialement pour la motricité des plus jeunes.

game.name: Godzilla Unleashed - Double Smash
game.desc: Godzilla Unleashed est un jeu de combat sur DS où vous dirigez de gros monstres qui se battent entre eux. Au casting, Godzilla, forcément, mais également Rodan et autres Ghidorah pour un total de 18 créatures. Au coeur de différentes villes, battez vos opposants, démolissez vos arènes de jeu ou détruisez un maximum de cristaux d'une carte. Un mode 2 joueurs est également disponible.

game.name: Gogo's Crazy Bones
game.desc: Gogo's Crazy Bones est un jeu d'adresse disponible sur DS. Inspiré par les figurines du même nom, celui-ci propose de lancer des personnages sur diverses cibles et ennemis. Trente héros aux pouvoirs propres et 75 niveaux répartis en 5 mondes sont au programme.

game.name: Golden Nugget Casino DS
game.desc: Golden Nugget Casino DS sur la console du même nom rassemble les jeux de casino pour des heures de flambe ! Allez faire les malins devant les tables de black jack, roulette, craps, poker pai gow, roue, black jack video ou encore poker video. Tentez également votre chance avec les huit machines à sous à thèmes différents !

game.name: Golden Sun - Dark Dawn
game.desc: After going dark six years ago, 2010 will see a new dawn. Golden Sun DS updates the popular portable Golden Sun role-playing series with an impressive graphical style. This installment follows the story of the previous heroes' descendants and immerses players into the magic of its adventure by pushing the boundaries of intuitive touch-screen controls.

game.name: GoldenEye 007
game.desc: A NEW GOLDENEYE FOR A NEW BOND The GoldenEye story comes to life once again with an updated single player storyline featuring Daniel Craig as Bond and written by Bruce Feirstein, the screenwriter for the original movie. Surprise enemies covertly or engage in a full on firefight and use Bonds latest gadget to uncover intel in augmented reality as you relive all the classic GoldenEye movie moments. Infiltrate the dam and destroy the facility; chase Ourumov in the tank through the streets of St. Petersburgh; and investigate the secret jungle base.

game.name: GoldenEye: Rogue Agent
game.desc: After the first mission (Which is the simulator) you are assigned a Goldeneye by Francisco Scaramanga who acts as the vil

game.name: Gormiti - The Lords of Nature!
game.desc: Gormiti : The Lords of Nature ! sur Nintendo DS est un jeu d'action qui s'inspire de la série animée éponyme. Les joueurs peuvent y visiter l'île de Gorm, où les Seigneurs de la Terre, de la Mer, de l'Air et de la Forêt s'évertuent toujours à remettre le vil Magmion à sa place.

game.path: ./Gourmet Chef - Cook Your Way to Fame (USA) (En,Fr,Es).zip
game.name: Gourmet Chef - Cook Your Way to Fame
game.marquee: ./wheel/Gourmet Chef - Cook Your Way to Fame (USA) (En,Fr,Es).png
game.video: ./snap/Gourmet Chef - Cook Your Way to Fame (USA) (En,Fr,Es).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Gourmet Chef - Cook Your Way to Fame (USA) (En,Fr,Es).png

game.name: Grand Galop
game.desc: Grand Galop est une simulation équestre sur Nintendo DS qui reprend à son compte l'univers et les personnages de la série animée du même nom. Destiné aux jeunes filles, le jeu nous fait suivre les pérégrinations d'une élève nouvellement inscrite au centre du Pin Creux.

game.name: Grand Theft Auto - Chinatown Wars
game.desc: Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars is an entirely original entry into the critically acclaimed Grand Theft Auto series, and brings a new level of interactivity to its sprawling open environments. With the use of the DS touch screen, players navigate their way through the streets as they uncover the truth behind an epic tale of crime and corruption within the Triad crime syndicate, delivering the unprecedented amount of depth that has become a true trademark of the franchise.

game.name: Green Lantern - Rise of the Manhunters
game.desc: Green Lantern : La Révolte des Manhunters est un jeu d'action sur Nintendo DS. Adaptation du célèbre comics-book, le jeu vous met dans la peau de Hal, un justicier doté de super-pouvoirs accordés par un anneau vert et bien décidé à mettre un terme aux activités des Manhunters qui menacent l'ensemble de l'univers.

game.name: Guilty Gear: Dust Strikers
game.desc: The no holds barred, sci-fi fighting franchise is reborn on the Nintendo DS. Guilty Gear Dust Strikers features all 21 Guilty Gear characters from previous versions (including SolBadbuy, Potemkin, May, Dizzy and others) in a battle that takes place on multiple levels across both DS screens. Navigate different types of floors and traps as you battle against the computer or via wireless multi-player connections. 6 modes of play including Arcade, Story, VS Battle and mini games. Customize the Robo-Ky character with various move sets in the Robo-Ky factory mode. Battle your friends in 4-player wireless versus matches where the last person standing moves on. Master 10 mini-games like Billiards, Arm-Wrestling and Sword Practice that unlock more Robo-Ky moves. Beware of poison, fire, thunder and bomb traps set to damage unaware opponents. Special moves like Psych Burst, Dust Attack and Roman Cancel all return in Guilty Gear Dust Strikers.

game.name: Guinness World Records - The Videogame
game.desc: Guinness World Recordsis full of amazing world records, giving players the opportunity to become a real world record breaker. The game's quick-fire action challenges can be played solo, in teams, or in competitive multi-player groups. Accessible game mechanics enable anyone to grow the longest fingernails ever seen; to walk a tightrope across the Grand Canyon; or even eat a jumbo jet. But true skill and dedication will be required to compete at the highest level. The ultimate prize: you may see your name appear in the official Guinness World Records book.

game.name: Guitar Hero - On Tour - Decades
game.desc: Guitar Hero : On Tour Decades est le deuxième titre de la franchise musicale à sortir sur DS. Toujours accompagné du Guitar Grip pour jouer les notes, le titre propose aux fans de rock de voyager à travers les 4 dernières décennies, du rock moderne jusqu'aux classiques des années 70. Une fonction permet aux possesseurs de la première version du jeu de profiter des morceaux du premier et vice versa lors des sessions en multi.

game.name: Guitar Hero - On Tour - Modern Hits
game.desc: Guitar Hero : On Tour Modern Hits est un jeu de rythme sur DS. Il contient 28 morceaux de groupes comme Coldplay, Fall out Boy, Finger Eleven, Franz Ferdinand, Tenacious D, The Strokes ou encore Weezer. Il propose un mode Scénario, dans lequel vous devez marcher vers la gloire en faisant grossir les rangs de vos fans.

game.name: Guitar Hero - On Tour
game.desc: Guitar Hero: On Tour is the continuation of the popular Guitar Hero series on the Nintendo DS.Played from a sideways perspective, players are able to rock out with their portable gaming system via an attachment that plugs into the cartridge slot to allow

game.name: Guitar Rock Tour
game.desc:
The first musical game for mobile phones devoted purely to the guitar and rock music has just received a massive facelift and been ported to the Nintendo DS.
In this outing the player has the choice to play either guitar or the drums as you tour the world. Unlike the Guitar Hero franchise, Guitar Rock Tour doesn't use any add-ons and instead players will use the stylus to hit the notes as they fall down. Moreover with the drums players are given the choice of using the stylus or shoulder buttons to hit the notes.
The game does boast some good quality cover songs such as Girlfriend, Underclass Hero, In the Shadow, Beat It, Rock You Like a Hurricane, and Message in a Bottle.

game.name: Guru Guru
game.desc: Guru Guru sur DS est un jeu plutôt orginal puisqu'il propose une sorte de mini-golf où la balle se voit remplacée par une petite créature. Il s'agit alors non pas seulement de viser juste mais aussi d'utiliser les capacités magiques de votre bestiole pour l'orienter vers le trou.

game.name: Hamsterz Life
game.desc:
Following the tradition of the Petz series for PC, Ubisoft brings now the series to the DS. This time with hamsters.
Like in other games of the series for the DS, the player has to care for his/her pet by feeding it, bathing it, brushing it and other such tasks. There are five different breeds to choose from and seven mini-games that randomly appear to give you food, costumes, toys and items for the cage where the hamsters live. And thanks to the wireless connection to other DSs, hamsters and other items can be shared with friends. The player can even store information on up to other 20 different owners.
Due to its Japanese origin, there are plenty of anime art elements in the game, for instance, and many other Japanese oddities like the possibility to teach your hamster to talk or store the blood type of other players. In addition, in Hamsterz the main goal is to raise your hamster in order for him to make itself a complete "Ham-country" (sic.), where it can build plenty of buildings like a school, a bakery, etc., making this the game of the series where the pet can behave closest to an actual human.

game.name: Hannah Montana : Music Jam
game.desc: Hannah Montana : Music Jam est un jeu de rythme sur DS. Le titre vous propose de nombreux mini-jeux sur le thème de la musique pour aider Hannah Montana à monter son groupe. Découvrez ou redécouvrez l'univers musical de la jeune chanteuse, qui s'est faite connaître grâce à sa propre série télé.

game.name: Hannah Montana
game.desc: Hannah Montana sur Nintendo DS est un jeu d'aventure. On menace Miley Stewart de révéler à la presse qu'elle mène en secret une double de vie, celle d'Hannah Montana, la célèbre chanteuse. Partez à la recherche de ce détracteur ! Renseignez vous auprès des gens, ramassez et utilisez intelligemment les objets récoltés.

game.name: Hannah Montana: The Movie
game.desc: Hannah Montana : The Movie est un jeu mélangeant aventure et rythme sur DS. Le joueur incarne la jeune star qui se retrouve en plein Tennessee. Elle va alors vivre une histoire pleine de rencontres, qui suit la trame du film. Mais elle n'oublie pas son métier de chanteuse pour autant, puisque le jeu réserve quelques phases de karaoké.

game.name: Happy Bakery
game.desc: Dans la boulangerie de Happy Bakery, vous allez apprendre à faire du pain et des gâteaux en compagnie de la jeune Rue, absolument passionnée par son travail. Vous devrez savoir ce que veulent les clients avant de rouler la pâte pour confectionner les meilleures viennoiseries.

game.name: Happy Cooking
game.desc: My Happy Kitchen sur DS est une simulation de cuisine à destination des plus jeunes. A l'aide du stylet, il faudra aider Lisa à préparer toutes sortes de plats afin qu'elle ait une chance de remporter un jour le concours de cuisine d'Happy Town. On pourra apprendre de nombreuses recettes mais aussi jouer à quelques mini-jeux durant les rares temps libres de notre petite héroïne.

game.name: Happy Feet 2
game.desc: Happy Feet 2 est un jeu de plates-formes sur DS. Le joueur y incarne Mumble dans une aventure inspirée du film éponyme. Celui-ci part donc à la recherche de son fils disparu, et doit affronter, à coup de claquettes et autres pas de danse, les créatures les plus hostiles de la banquise. Pour cela, notre héros peut compter sur les capacités des bébés manchots qui peuvent par exemple rebondir contre les murs ou voler.

game.name: Happy Feet
game.desc:
Happy Feet is based on Warner Bros' popular movie of the same name. You play Mumble, a young penguin born into a nation of singing Emperor Penguins. Each Penguin needs a Heartsong to attract a soul mate. Unfortunately, Mumble can't sing, but he's a great tap dancer.
The game follows the storyline of the movie through two major alternating gameplay sequences: rhythm-based levels that involve tapping the screen in time with music, and downhill sledding levels, where Mumble races downhill on his belly, picking up items along the way and avoiding obstacles.

game.name: Harlem Globetrotters : World Tour
game.desc: Le basket s'invite sur la DS avec Harlem Globetrotters : World Tour. Suivez la grande équipe lors de championnats ou de matches amicaux et enchaînez les figures spectaculaires et autres dunks pour devenir le champion incontesté. Relevez le défi et faites crier le parquet.

game.path: ./Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).zip
game.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1
game.desc: Harry Potter et les Reliques de la Mort - Partie 1 : Le Jeu Vidéo est l'adaptation sur Nintendo DS du film du même nom. Le joueur doit localiser et détruire les Horcruxes, ces objets qui renferment une part de l'esprit de Voldemort, et il est opposé à de féroces ennemis déterminés à le contrecarrer.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).png
game.image: ./boxart/Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).png
game.video: ./snap/Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).mp4

game.path: ./Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).zip
game.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2
game.desc: Harry Potter et les Reliques de la Mort - Deuxième Partie est le tout dernier épisode de la grande saga de J.K. Rowling sur Nintendo DS. Jeu d'action et d'aventure à la troisième personne, il nous permet d'incarner sept personnages-clés du film pour mettre un terme définitif au règne tyrannique de Voldemort. Le joueur pourra aussi débloquer des bonus ou défier un ami dans un mode spécifique.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).png
game.image: ./boxart/Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).png
game.video: ./snap/Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).mp4

game.path: ./Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
game.desc:
Take on the role of Harry, Ron and Hermione as they begin their fourth year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. This year, the Triwizard Tournament takes place, and Harry is mysteriously entered into the tournament himself.
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire for the Nintendo DS and Game Boy Advance is a top-down action/adventure game where you play as the three friends and progress through the story based on the book and film.
Make your way through various scenarios by attacking enemies and solving puzzles using spells. One button fires a ranged spell, such as Confoundus, while another is used for stream spells, like Wingardium Leviosa, which can be moved around with the Control Pad. You can also call your friends for added power to your magical spells.
The DS version includes a small bonus game where you take care of a magical creature called a 'Niffler'. It is a simulation game, like a very simple Tamagotchi. You can feed the Niffler, clean it, and give it toys - depending on what you do, it will become more or less pleased with you. Perform well enough, and it will become really happy, and let you pat it to make it even happier.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png
game.image: ./boxart/Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png
game.video: ./snap/Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).mp4

game.path: ./Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (USA).zip
game.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
game.desc:
Based off the fifth book and movie of the series, players take control of Harry Potter in this adventure as he faces the dangers of his fifth year of Hogwarts, builds Dumbledore's Army, and faces off with Voldemort himself as the prophecy continues to unfold.
Players will navigate through the castle of Hogwarts and beyond, learning fifth year spells, solving multiple puzzles, and even get a chance to play as Sirius Black and Dumbledore himself.
In both the Nintendo DS and GBA versions, the player can walk around Hogwarts in "almost 3D" pre-rendered backgrounds, like in the first Resident Evil games. The gameplay consists in various minigames, which you play either by pressing buttons on the right timing (GBA) or by doing different kinds of moves with your stylus on the touch-screen (DS).
game.marquee: ./wheel/Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (USA).png
game.image: ./boxart/Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (USA).mp4

game.name: Harvest Moon - Frantic Farming
game.desc: Harvest Moon : Frantic Farming vous invite à lutter contre une avalanche de légumes. Choisissez un personnage parmi les douze disponibles (avec chacun leur histoire) et mettez à contribution vos compétences agricoles pour réguler la croissance des légumes avant que toute l'île ne soit ensevelie. Ce puzzle-game sur DS propose un mode histoire, un mode mission, un mode score ainsi qu'un mode jeu libre.

game.path: ./Harvest Moon DS - The Tale of Two Towns (USA).zip
game.name: Harvest Moon DS - The Tale of Two Towns
game.desc: Harvest Moon : Village of the Twins est un jeu de gestion sur Nintendo DS. Incarnez un jeune fermier aux pieds d'une montagne, et établissez votre ferme. Elevez des lamas, des chevaux, des vaches, et soignez vos relations avec le voisinage.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Harvest Moon DS - The Tale of Two Towns (USA).png
game.image: ./boxart/Harvest Moon DS - The Tale of Two Towns (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Harvest Moon DS - The Tale of Two Towns (USA).mp4

game.name: Harvest Moon DS
game.desc:
In this, the first Harvest Moon entry for the DS, you must build and maintain a farm, tending livestock, and growing all manner of crops. The Harvest Goddess has been turned to stone and banished! Restore her to "Forget-Me-Not-Valley" by locating all 101 Harvest Sprites. Marry one of 14 potential brides, including those from "A Wonderful Life Special Edition", a mermaid and more. (Five of these brides will visit town when you insert your "Harvest Moon: Friends of Mineral Town" or "More Friends of Mineral Town" into the GBA slot of your DS.)
Upgrade your farm buildings to support new functions, such as adding a kitchen for use in cooking, or for holding livestock. Open up the local mine, and harvest ore useful for upgrading your farm tools. Win big at the local casino, playing any of four games!
General gameplay takes place on the upper screen, while the lower touch screen is used to access your inventory, status screens, and save. Brush your livestock and even milk cattle using the stylus.

game.name: Harvest Moon DS: Island of Happiness
game.desc: This version has the player take control of either two main characters, Mark or Chelsea, who are shipwrecked on an island that was once inhabited, but has s

game.name: Hasbro Family Game Night
game.desc: De retour sur DS, Monsieur Patate vous invite à jouer aux plus grands jeux de la gamme Hasbro dans la compilation Hasbro : Best of des Jeux en Famille 2. Enfilez vos gants et jouez au chirurgien avec le fameux Doctor Maboule, mettez vos nerfs à rude épreuve avec le Puissance 4x4 et jouez aussi à la Bataille Navale et Bop It.

game.name: Hello Kitty - Big City Dreams
game.desc: Hello Kitty sur DS est un jeu de plates-formes et d'aventure où vous incarnez la célèbre petite chatte qui décide de tout quitter pour découvrir une nouvelle vie, en compagnie de ses amis. Guidez-la au cours des différents niveaux du jeu, en accomplissant de nombreux petits jeux à l'aide du stylet.

game.name: Hello Kitty : Birthday Adventures
game.desc: Hello Kitty : Birthday Adventures sur Nintendo DS est un jeu original puisqu'il s'agira de trouver des cadeaux d'anniversaire pour tous vos amis, ceci étant généralement le moyen de jouer à divers mini-jeux sous couvert d'exploration et de réflexion.

game.name: Hello Kitty Daily
game.desc: Hello Kitty Daily planner

game.name: Hello, Pocoyo!
game.desc:
Hello Pocoyo! is the first console game based on Pocoyo, the award winning animated series created and developed by Zinkia.
The story takes place when Pocoyo, a curious, fun-loving and friendly little boy, makes disappear all his friends using a magic marker. Pocoyo will travel through the desert, the space, the forest and the rest of scenery's of the series until finding all of them.
The game is a graphical adventure specially designed for players from 6 years old. Puzzles require some creative thinking but also a little bit of skill from time to time. Everything is placed in the world to make the player feel he is involved in an adventure in which his teammates are Pocoyo and the rest of the characters.
Players will have to use his memory and musical skills, color lots of paintings, use a magnifying glass to decipher images, blow to the microphone to make characters fly using a balloon Besides, the player will take control of Pato, Elly and Loula, who will be joining the troupe as the player and Pocoyo find them. Each of these characters have some unique abilities that will be needed in certain parts of the game.
Hello Pocoyo! includes a contextual help system to prevent players getting stuck. Also, the amount of text used in the game is minimal, since the main part of the story is told with pre-rendered cinematics, the voice over of the narrator of the series, and lots of pictures and images spread around the levels of the game.

game.name: Hell's Kitchen : The Video Game
game.desc: Hell's Kitchen : The Video Game sur DS est une adaptation de l'émission de télévision du chef Gordon Ramsay. Il goûte, juge et commente les créations culinaires et les performances des joueurs. Le jeu contient aussi un livre de recettes avec quelques-uns des meilleurs secrets du chef à essayer et partager.

game.name: Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure
game.desc:
Poppycock! When the number one pompous adventurer, Henry Hatsworth, discovers a golden hat deep in the jungle, it makes him twenty years younger - but it also unleashes another world, releasing hordes of nasty monsters! To top it off, the number two pompous adventurer, Weaselby, is one step ahead of Hatsworth - eager to snag up the remaining pieces of the Golden Suit and claim the number one position in the Pompous Adventurer's Club for himself! Who can grab the suit, put Weaselby in his place, and seal up the other world, all before Tea Time? Why, Henry Hatsworth, of course!
Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure is a hybrid of two styles of game - the top screen has an action-platformer starring Hatsworth, who must defeat enemies with his sword. When he does, they fall down into the Puzzle Realm on the Touch Screen, which plays like Tetris Attack. Players must match the block enemies up with other colored blocks to finally destroy them, before they rise up back to the top screen to harass Hatsworth once again.
Henry also has access to a super meter - by clearing blocks in the Puzzle Realm, he fills it up. If he fills it up enough, it's Tea Time! This means that Hatsworth can transform into superpowered steampunk robot that shoots lasers and missiles and is completely invulnerable, which is handy when the player is in a jam.

game.name: Heracles : Battle with the Gods
game.desc: Heracles : Battles with the Gods sur DS est un jeu de plates-formes épique et humoristique incluant trente niveaux d'action non-stop ainsi que de nombreuses cachées à débloquer. Votre mission consiste à retrouver votre ami Pégase emprisonné par le dieu des océans, Poséidon. Pour cela, traversez des environnements inspirés de la mythologie grecque et maîtrisez les pouvoirs magiques qui vont faire de vous le plus grand héros de la Grèce Antique.

game.name: Herbie - Rescue Rally
game.desc: In this racing title for the Nintendo DS, Herbie's new owner Louise Noble is trying to find a way to save her family's animal sanctuary from being turned into a garbage dump by the sinister E. Vile corporation. In order t

game.name: Heroes of Hellas 2 : Olympia
game.desc: Heroes of Hellas 2 : Olympia est un puzzle-game disponible sur DS. Le joueur doit lutter contre un vil démon en construisant une nouvelle cité. Pour ce faire, il récolte de l'argent en alignant au moins trois gemmes de même couleur sur divers plateaux de jeu. Des pouvoirs spéciaux peuvent être débloqués pour plus d'efficacité.

game.name: Heroes of Mana
game.desc:
Heroes of Mana is a continuation of Square Enix's, World of Mana series, but with a new twist in the gameplay. This time around the gameplay is now real-time, where players can build bases and their own armies consisting of humans, monsters and rabites throughout the Mana series.
The story takes place when a witch by the name of Anise brought darkness to the land, unleashing hordes of monsters on the world. She is eventually defeated by the guardians of the trees, but the evil she unleashed was unable to me stopped until the Mana Goddess uses the Mana Sword to seal off the darkness in eight stones, bringing peace to the world. This is where the players takes control of the main protagonist, Roget, a younger warrior who has learned that somehow the evil is coming back into the world and must embark on a quest with 10 other comrades and countless created units and stop the evil forces from being unleashed again.
The player uses the stylus mostly throughout the game, touching on a certain character and touching somewhere on the screen to move them around or draw circles around multi characters to move them all at once. Players do battle by selecting their unit and tapping enemy units with the stylus to use that units attack skill on that selected enemy. Players can also build building and units to help them out by gathering two resources throughout the game, Gaia (which is responsible for buildings) and Treant (for units) all of which is located in the players main base, a large ship. Each unit has a different skill, some are good against enemy units others are used for resource gathering.
Friends can also compete through Wi-Fi head-to-head as well as see their ranking against other players. Players can also earn bonus items and maps through this if their ranking is high enough. The music is also composed by Yoko Shimomura who is also responsible for music in games such as Kingdom Hearts, Legend of Mana and Super Mario RPG as well.

game.name: Hero's Saga - Laevatein Tactics
game.desc: Hero's Saga Laevatein Tactics sur DS est un jeu de rôle tactique mettant en scène plus de 120 personnages jouables répartis dans 33 classes distinctes. Il s'agira de collecter des armes et de mettre en oeuvre d'étonnants pouvoirs pour sortir vainqueur de l'épouvantable guerre qui ravage le continent de Yulamecca.

game.path: ./Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi - The Genie & the Amp (USA).zip
game.name: Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi - The Genie & the Amp
game.marquee: ./wheel/Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi - The Genie & the Amp (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi - The Genie & the Amp (USA).mp4
