game.name: Mushroom Men: Rise of the Fungi
Music Monstars - The Ultimate Music Machine
game.desc: Music Monstars sur DS est un jeu de rythme permettant d'accomplir le rêve incarné de toutes et tous... Devenir une Star. Faites évoluer votre groupe de monstres, des débuts modestes dans le garage à la tournée mondiale. Le jeu propose un choix exhaustif de 20 instruments (guitare, batterie, synthétiseur, basse, violon...) pour jouer et chanter sur des musiques variées : de Queen à Tokyo Hotel en passant par Kylie Minogue ou Britney Spears.

game.name: MX vs ATV Reflex
game.desc: MX vs ATV Reflex est un jeu de courses sur Nintendo DS. Il offre une grande variété d'épreuves, au guidon de motos et de quads mais également au volant de 4x4 et de monster trucks. Il propose aussi une jouabilité remaniée sur deux-roues, notamment en ce qui concerne la prise de virages et la gestion des bosses. Enfin, un mode multi à quatre joueurs donne lieu à des affrontements entre amis.

game.name: MX vs. ATV Untamed
game.desc:
An update from MX vs. ATV Unleashed, Untamed has some of the classic features along with some new ones as well. There are 250 cc and 550 cc bikes and four ATV models, but also monster trucks, offroad dune buggys and trophy trucks.
Players can pull off insane stunts and compete in six different racing series (Supercross, Nationals, Opencross, Supermoto, Freestyle and Rally) or in the X-Cross, a tournament of all the series wrapped into one, plus sponsorships can be acquired: good performances have the player receive better bikes. It also features Crash Camera, a super slow-mo breakdown of accidents and crashes, similar to MotorStorm.
Some mini-games have been included as well, including ATV hockey, Monster Truck Smash and Tag to name a few. The online mode has the player compete against other competitors. The gameplay is very similar to the console systems, certain buttons for gas, brakes while the Wii remote can be used as well.
The DS and PSP versions are almost similar. While the DS has few vehicles and only has a championship mode unlike the many series in the major console versions, it contains ten exclusive tracks and three stadiums. The PSP version is almost similar, but has different series from the consoles: Race, One on One, Time Attack, Stunt Challenge, Stunt Race, Hang-Time, Combo Challenge, Flag Challenge. It also has the X-Cross tournament, but it is named the MX vs. ATV World Tour instead. Games can be played against friends using Wi-Fi.
game.developer: Endgame Studios Pty. Ltd., Tantalus Interactive Pty.

game.name: My Baby 3 & Friends
game.desc: My Baby 3 & Friends sur Nintendo DS vous invite à prendre en main votre bébé afin de le préparer au monde qui l'attend. Vous devrez ainsi le nourrir, vous amuser avec lui, lui apprendre plusieurs choses via des jeux d'éveil, etc. En outre, vous pourrez lui acheter différents vêtements, redécorer sa chambre et faire en sorte qu'il se fasse des amis en allant avec lui au parc ou à la piscine.

game.name: My Baby: Boy
game.desc: My Baby Boy sur DS propose de devenir un parent virtuel. Occupez-vous de votre bambin virtuel et faites en sorte qu'il ne manque de rien, ni qu'il lui arrive quelque chose. Le stylet et le micro de la console sont mis à contribution et prennent part à l'éducation de votre poupon qui s'étale sur 14 mois. En bonus, il est possible de débloquer le bébé fille pour recommencer le titre.

game.name: My Baby: Girl
game.desc: My Baby Girl sur DS propose de devenir un parent virtuel. Occupez-vous de votre bambin virtuel et faites en sorte qu'il ne manque de rien, ni qu'il lui arrive quelque chose. Le stylet et le micro de la console sont mis à contribution et prennent part à l'éducation de votre poupon qui s'étale sur 14 mois. En bonus, il est possible de débloquer le bébé garçon pour recommencer le titre.

game.name: My Boyfriend
game.desc: Real Stories : Amoureux pour la Vie sur DS fait partie d'une gamme de jeux permettant de faire vivre nombre d'aventures et d'expériences à toutes les filles. A travers de nombreux mini-jeux, vivez les plus belles rencontres et faites de votre Don-Juan un Prince Charmant... pour la vie !

game.name: My Boyfriend
game.desc: Real Stories : Amoureux pour la Vie sur DS fait partie d'une gamme de jeux permettant de faire vivre nombre d'aventures et d'expériences à toutes les filles. A travers de nombreux mini-jeux, vivez les plus belles rencontres et faites de votre Don-Juan un Prince Charmant... pour la vie !

game.path: ./My Chinese Coach - Learn a New Language (USA) [b].zip
game.name: My Chinese Coach : Learn a New Language
game.desc: My Chinese Coach is an edutainment title that teaches you Chinese while playing a series of mini-games. With one hundred scripted lessons and over 1000 lessons in all, My Chinese Coach starts beginner speakers of Chinese through the basics. Each lesson teaches a new set of words or grammar, and players must complete mini-games that practice the vocabulary in order to progress to the next lesson. Games include tones practice, hit-a-word, fading characters, and bridge builder. Also included in the game is a 10,000 word reference dictionary and a full phrase book.
game.marquee: ./wheel/My Chinese Coach - Learn a New Language (USA) [b].png
game.video: ./snap/My Chinese Coach - Learn a New Language (USA) [b].mp4
game.image: ./boxart/My Chinese Coach - Learn a New Language (USA) [b].png

game.name: My Dress-Up
game.desc:
My Dress-Up is a fashion game for girls on the NDS. The game is played with the DS on its side like a book. It features from over 600 customisable items of clothing. These are split into 9 different categories that include shoes, trousers, tops, dresses and hats. The game also features a T-Shirt creation mode where players are able to make customs tops using unlocked tops and designs. Fancy Dress items can also be unlocked so you can dress your friends up as Fairies, Princesses or even something scary for Halloween. Players are able create over 60 friends and save up to 96 different outfits.
The game is part of the My Games series and features the My Games chat feature that enables players to connect with My Make-Up and My Secret Diary for chat sessions. Photos from My Make-Up can also be sent to My Dress-Up to finish the make over.
The game has 9 languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish and Danish.

game.name: My Farm around the World
game.desc: My Farm around the World sur DS est une simulation d'élevage. Si les traditionnels cochons, poules et vaches ne sont plus assez dépaysants, le jeu permet de changer de continent. L'Asie, l'Afrique et l'Australie sont autant de champs d'élevage mis à disposition du joueur afin de diversifier à foison la faune.

game.name: My Friends
game.desc: My Friends est un jeu communautaire sur Nintendo DS. Ce titre propose au joueur de se faire des amis via le mode online. Sorte de Facebook pour les plus jeunes, le soft est centré autour de six environnements dans lesquels les avatars, customisables, peuvent se rencontrer, échanger des cadeaux, ou participer à des mini-jeux.

game.name: My Frogger Toy Trials
game.desc: Team up with Frogger in an all new adventure. Frogger is back but he is not alone. Take on the role of Frogger and the Hero. Control the Hero in the Adventure Map and use Frogger to solve puzzles with the touch pad and microphone. The Hero can also provide Frogger with helpful items such as health and power-ups. Tobi Inc. has created the "Toy Pet", where kids can create a toy pet with a will of its own. All the kids have to do is draw their ideal pet and within a few weeks their toy pet is delivered. Tobi Inc. is holding a competition for the best designed pet, which the Hero and Frogger decide to join. The winner of the competition will be granted one wish that can make all their dreams come true.

game.name: My Healthy Cooking Coach - Easy Way to Cook Healthy
game.desc: Retrouvez plus de 240 recettes de cuisine dans Cooking Coach sur DS et DSi. La cartouche se charge de vous donner des conseils et des astuces pour réaliser de nombreux petits plats. Quelques mini-jeux sont aussi présents pour patienter pendant les temps de cuisson !

game.name: My Horse Club
game.desc: Real Stories : Mission Equitation sur Nintendo DS vous fait accompagner la jeune dresseuse Manon à travers le monde. Montez une trentaine de races de chevaux, dans des environnements allant de grands canyons au désert marocain en passant par les lacs irlandais. Le tout à la recherche des origines d'un mystérieux Appaloosa.

game.name: My Little Pony - Pinkie Pie's Party
My Make-Up
game.desc:
My Make-Up is a cosmetic simulation game designed for girls on the Nintendo DS. The game enables players to create their own friends in the game and give them makeovers. Friends will also send messages to the player and ask for certain makeovers for different events. The players are able to apply lipstick, blusher, eye shadow, mascara and change the hairstyles and colour.
The fancy dress party requests lets the player paint the entire face. There is a reference image for the player to follow but they are free to create whatever they want.
Photos of makeovers can be saved into a photo album and can be send to other players via Nintendo Wireless Communications. Another multiplayer option is the makeover party where players swap characters and perform makeovers.
The game is part of the My Games series and features the My Games chat feature that enables players to connect with My Dress-Up and My Secret Diary for chat sessions.
The game has 9 languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish and Danish.

game.name: My Pet Beauty Salon
game.desc: My Pet : Beauty Salon est un jeu de simulation/gestion sur Nintendo DS. La DS pousse encore plus loin le concept du jeu animalier avec ce titre qui vous propose de mettre en place les installations les plus luxueuses pour vos animaux de compagnie.

game.name: My Pet Shop
game.desc: My Pet Shop est un jeu de gestion sur DS qui vous propose d'ouvrir un magasin d'animaux afin de les offrir aux habitants de la ville de Green Town. A vous d'aider les clients de l'animalerie en accomplissant diverses tâches comme trouver des animaux, s'en occuper, les soigner. Tout ça en vous amusant avec vos petits protégés.

game.name: My Secret World by Imagine
game.desc:
My Secret World is a diary for girls in which they can also play games.
It serves as a diary in which users can take notes and also plan events using a calendar. Creativity can be expressed with 500 items with which to decorate pages which need to be unlocked first. Using Wi-Fi players can chat with other players and trade avatar items and gifts.
The game includes personality quizzes and three other mini-games to play with friends.
In Copycat the player must replicate a sticker collage. Another mini-game has the players inflate balloons using the microphone.

game.path: ./My Spanish Coach - Learn a New Language (USA).zip

game.desc: Mon Coach Personnel : J'Améliore mon Espagnol sur DS vous permet de perfectionner votre maîtrise de la langue grâce à une série d'exercices évolutifs se calquant sur votre niveau. Apprenez à écrire et reconnaître plus de 16 500 mots que vous pourrez par la suite réutiliser dans des conversations au quotidien. Surveillez votre progression grâce à votre coach virtuel qui saura vous motiver afin de continuer votre apprentissage.

game.name: My Word Coach - Improve Your Vocabulary
game.desc: Mon Coach Personnel : J'enrichis mon Vocabulaire sur DS vous permet de réduire vos fautes d'orthographe tout en vous amusant. La cartouche vous propose un programme d'entraînement personnalisé, adapté à votre niveau avec des exercices ludiques pour s'entraîner et s'amuser autour de plus de 16 500 mots accompagnés de leurs définitions. Un suivi de votre progression selon les objectifs que vous vous fixez est proposé de même qu'un mode multijoueur pour défier vos amis !

game.name: My World, My Way
game.desc: My World, My Way peut être décrit comme une jeu de rôle destiné à un public féminin. Dans la peau de la princesse Elise, embarquée dans une aventure épique avec son compagnon, vous parcourez le royaume de votre père, en quête de périls et de rencontres en tout genre.

game.name: MySims - Agents
game.desc: In MySims Agents players take on the role of a special agent hired to foil the sinister plans of Morcubus, lord of the criminal underworld. By recruiting different MySims, each with their own special characteristics, players can build up their very own crime-busting dream team. From tracking footprints and using forensics to picking locks, hacking into computers, following leads and collecting clues, players must rely on their wits, skills and trusty gadgets to piece together the clues to solve the mystery. Jump aboard the jet to reach an ancient temple, a spooky mansion or an icy mountaintop chalet in search of clues that lead players closer to the sinister Morcubus. Return from the adventure with cool treasures that players can use to construct and customize their headquarters and make it their own.

game.name: MySims - Party
game.desc: MySims Party lets you and your friends throw down with the MySims. Up to 4 players can test their wits, quickness and skill in 40+ minigames, each hosted by a different MySim! Each of your friends and you can select a custom team of 4 characters to play the huge variety MySims Party has to offer. Outwit friends by selecting the right team who will carry the day in contests based on strength, endurance, speed and luck. Pick carefully though, the wrong team will give your friends the edge over you. Bragging rights only belong to those who choose wisely and play flawlessly! Real People. Real fun. With the MySims!

game.name: MySims Kingdom
game.desc: Take the Kingdom with you! MySims Kingdom on Nintendo DS adds a new chapter to the saga, challenging you to help the King thwart the plans of evil in a far flung corner of the Kingdom. Many new activities and mini-games are included to help you persuade the King that your island is the ultimate royal destination.

game.name: MySims SkyHeroes
game.desc: MySims SkyHeroes est un jeu d'action sur Nintendo DS. A bord d'un avion que vous aurez vous-même monté morceau par morceau, vous devez vaincre Morcubus et ses terribles escadrons. De nombreux bonus à débloquer et un mode multijoueur jouable jusqu'à quatre viennent compléter le tableau.

game.name: MySims
game.desc: Explore a whole new world with MySims - it's your world to transform. Move to a town that has been struggling lately. With a little creativity and some help from the locals, you can make this place thrive. Improve the town to attract new characters, from the Italian Chef and Florist to the Kickboxing Instructor and DJ. Discover what the residents want and need, so that you can help them enjoy life in their town.

game.name: MySims: Racing
game.desc: Race into an all-new adventure with MySims Racing! Test your reflexes, strategy and skill by tricking out cars, completing challenges, and winning championships. Speed up any get-together with 4-player mode. Pick cool race-themed outfits and accessories for your MySim, save Speedville, and come race with us!

game.name: Myst
game.desc:
You have just stumbled upon a most intriguing book, a book titled Myst. You have no idea where it came from, who wrote it, or how old it is. Reading through its pages provides you with only a superbly crafted description of an island world. But it's just a book, isn't it? As you reach the end of the book, you lay your hand on a page. Suddenly your own world dissolves into blackness, replaced with the island world the pages described. Now you're here, wherever here is, with no option but to explore.
Myst is a first-person point-and-click adventure where the player controls a character known as The Stranger. Magically transported into the world described in the book, he needs to explore Myst Island and solve its mysteries. The game is presented as a series of static scenes where the player acts with the environment by clicking and manipulating objects. There are no enemies and it is not possible to die. Through Myst Island, the game is further divided into mini-worlds set in different ages accessed through different books.
The PSP version adds new adventure scenarios and includes widescreen support.
The DS version includes a completely new age, the Rime Age, and, next to a code rewrite, includes new and re-mastered sound effects and video clips.

game.path: ./Mysterious Case of Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde, The (USA).zip
game.name: Mysterious Case of Dr. Jekyll & Mr Hyde
game.desc: Enigmes et objets cachés : Dr Jekyll & Mr Hyde est un jeu de réflexion du Nintendo DS. Faites un bond de quelques siècles en arrière et découvrez le Londres des années 1886. Dans le quartier de Soho un riche parlementaire vient d'être retrouvé assassiné. Il va vous falloir l'aide d'un bon médecin légiste sur cette affaire. Heureusement pour vous ce bon Dr jekyll est toujours là pour ses anciens amis.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Mysterious Case of Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde, The (USA).png
game.image: ./boxart/Mysterious Case of Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde, The (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Mysterious Case of Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde, The (USA).mp4

game.name: Mystery Case Files - MillionHeir
game.desc: Phil T. Rich has gone missing!Players must find this missing millionaire by solving a series of touchscreen, hidden object puzzles on their Nintendo DS. With over a thousand items to find across 30 unique and cleverly-cluttered backgrounds, players must u

game.name: Mystery Case Files - MillionHeir
game.desc: Phil T. Rich has gone missing!Players must find this missing millionaire by solving a series of touchscreen, hidden object puzzles on their Nintendo DS. With over a thousand items to find across 30 unique and cleverly-cluttered backgrounds, players must u

game.name: Mystery Case Files : Ravenhearst
game.desc: Dans Mystery Case Files : Ravenhearst, jeu d'objets cachés sur Nintendo DS, enfilez votre costume de détective et explorez plusieurs pièces pour découvrir des indices habilement dissimulés. Il vous faudra trouver les pages manquantes du journal d'Emma qui révéleront l'histoire troublante de Ravenhearst.

game.name: Mystery Dungeon - Shiren the Wanderer
game.desc: The legend of the Golden Condor... from village to village and from town to town, everybody speak of it - somewhere, beyond forests and mountains, there lies an idyllic Golden Land, the land of eternal happiness. Many adventurers have tried to find their

game.name: Mystery Tales 2 : The Spirit Mask
game.desc: Mystery Tales 2 : The Spirit Mask est un jeu d'objets cachés disponible sur DS. Aidez la sorcière Mélanie Cygnes à percer le mystère d'un masque troublant. Comme d'habitude, notre but est de retrouver une série d'objets dans des décors fixes, mais un système de runes à tracer permet d'offrir quelques options supplémentaires.

game.name: N+
game.desc:
N+ is an enhanced version of the game N, originally a flash based browser game. Players control a small, but very agile ninja through different small areas. Next to movement, only a single button is used to jump, but this allows the ninja to run up walls, do wall jumps and cross large distances.
Levels are divided over different episodes unlocked gradually. Each level consists of a single screen with a time limit. The amount of time can be replenished by collecting golden coins, but the main goals is to activate the exit, usually by touching a specific button or opening a number of doors. Areas are filled with hazards such as spikes and droids that shoot laser or rockets. There are also obstacles such as platforms that only move in a single direction or falling damage from high platforms. Death is always instant, but the player is given an unlimited amount of tries.
The PSP version includes a mix of original levels and user-created ones with about 200 in total. There is also a level editor and unlike the Xbox 360 version these can be shared with other players. The PSP version shows the levels from a "medium" distance, while the DS version contains a far view and a close view on the screens. Physics are also slightly different in each version.
There are both competitive and cooperative game modes available in multiplayer sessions. Players can switch between the pure mode with original graphics and the plus mode with enhanced visuals. The unlockables includes victory screens, new music and new colours for the ninja.

game.name: Nadia Megafun Land
game.desc: Nadia Megafunland sur DS rassemble 30 attractions délirantes dans sept univers différents : Pirate land, Atomik circus, Méga arena, Poney land, Prince land, Sorcery et Ciné land. Une seule cartouche permet de défier ses amis en multijoueur. La maîtrise du stylet et du micro sont nécessaires pour devenir la reine du Megafunland.

game.path: ./Naked Brothers Band, The - The Video Game (USA) [b].zip
game.name: Naked Brothers Band, The - The Video Game
game.marquee: ./wheel/Naked Brothers Band, The - The Video Game (USA) [b].png
game.image: ./boxart/Naked Brothers Band, The - The Video Game (USA) [b].png
game.video: ./snap/Naked Brothers Band, The - The Video Game (USA) [b].mp4

game.name: Namco Museum DS
game.desc:
A compilation of some classic games. The games included:
1. Pac-Man 2. Galaga 3. Xevious 4. Dig Dug II 5. Galaxian 6. Mappy 7. The Tower of Druaga 8. Pac-Man VS.
There is a screen mode selection which allows the use of different screen combinations on the Nintendo DS. There is also wireless battles in Pac-Man VS, which features downloadable play where four players can battle.

game.path: ./Nancy Drew - The Deadly Secret of Olde World Park (USA).zip
game.name: Nancy Drew - The Deadly Secret of Olde World Park
game.marquee: ./wheel/Nancy Drew - The Deadly Secret of Olde World Park (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Nancy Drew - The Deadly Secret of Olde World Park (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Nancy Drew - The Deadly Secret of Olde World Park (USA).png

game.path: ./Nancy Drew - The Mystery of the Clue Bender Society (USA).zip
game.name: Nancy Drew : The Mystery of the Clue Bender Society
game.desc: Nancy Drew : The Mystery of the Clue Bender Society sur DS est un jeu d'enquête dans lequel vous retrouvez la célèbre héroïne de romans policiers pour jeunes filles. Dans cette nouvelle histoire, Nancy tente d'intégrer un club privé regroupant les plus grands détectives, mais pour y arriver elle va devoir faire ses preuves en résolvant des cas riches en challenges et en rebondissements.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Nancy Drew - The Mystery of the Clue Bender Society (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Nancy Drew - The Mystery of the Clue Bender Society (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Nancy Drew - The Mystery of the Clue Bender Society (USA).png

game.name: Nancy Drew: The Model Mysteries
game.desc: Nancy Drew : The Model Mysteries est une compilation de mini-jeux sur Nintendo DS. La célèbre enquêtrice, incarnée par le joueur, mène ses investigations sur le meurtre de Vic, fiancé de son amie Sydney. Pour résoudre ce mystère, le joueur doit passer par des jeux d'objets cachés, des puzzles et retrouver les différences entre plusieurs images.

game.name: Nanostray 2
game.desc:
Nanostray 2 is similar in gameplay to the original Nanostray, but has a few new features. You can play over thirty missions with over six different game modes to play in. You can play the Adventure Mode, which shows cut-scenes to tie into the story or you can skip the story and play Arcade mode and just go for the highest score possible.
You can also play in challenge mode, completing a set of four challenges that unlocks a new simulator mode challenge, which is similar to Arcade mode, but with a different scoring system. It has sixteen massive bosses and over one hundred different types of enemies and you can change control styles, using the classic or using the left or right handed touch control. There is also a Nanogauge that fills up when you destroy multiple enemies, earning you bonus multipliers.
You can play against a friend in duel mode or play in cooperative mode using multi-cards and can also upload your high scores online using the Wi-Fi connection.

game.name: Nanostray
game.desc:
A shooter of the vertical scroller type, Nanostray is similar to past games like Raiden and Tyrian to mention but a few.
Players unlock features (concept art, backgrounds etc.) by fighting through an adventure mode, which in turn allows finished levels to be played in arcade mode, which is purely for attaining high scores. High scores in arcade mode can be logged on the games official site for ranking against other players around the world.
Adventure mode also allows players to tackle missions in non linear order, however all three in one group must be finished before the next three can be attempted and so on.
The touch screen is used for current status and to scan the end of level bosses for weaknesses.
Challenge modes are added when adventure levels are completed, allowing players to play through the game with a set of restrictions, making high scores more difficult, but increasing the challenge and lastability of the game.
Two players can fight competitively to get the highest score before a timer ends or be the first to reach a certain predefined limit of points.
The game supports single cart play for multiplayer so only one copy is needed.

game.name: Napoleon Dynamite : The Game
game.desc: Napoleon Dynamite : The Game est le jeu pour Nintendo DS tiré du long métrage du même nom. Il s'agit d'une compilation de 30 mini-jeux vous permettant de rejouer les meilleurs moments du film.

game.name: Naraba World : Le Labyrinthe des Lumières
game.desc: Naraba World : Le Labyrinthe des Lumières est un jeu de chiffres et plus précisément de calcul mental. Adapté à un jeune public, il propose au joueur d'incarner un garçon dont l'objectif est de redonner toute son énergie à l'île de Bruna. Pour ce faire, il doit enchaîner les puzzles et épreuves basées sur du calcul et ce, adapté à son âge.

game.name: Naraba World : Le Mystérieux Palais
game.desc: Naraba World : Le Mystérieux Palais est un jeu de chiffres et plus précisément de calcul mental. Adapté à un jeune public, il propose au joueur d'incarner un garçon dont l'objectif est de défier un sorcier royal qui a pétrifié le Roi et ses sujets. Pour ce faire, il doit enchaîner les puzzles et épreuves basées sur du calcul et ce, adapté à son âge.

game.name: Naruto : Ninja Council 2 : European Version
game.desc: Naruto : Ninja Council 2 - European Version est un beat'em all basé dans l'univers du manga de Masashi Kishimoto. L'histoire correspond à l'arrivée des ninjas d'Oto no Kuni, le quartet du son, et comporte une série de niveaux piégés à traverser aux côtés des personnages emblématiques de la série.

game.name: Naruto : Path of the Ninja 2
game.desc: Naruto : Path of the Ninja 2 sur DS vous plonge dans l'univers de l'anime à la sauce jeu de rôle. Naruto et ses amis répondent présents pour mener à bien les missions qui leur sont conférées. Les combats sont au tour par tour et permettent d'exprimer vos talents de ninja par le biais de combinaisons d'attaques avec plusieurs personnages. A déguster également à deux joueurs.

game.name: Naruto : Path of the Ninja
game.desc: Naruto : Path of the Ninja vous plonge dans l'univers de l'animé dans un jeu de rôle sur DS. Naruto et ses amis répondent présents pour mener à bien les missions qui leur sont conférées. Les combats sont au tour par tour et permettent d'exprimer vos talents de ninja par le biais de combinaisons d'attaques avec plusieurs personnages.

game.name: Naruto Shippuden - Naruto vs Sasuke
game.desc: Naruto Shippuden : Naruto vs Sasuke sur DS est un jeu d'action dans lequel le gameplay est orienté à la fois plates-formes et beat'em all. Le scénario débute avec l'arrivée de Sai et Kabuto et se focalise sur la recherche de Sasuke par Naruto et ses compagnons. Il est possible de switcher librement entre les différents personnages et de recourir à des attaques combinées.

game.name: Naruto Shippuden - Ninja Council 4
game.desc: Naruto est devenu grand et revient sur DS dans un jeu de combat et d'aventure dans lequel vous pouvez mettre hors d'état de nuire vos ennemis en utilisant différents Jutsus. Naruto Shippuden : Ninja Council 4 vous propose de contrôler huit personnages dont Naruto et Rock Lee. Formez votre équipe de trois ninjas et revivez l'aventure du futur Hokage.

game.name: Naruto Shippuden - Ninja Destiny 2
game.desc: Naruto : Ninja Destiny II - European Version sur DS offre la même jouabilité que sa version japonaise (Naruto Shinobi Retsuden II) mais ce jeu de combat en 3D est agrémenté de nouveaux personnages et d'un scénario exclusif. Outre son mode Histoire, le titre offre un mode Quête à débloquer ainsi qu'un mode Combat sans-fil permettant de défier un ami via la connexion wi-fi de la DS.

game.name: Naruto Shippuden: Shinobi Rumble!!
game.desc: Naruto Shippuden : Shinobi Rumble est un jeu de combat en 2D sur Nintendo DS. Principalement orienté vers les affrontements à quatre joueurs, le soft constitue en outre l'occasion de revivre les meilleures batailles de la période Shippuden avant d'apprendre à dompter la fameuse technique du Chaku Rush.

game.name: Naruto: Ninja Council 3
game.desc: Naruto : Ninja Council European Version sur DS est un jeu de combat en 2D basé sur l'univers du manga de Masashi Kishimoto. Vous avez le choix parmi 20 ninjas avec leurs techniques propres que l'on découvre dans la série. Le but est d'accomplir des missions confiées par votre village afin de s'en voir confier de plus prestigieuses. Vous pouvez également jouer en multijoueur jusqu'à quatre pour des affrontements dignes du manga.

game.name: Naruto: Ninja Destiny
game.desc: Naruto : Ninja Destiny sur DS est un jeu de combat en 3D se déroulant dans l'univers du célèbre manga. Parcourez le mode histoire pour débloquer des bonus, faites un saut par le mode Combat pour choisir parmi les 16 personnages, utilisez leurs techniques spécifiques et aidez-vous des objets sur l'écran tactile pour vaincre.

game.name: Natalie Brooks : Mystery at Hillcrest High

game.path: ./Natalie Brooks - The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl).zip
game.name: Natalie Brooks : The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom
game.marquee: ./wheel/Natalie Brooks - The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl).png
game.image: ./boxart/Natalie Brooks - The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl).png
game.video: ./snap/Natalie Brooks - The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl).mp4

game.name: National Geographic - Panda
game.desc: National Geographic Panda est, à l'instar de Nintendogs, un jeu dans lequel le joueur doit s'occuper du bon devenir de son animal virtuel, à savoir un panda. Nourriture, santé, activités... : le joueur doit veiller à l'éveil et au développement de son animal. En partenariat avec National Geographic, le jeu permet de mieux découvrir cet animal et son mode de vie.

game.name: Need for Speed - Most Wanted
game.desc: Need for Speed: Most Wanted is a racing game belonging to Need for Speed series. In the Career mode, you have to beat the 15 blacklisters in order to become the Most Wanted. For unlocking the bosses' circuits, you have to win points by winning races, avoi

game.name: Need for Speed - Nitro
game.desc: Need for Speed: Nitro brings the fun and exhilaration of high-speed racing to your Nintendo DS. It brings the Need for Speed franchise's trademark attitude and car culture with deep and thrilling gameplay. Gamers must battle through the mayhem of relentless cops master the art of drifting to gain boost at 150 mph and prove themselves across five mega cities at a gripping 60 frames per second.

game.name: Need for Speed - Undercover
game.desc: Need for Speed Undercover est un jeu de courses sur DS. Les poursuites avec les voitures de police sont de retour dans cet opus définitivement orienté vers l'action. L'histoire profite de la présence de la star de cinéma Maggie Q. Elle joue en effet le personnage principal dans les séquences narratives.

game.name: Need for Speed - Underground 2
game.desc:
This installment in the Need for Speed series, Underground 2 is a racing game based on illicit, night time races, with the player gaining street credit, cash and access to unique tuner parts by schooling the competition.
Taking place in a massive, open city, NFS Underground 2 allows players to explore the city at will, engaging random challengers and moving into the coveted Underground Racing League. Once in the Underground Racing League, the player advances first by race wins, then with building up their tuner car and taking on tougher opponents. The objective is to win all Underground Racing League engagements and trick out your car to the max.
The PC version is the only version that allows the user to save magazine screen shots of your tricked out car to disk.

game.path: ./Need for Speed Carbon - Own the City (USA).zip
game.name: Need for Speed Carbon : Own the City
game.desc: Need for Speed Carbon : Own the City sur DS est un jeu de voitures survitaminées jouant des pneus lors de courses nocturnes. 29 bolides sont à votre disposition pour mettre une raclée à vos adversaires et les semer dans le rétro. Formez une équipe imbattable et partez à la conquête de la ville. La nuit est à vous !
game.marquee: ./wheel/Need for Speed Carbon - Own the City (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Need for Speed Carbon - Own the City (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Need for Speed Carbon - Own the City (USA).png

game.name: Need For Speed ProStreet
game.desc: Need for Speed ProStreet sur DS est le énième opus de la franchise NFS qui, cette fois, dit adieu aux rivalités entre gangs pour miser sur les affrontements en circuits urbains fermés. Tunez vos caisses et élancez-vous dans une grande variété d'épreuves pour dominer l'asphalte et devenir le pro toutes catégories confondues.

game.name: Neopets Puzzle Adventure
game.desc:
Neopets Puzzle Adventure offers players a new take on puzzle adventure games. Choose one of twelve Neopets and challenge your opponents in the land of Neopia in one of several puzzle minigames, including a power-up filled reimagining of the classic games Reversi and Go.
Other minigames include a touchscreen gesture shooting gallery, a memory puzzle, and a colorful brick-breaking game. During the adventure, players acquire new PetPets, unlock over 100 missions, and redeem codes to unlock virtual items at the Neopets website.
Neopets Puzzle Adventure also features head-to-head multiplayer.

game.name: Nervous Brickdown
game.desc:
At its core Nervous Brickdown is a Arkanoid-clone and the first ten levels feature the familiar gameplay of using a horizontally moving paddle at the bottom and a ball to destroy bricks at the top of the screen. But each of the ten worlds (divided into 9 levels and one boss fight) feature a different type of gameplay.
In the second stage the player needs to draw the paddle on the screen himself to knock the ball against ink blots. Depending on the form of the drawn paddle, the ball will bounce off differently. And to spice things up even more, the paddle isn't restricted to just horizontal movement anymore but can instead be freely moved around at the bottom of the screen. Other stages require the player to move through a haunted house and kill ghosts by blowing into the microphone or contain a laser beam which increases it's speed.
By playing successfully through the levels, the player unlocks bonuses which range from extra lives to the ability to change the trajectory of the ball by blowing into the microphone.
The game also features a multiplayer mode for two players in which the ball changes into the player's paddle color so it will only bounce off the paddle with the corresponding color.

game.name: NEVES
game.desc: NEVES est un jeu de réflexion sur DS reprenant le principe du tangram. Plusieurs centaines de défis attendent donc le joueur et lui demanderont à chaque fois de reconstituer la forme à l'écran en se servant toujours des 7 mêmes pièces de bois. Trois modes de jeu sont disponibles : le mode libre, le mode en temps limité et le mode qui n'autorise que 7 mouvements par puzzle.

game.name: New International Track & Field
game.desc:
New International Track & Field is a 21st century update of the NES game that features 24 events to compete in:
1. 100 Metre Sprint
2. Long Jump
3. 110 Metre Hurdles
4. Skeet Shooting
5. Weightlifting
6. 400 Metre Distance
7. Steeplechase
8. Archery
9. Javelin
10. Cycling
11. Triple Jump
12. Hammer
13. Discus
14. Shot Put
15. Breaststroke
16. 100 Metre Backstroke
17. Pole Vault
18. High Dive
19. Double Trap Shooting
20. Springboard
21. Vault
22. Rowing
23. High Jump
24. Horizontal
There are 18 different athletes to choose from, 10 original characters created for the game and 8 classic Konami characters:
1. Sparkster 2. Pyramid Head 3. Evil Rose 4. Frogger 5. Simon Belmot 6. Pentaro 7. Solid Snake 8. Power Pro-kun
The gameplay consists of using the stylus pen in various movements on the bottom screen when prompted during the game. If the player chooses, they can also use the D-pad and buttons instead and can also utilize the DS' microphone to shout encouragements to their athlete, giving them a better chance at succeeding at their event.
Players can also customize their characters through various equipment and costumes by completing certain objectives in the game and features online capabilities, allowing four opponents to face each other in online tournaments as well as track their stats on worldwide leaderboards.

game.name: New Super Mario Bros
game.desc:
In an all new 2D side-scrolling adventure, Mario and Luigi return after nearly fifteen years. The first traditional Mario Bros. game since Super Mario World.
The character models are rendered in real time 3D, allowing for a far greater number of moves ever before seen in a Mario Bros. title. Also as the game is on DS, the touch screen allows players to store an additional power-up and view the distance still to go in a level.

game.name: New Zealand Story Revolution
game.desc:
The game is a remake of the classic platformer The New Zealand Story. As in the original, the player takes control of Tiki the Kiwi, who sets out to rescue his friends from the clutches of an evil leopard seal. The goal of each level is thus to reach the cage of an imprisoned Kiwi bird and free it. To make it through the levels, Tiki is equipped with a bow the get rid of the constantly respawning enemy. The remake features some new mechanics, like a double jump and a different health system (Tiki dies at one hit in the old game) and several mini games played on the touch screen such as find the differences. In the normal game mode the bottom screen functions as a map of the current level. There are two difficulty levels.
The game features four player multi-player in wireless mode.

game.name: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan : New Year's Celebration

game.path: ./Nickelodeon Team Umizoomi and Dora's Fantastic Flight (USA).zip
game.name: Nickelodeon Team : Umizoomi
game.image: ./boxart/Nickelodeon Team Umizoomi and Dora's Fantastic Flight (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Nickelodeon Team Umizoomi and Dora's Fantastic Flight (USA).mp4

game.name: Nicktoons Unite!
game.desc:
Nicktoons Unite! is a 3D person action platformer. Danny Phantom, SpongeBob SquarePants, Timmy Turner and Jimmy Neutron, all known from animated TV series, are brought together to face enemies from their respective worlds.
You can play as any one of the four characters and instantaneously swap at any point in the game. Each character has his own special ability. Danny can wall jump and pass through certain walls. Spongebob can blow bubbles and float in a bubble. Timmy Turner can move quickly and freeze enemies with his special ability. Jimmy Neutron has a gun and a rocket pack.
The game is an action platformer, hosting a standard fare of shootable bad guys, platforms, switches, puzzles and boss fights.

game.path: ./Night at the Museum - Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game (USA) [b].zip
game.name: Night at the Museum - Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game
game.desc: La Nuit au Musée 2 sur DS est l'adaptation des aventures de Larry Daley, incarné par Ben Stiller au cinéma. Le joueur fait la connaissance des différents personnages du long métrage dans cette aventure qui mêle investigations et phases d'action. Son objectif est de récolter les 9 lingots qui lui permettront de reconstituer la tablette magique de Kahmunrah, le chef égyptien qui souhaite conquérir le Monde.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Night at the Museum - Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game (USA) [b].png
game.video: ./snap/Night at the Museum - Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game (USA) [b].mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Night at the Museum - Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game (USA) [b].png

game.name: Ninja Captains
game.desc: Ninja Captains est un party-game rigolo sur DS qui met en scène de petits ninjas à travers une vingtaine d'activités différentes tout autour du globe.

game.name: Ninja Gaiden Dragon Sword
game.desc: This action-adventure title is presented in a third person, pseudo-3D manner, meaning all the game-models are rendered in full 3D, but the world the player travels around in is pre-rendered. When played, the Nintendo DS is held sideways, as in Hotel Dusk: Room 215 and Brain Age: Train Your Brain in Minutes a Day!. The left screen shows the area map, while the right displays the main gameplay, when set for right-handed play, and reverse when set for left-handed play. Set six months after Ninja Gaiden, Ryu Hayabusa has rebuilt the Hayabusa Village. When fellow villager and kunoichi, Momiji, is kidnapped by the Black Spider Ninja Clan, he is forced to find her, while uncovering the secrets behind the mysterious Dark Dragonstones and their relation to the Dragon Lineage

game.name: Ninja Reflex
game.desc:
Ninja Reflex is a game to test the players reaction speed and timing. The mini-games consist of catching flies with chopsticks, catching Koi fish from a pond along with training with martial arts weapons of the shuriken, samurai sword and nunchaku. Completing these tasks will earn the player a digital belt from their own personal sensai.
There is also a meditation method where the game will guide the player to calm their breathing and relaxing their muscles. It can support up to four-players on a multi-player mode, letting players challenge each other to see who has faster reaction times.

game.name: Ninjatown
game.desc:
Ninjatown is a family-friendly tower defense game for the Nintendo DS that features the artwork and characters of ex-EGM editor Shawn Smith's "Shawnimals" universe. In the game, players must build Ninja Huts at key spots along a set pathway to defend each of the game's 36 levels from the invading forces of Mr. Demon. Players can build up to eight different kinds of Ninja Huts, each kind containing its own category of Ninja, from Wasabi pea-shooting Sniper Ninjas to bearded Mountain Ninjas.
There are also a variety of "Ol' Master Ninja Powers" that can help the player in a pinch. These range from blowing into the DS microphone to push enemies backwards with a gust of wind to tapping enemies on screen in a short period of time in order to deal extra damage to them.
The game is divided into 9 "districts", each containing 3 standard tower defense maps and 1 boss map. Each level in the game takes about 10-15 minutes to complete, with the full game clocking in at around 6-8 hours.

game.name: Nintendogs - Best Friends
game.desc:
Nintendogs lets you take care of virtual pets (dogs, obviously) on your Nintendo DS. You can train your puppies by speaking commands into the microphone, pat the pooch with the stylus, play games like as "fetch" with a Frisbee, buy toys, food, and accessories, and take part in competitions to win trophies.
If there are other Nintendo DS users with Nintendogs nearby with both of you in "Bark Mode", you can link the games wirelessly and see both dogs on the same screen.
You initially only have 6 (US/EU), 5 (JP) of the 18 (US/EU), 15 (JP) breeds available when you start playing the game (the six breeds being determined by which version of the game you buy), but as you progress, you unlock more breeds and items to buy. If you connect with another user that has another breed of dog not available to you then their dog's breed will be unlocked for you.
The available versions to purchase are:
Japanese Versions:
1. Chihuahua & Friends: Beagle, Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, Chihuahua, Labrador Retriever, Shih Tzu. 2. Miniature Dachshund & Friends: German Shepherd, Miniature Dachshund, Miniature Schnauzer, Pug, Yorkshire Terrier. 3. Shiba & Friends: Miniature Pinscher, Pembroke Welsh Corgi, Shetland Sheepdog, Shiba Inu, Toy Poodle.
North American and European Versions:
1. Chihuahua & Friends: Boxer, Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, Chihuahua, German Shepherd, Shetland Sheepdog, Yorkshire Terrier. 4. Dachshund & Friends: Beagle, Golden Retriever, Miniature Dachshund, Pug, Shih Tzu, Siberian Husky. 5. Lab & Friends: Labrador Retriever, Miniature Pinscher, Miniature Schnauzer, Pembroke Welsh Corgi, Shiba Inu, Toy Poodle. 6. Best Friends Version (North America - bundled with DS): Beagle, German Shepherd, Golden Retriever, Labrador Retriever, Miniature Dachshund, Yorkshire Terrier. 7. Dalmatian & Friends: Dalmatian, Boxer, German Shepherd, Golden Retriever, Yorkshire Terrier, Beagle.
In addition to all the breeds listed above, there are two more breeds that can be unlocked through various ways.

game.name: Nintendogs: Lab & Friends
game.desc: Avec un choix initial d'adoption parmi 6 races et 14 à débloquer, Nintendogs : Labrador & ses Amis sur DS vous propose de vous occuper d'un petit chiot. Vous devrez passer du temps avec votre ami, le dresser, le nourrir, jouer avec-lui et ensuite le présenter à des concours pour lui faire gagner plein d'objets.

game.name: Nos Voisins les Hommes : Zamy Pète les Plombs
game.desc: The animals meet a new friend Boris the Beaver who needs a lot of help building his damn which little does everyone know, will flood all of Rancho Camelot Estates. The l

game.name: Nostalgia
game.desc: Set in an alternate-reality version of 19th-century Earth, Nostalgia casts you as Eddie, a headstrong Londoner who amasses a group of memorable companions to traverse the world in his steampunk-inspired zeppelin. As you navigate the open skies, you'll explore mysterious foreign locales, slay all manner of fantastical enemies, complete a variety of thrilling quests, and ultimately, save the world from unfathomable evil.

game.path: ./OK! - First for Celebrity News - Puzzle Stars (Europe).zip
game.name: OK! : First for Celebrity News : Puzzle Stars
game.marquee: ./wheel/OK! - First for Celebrity News - Puzzle Stars (Europe).png
game.image: ./boxart/OK! - First for Celebrity News - Puzzle Stars (Europe).png
game.video: ./snap/OK! - First for Celebrity News - Puzzle Stars (Europe).mp4

game.name: OMG 26: Our Mini Games
game.desc: An abandoned mansion in a small town, nicknamed 'ghost house' by the locals is the setting for Mystery Mansion. The strange and eerie sounds along with local stories of ghosts and ghouls prompt three adventurous members of the after school club to venture into the mansion and solve the mysteries within. Help the After School Club in their investigation by solving a series of spooky mini-games and ghoulish challenges and unravel the secrets of the Mystery Mansion.

game.name: One Piece : Gigant Battle
game.desc: One Piece : Gigant Battle sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de combat en arènes mettant en scène les personnages du manga de Eiichiro Oda. Le jeu comporte une vingtaine de personnages jouables aux capacités évolutives et 71 personnages de soutien. Les combats peuvent faire intervenir jusqu'à 4 joueurs en local.

game.name: Ontamarama
game.desc:
Onpu Island is an island populated by musical spirits called Ontama. These strange, multicolored creatures can allow skilled performers, called 'Ontamaestros', to perform music by gathering Ontama. Beat and Rest, two young friends from a small village on the island, find an Ontama on the street. They discover that the Ontama are being captured, and so they set out to find out what's happening to them, and to become Ontamaestros themselves.
Ontamarama is an action rhythm game that makes full use of the DS' capabilities. Ontama appear on the screen, and can be tapped, tossed, and circled. Clearing an Ontama makes fills a note on the bar along the top of the screen, and when the note reaches the end of the bar, the correct button must be pressed to play the note. There are four different colored Ontama, and you also need to watch out for the white and black ones which can help or hinder you in other ways!
The game includes a story mode, a tutorial mode, a free play mode where you can play songs cleared in the story mode, and a challenge mode. There is also a shop where you can buy songs and items with points acquired during the game.

game.name: Open Season
game.desc:
Open Season is based on the Sony Pictures Animation's CG animated film of the same name, where a rowdy brood of forest animals turn the tables on a bunch of unsuspecting hunters.
The game is a side-scrolling-puzzle adventure. The plot of the game is to complete puzzles and avoid traps to advance from level to level. Every level completed will raise your friendship with the different animals of the forest. Once friends, these animals can be used as allies to attack and defeat the hunters encountered along the way.
Following the plot of the movie, once the player has become friends with a sufficient amount of animals, he can then take on the evil hunter leader Shaw.
The gameplay loop is to find clever ways to solve puzzles that prevent you from moving forward in a level. To solve these puzzles, the player can switch between the two main characters : Boog, a 900 pound bear and Elliott, a crazy deer. Both characters have their specific skills which need to be wisely used to progress through the levels. To solve most of the puzzles, Boog and Elliott, each controlled individually and seperately, will have to work as a team.
To complicate the gameplay a bit, the player will encounter hunters on the way which he can defeat "using" the now friendly skunks, beavers, squirrels... which all have their unique skills.
This game is a 2,5D side-scrolling game with an emphasis on spatial puzzles. The story mode contains 27 levels. In addition, there's also eight minigames.

game.name: Operation : Vietnam
game.desc: Operation : Vietnam sur DS est un jeu d'action dans lequel vous dirigez une escouade dont l'hélicoptère s'est crashé en pleine jungle. Faites la connaissance de quatre hommes, chacun ayant sa spécialité : le doc, le sniper, la tête brûlée et le chef d'escouade. Débrouillez-vous pour mener cette petite troupe saine et sauve à travers la vingtaine de niveaux disponibles. Contrôlez un personnage et donnez quelques ordres à ceux qui vous suivent pour ne pas être piégé par l'ennemi.

game.name: Orcs & Elves
game.desc:
Orcs & Elves is a turn-based role-playing game based on improved DOOM RPG engine. The story follows an elf named Elli who, along with a talking magic wand Ellon, heads to the depths of a devastated dwarven citadel to find out what happened there, battling foes of many kinds, finding mysterious items and meeting various people.
The game uses a first person perspective and dungeons are grid-based, similar to the Dungeon Master and Eye of the Beholder series; the player can only move between squares, forward, backward, strafe left or right, turn in 90 degree increments. Enemies and dungeon features are drawn with sprite graphics. There are some 3D objects in the dungeons as well, and the game employs some 3D camera movements in the cutscenes. The dungeons mostly consist of one level, though it is possible to move between different parts of the dungeons and revisit the previous dungeons as necessary.

game.name: Original Frisbee Disc Sports : Ultimate & Golf
game.desc: This title combines two different types of gameplay involving frisbees. Golf plays like a regular golf game, except without the sticks or balls. Instead the player goes through a course of eighteen holes to get the frisbee in the hole in as little throws

game.name: Oui-Oui : Grande Fête au Pays des Jouets
game.desc: Oui-Oui: Grande Fête au Pays des Jouets sur Nintendo DS est un logiciel ludo-éducatif à destination des plus jeunes. Prenant pour décor l'univers merveilleux de Oui-Oui, le soft comprend une quinzaine d'activités disponibles en plusieurs niveaux de difficulté pour éveiller la curiosité mais aussi insister sur les bases de l'apprentissage de la lecture.

game.name: Our House
game.desc: Our House sur DS est un party-game dans lequel vous décorez votre maison selon vos propres goûts. Arrangez votre intérieur pour briller en société et frimer auprès de vos voisins. En multijoueur, vous et vos amis devrez vous mettre de concert pour acheter et installer les meilleurs objets dans une maison commune. Grâce au stylet, vous pourrez planter des clous, scier des planches et même peindre les murs. Un rêve pour les flemmards du bricolage.

game.name: Over the Hedge
game.desc:
A portable adventure game based on the animated movie of the same name and which chronicled the adventures of a group of animals in their struggle against a recently-built housing development.
Playing as either RJ, Hammy or Verne you'll have to complete several incursions into the human dwellings to steal food, supplies and sabotage further housing developments.
Gameplay-wise the game is a 3rd-person perspective stealth-adventure hybrid in which you must navigate through several houses looking to retrieve your current objective while avoiding the many traps set by the homeowners (as well as the homeowners themselves). To get by you can make use of several unique items that allow you to set up diversions, or create them yourself by blowing into the microphone. Each character has individual strengths and weaknesses and in many missions you'll have to alternate between each character to successfully complete the level.
As a unique feature the game displays the standard 3rd person perspective on the top screen while the lower screen features a top-down view which allows you to better scan the levels for traps and items, both rendered with fully polygonal graphics.
Features a single player campaign and a wireless multiplayer mode with a two-player mode in which two players compete to clear out a level of food.

game.name: Pac-Man World 3
game.desc:
Pac-Man is teleported by Orson through 14 different levels to fight Erwin, his army of robots, monsters and Spectral Entities to save the world, Pac-Land and the Spectral Realm. Erwin plans to siphon spectral energy from the Spectral Realm to power his army of robots in order to rule the world. Pac-Man uses punching, Rev Rolls, Butt-Bouncing and various new Power Pellets to defeat Erwin and his minions. Pac-Man also pilots Toc-Man in a battle against Erwins robot army.
Joined by Pac-Mans old enemies, Orson, Clyde and Pinky, and new friends along the way, Pac-Man adventures through different levels from a boneyard of old bots to a burning tower, up mountains, through deserts and the Spectral Realm to destroy all of Erwins Spectral Syphons. In this title, Pac-Man has also been given full speech, voiced by Martin T. Sherman.

game.name: Pac'n Roll
game.desc: Pac-Land has been attacked by the legendary ghost Golvis. With the help of a fairy, Pac-Man must save the world and free his friends. Using the touchscreen, players roll Pac-Man similarly to using a trackball. Guide him through 3D levels collecting pac-do

game.name: Pac-Pix
game.desc:
Pac-Pix originally started as a tech-demo for the Nintendo DS when the DS was first announced. Many people at E3 liked the demo so much that Namco made it a full-fledged game. In this DS exclusive title, Pac-Man has been captured by the ghosts and you must save him. You use the touch-screen to draw Pac-Man and try to eat the ghosts. There are a few different types of ghosts that require a different strategy for each type.
You have Pinky that just moves around slowly and Blue that will make a quick dash as you approach him. There is Numboos which is multiple ghosts with numbers and you must eat them in order if you wish to defeat them. Bari-Boo has a shield and you can only defeat him by attacking from behind, if you hit his shield in front of him or from the side you just bounce off. There's the ink ghosts which throw ink and then there's the block ghosts which require you to break their defenses with a bomb.
During your adventure you will learn to draw arrows to shoot ghosts and stun them, as well as ghosts that are floating in bubbles. You will also be able to draw bombs to destroy blocks that are in your path. There are many things to do with the touch screen in this game. Pac-Pix is a Pac-Man game like no other before it.

game.name: Paint by DS : Classic Masterpieces
game.desc: Paint by DS : Classic Masterpieces est un jeu de peinture sur Nintendo DS. Utilisez votre stylet pour tenter de reproduire les plus grands chefs-d'oeuvre de la peinture. De nombreux outils sont disponibles pour peaufiner votre oeuvre : crayon, aquarelle, peinture à l'huile, gomme, spray...

game.name: Paint by DS : Military Vehicles
game.desc: Paint by DS : Military Vehicles sur la portable de Nintendo est un jeu qui transforme votre stylet en pinceau et vous fait repeindre des modèles militaires allant du char d'assaut à l'avion de chasse. Utilisez votre instrument pour mélanger les couleurs et reproduisez une quinzaine de modèles différents. Complétez des mini-jeux pour obtenir de nouveaux pinceaux, papiers, couleurs et faites preuve de talent car vos dessins sont jugés une fois achevés.

game.name: Paint by DS
game.desc: Paint by DS sur la portable de Nintendo est un jeu qui transforme votre stylet en pinceau et vous fait repeindre les toiles des plus grands artistes. Utilisez votre instrument pour mélanger les couleurs et reproduisez 15 grands tableaux. Complétez des mini-jeux pour obtenir de nouveaux pinceaux, papiers, couleurs et faites preuve de talent car vos dessins sont jugés une fois achevés.

game.name: Pang : Magical Michael
game.desc: Pang : Magical Michael sur DS est une nouvelle version du mythique jeu d'arcade Pang. A travers une pléthore de modes de jeu, le magicien Michael doit éviter et éclater l'intégralité des bulles d'un niveau. Un mode deux joueurs permet de disputer des batailles contre un ami ou un adversaire virtuel.

game.name: Panzer Tactics DS
game.desc:
This turn-based WWII strategy game includes three campaigns involving the German Wehrmacht, the Red Army and the Western Allies. Players direct their troops, historically accurate tanks, artillery, naval, and aviation units, to engage enemy units, capture cities, and establish supply lines. Hex-maps cover terrain ranging from the deserts of North Africa to the frozen Russian tundra.
In addition to three single-player campaigns, Panzer Tactics DS also has multiplayer support.

game.name: Party Carnival
game.desc: Party Carnival est un party game sur Nintendo DS. Ce sont au total 38 mini-jeux qui vous attendent. Dans le lot, on trouve le chifoumi (pierre/papier/ciseaux), le taquin (reconstituer une image en poussant des cases), ou encore le memory (retenir une séquence de boutons la plus longue possible). Un mode multi vous permet de vous affronter entre amis, jusqu'à 4 joueurs.

game.name: Paws & Claws - Best Friends - Dogs & Cats
Paws & Claws: Pet Vet: Australian Adventures
Peggle : Dual Shot
game.desc: Peggle : Dual Shot est un puzzle-game sur DS qui combine des éléments de flipper, de pachinko (jeu japonais entre le flipper et la machine à sous) et de billard. Le joueur projette une boule d'argent depuis le haut de l'écran et doit faire en sorte qu'elle ricoche sur des "pegs" oranges. Ces derniers doivent tous être allumés avant qu'il n'y ait plus de boules disponibles. Dix power-ups peuvent être débloqués. Cette version DS contient des niveaux inédits.

game.path: ./Percy Jackson and the Olympians - The Lightning Thief (USA) (En,Fr).zip
game.name: Percy Jackson and the Olympians - The Lightning Thief
game.desc: Percy Jackson : Le Voleur de Foudre est un jeu de rôle sur Nintendo DS. On y retrouve Percy Jackson et tous ses amis qui vont devoir affronter des monstres mythologiques ainsi que Zeus lui-même. Pour cela, vous devrez utiliser vos pouvoirs et autres capacités pour venir à bout de vos ennemis lors de combats au tour par tour.

game.name: Petz - Dogz 2
game.desc:
Dogz 2 is the sequel to the Nintendo DS Dogz, a title of the Nintendo DS Petz series.
Differently to the traditional pet games, the focus of Dogz 2 is in the 18 mini-games, seven of which are card games that can be played in multiplayer, like blackjack and memory games, which will give the player goodies, like furniture and toys and costumes for the dogs and even more rooms of the house, after completed or won. There are 11 different breeds (like dalmatian, beagle or poodle) to choose from this time and 250 different items to fill the house with.
There is no pet caring in Dogz 2, but there is still plenty of interaction with them. Many of the collectibles may produce a reaction on the dogs. The player can also make his/her puppies to wear costumes and even give them 14 different oral orders through the microphone of the DS.

game.name: Petz - Hamsterz Superstarz
game.desc: Petz : Hamsterz Superstarz sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de simulation qui vous permettra de faire de vos amis rongeurs de véritables stars. En prenant soin d'eux, vous découvrirez leur personnalité et leur proposerez des activités spécifiques afin de révéler leurs talents cachés. Une option wi-fi pour partager les exploits de votre boule de poils est également disponible.

game.name: Petz - Pony Beauty Pageant
game.desc: Petz : Pony Beauty Pageant est une simulation sur Nintendo DS. Destiné au jeune public, ce soft vous propose de vous glisser dans la peau d'un palefrenier et de vivre quotidiennement au contact des poneys. Votre objectif est de prendre soin de jolis poneys et de les faire beaux afin qu'ils soient dignes de participer à la grande parade. Vous devrez aussi gérer votre poney club tout en vous liant d'amitié avec le personnel.

game.name: Petz : Dogz Talent Show
game.desc: Petz : Dogz Talent Show sur Nintendo DS est une simulation dans laquelle vous devrez faire de vos chiens de véritables superstars. Au fur et à mesure que vous prendrez soin d'eux, vous découvrirez leur personnalité et leur proposerez des activités spécifiques qui révéleront leurs talents cachés. Parmi ces activités, vous trouverez le skateboard, la course d'obstacles ou encore le Frisbee.

game.name: Petz : Wild Animals : Tigerz
game.desc: Dans Petz : Wild Animals : Tigerz sur DS, vous jouez le rôle de Enzo et Ana, deux enfants d'une famille de dresseurs, qui reçoivent de leur grand-père deux jeunes tigres. Outre les tâches habituelles que comprend la série (nourrir l'animal, prendre soin de lui, le baigner, etc.), le titre ajoute les numéros de dressage. Vous pouvez donc apprendre différents tours avec votre compagnon et aider d'autres dresseurs éparpillés autour du monde.

game.name: Petz: Catz 2
game.desc: Dans Catz 2 sur DS, vous avez l'opportunité de choisir un petit chat que vous pouvez soigneusement choisir en le personnalisant. Prenez soin de lui, soyez attentif à ses besoins et regardez-le s'épanouir. Grâce à l'appareil photo, vous pouvez immortaliser les moments passés avec lui.

game.name: Petz: Nursery
game.desc: Petz : Nursery sur Nintendo DS est une simulation dans laquelle vous devrez prendre soin d'animaux nouveau-nés comme par exemple des chiens, des ours polaires, des pandas ou encore des tigres. Votre objectif est de les aider à devenir grands et forts. Pour ce faire, il vous faudra leur donner du lait, les laver, les tenir au chaud et les amener à cohabiter et à jouer ensemble. Vous pourrez même leur chanter une chanson le soir pour les endormir.

game.desc: Real Stories : Cheval Academy sur DS fait partie d'une gamme de jeux permettant de faire vivre nombre d'aventures et d'expériences à toutes les filles. C'est ici en compagnie de plus beaux chevaux que le jeu va emmener les joueuses -et les joueurs-, pour remplir de nombreuses épreuves (brosser votre bête, la chevaucher dans différents environnements, etc).

game.name: Pferdefreunde Puzzle : Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs
Phineas and Ferb - Across the 2nd Dimension
game.desc: Phineas et Ferb : Voyage dans la Deuxième Dimension est un jeu de plates-formes sur DS inspiré par la série animée du même nom. Destiné aux jeunes joueurs, il mélange plates-formes, action et mini-jeux dans un univers coloré en 2D.

game.name: Phineas and Ferb : Ride Again
game.desc: Phineas and Ferb : Ride Again est un jeu de plates-formes/action sur Nintendo DS. En plus de l'aventure solo, on y trouve une douzaine de mini-jeux et la possibilité de construire ses propres pistes de skateboard.

game.name: Phineas and Ferb
game.desc: Phinéas et Ferb est un jeu d'action/aventure sur DS, inspiré par la série d'animation du même nom. Les deux frères bricoleurs doivent parcourir des niveaux à la recherche de pièces détachées afin de construire diverses attractions comme des montagnes russes. Cela passe par l'accomplissement de plusieurs mini-jeux. Dans leur quête, ils devront prendre garde à Candice, qui passe son temps à les surveiller.

game.path: ./Phoenix Wright - Ace Attorney - Justice for All (USA).zip
game.name: Phoenix Wright - Ace Attorney - Justice for All
game.desc: Phoenix Wright : Ace Attorney : Justice for All vous remet dans la peau de Phoenix Wright, avocat de la défense spécialisé dans les causes perdues. Ce titre orienté aventure sur DS est le deuxième volet de la série sur la console portable de Nintendo. Visiblement indépendantes, les quatre affaires proposées pourraient avoir un lien commun...

game.desc: Phoenix Wright returns in the third game in the Ace Attorney series. However, Phoenix is not the only lawyer that you'll be guiding, as you dig through the evidence to find the truth to free your clients. Players will tackle five new cases as they encoun
