game.name: Real Crimes : Jack the Ripper
game.desc: Real Crimes : Jack the Ripper est un jeu de réflexion et d'objets cachés disponible sur Nintendo DS. Au coeur d'une cité londonienne plongée dans la terreur, vous devrez résoudre les énigmes auxquelles vous serez confronté pour mettre un terme aux atrocités du fameux Eventreur.

game.name: Real Crimes : The Unicorn Killer
game.desc: Real Crimes: The Unicorn Killer sur DS est un jeu de recherche d'objets cachés. Basé sur une histoire vraie, celui-ci propose de traquer Ira Einhorn, ancien militant pour la paix condamné pour le meurtre de sa petite amie. Le joueur incarne Jennifer Lourdes, détective qui doit rechercher et appréhender l'assassin en cavale en Europe. Celle-ci est doit mener l'enquête afin de trouver des preuves et objets en tous genres menant au tueur.

game.name: Real Soccer 2008
game.desc: Real Football 2008 sur DS est une simulation footballistique sur DS. Retrouvez plus de 70 équipes nationales, une grande sélection de championnats dont l'Allemagne, l'Angleterre, la France, l'Espagne ainsi qu'une vingtaine d'autres. Un mode multijoueur permet de jouer jusqu'à quatre joueurs à condition toutefois que chacun possède sa cartouche.

game.name: Real Soccer 2009
game.desc: Real Football 2009 sur DS est une simulation footballistique qui comprend plus de 200 clubs et équipes et permet de jouer 5 grands championnats européens et de nombreuses coupes continentales et internationales. Le joueur contrôle ses poulains à l'aide de la croix directionnelle de la console mais peut dessiner des gestes techniques sur l'écran tactile pour enchaîner les dribbles. Enfin, la cartouche propose un mode multijoueur en multi-cartes où 4 utilisateurs peuvent s'affronter.

game.name: Real Stories - Passion 4 Fashion
game.desc: Real Stories : Fashionshop sur Nintendo DS transforme la joueuse en patronne de boutique fashion à New-York. Il faudra relooker les demoiselles en quête de la tenue ultime pour leurs soirées mondaines. Vous pourrez décider de leur look en piochant parmi 1600 vêtements et accessoires, et trouver la coiffure, le maquillage et la manucure appropriée.

game.name: Real Stories : My Baby World
game.desc: Real Stories : Babies sur DS met la joueuse dans la peau d'une apprentie nounou qui devoir s'occuper de huit petits chérubins en veillant à ce qu'ils ne manquent de rien, qu'ils restent propres et qu'ils aient moult calins. Il faudra chanter une berceuse ou encore donner un bain. Les parents satisfaits offriront des objets pour décorer la crèche.

game.name: Real Time Conflict : Shogun Empires
game.desc: Real Time Conflict : Shogun Empires sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de stratégie se déroulant dans le Japon médiéval. Vous dirigez des unités pour des combats de masse. L'écran du haut sert à vous montrer le résultat des actions que vous effectuez avec votre stylet grâce à un système d'icônes visibles dans l'écran du bas. Les prises de forteresses succèdent aux combats navals et de petits duels sont aussi de la partie.

game.name: Red Bull BC One
game.desc:
Red Bull BC One is a Nintendo DS game based on a break dancing competition with the same name. It's a mix of a rhythm action game and a puzzle game where players get to compete against different break dancers from around the world.
Before starting the game players gets to design their own dancer. This is done in the dressing room where the players can customize their characters in different categories. It's possible to choose different body styles, hairstyles and clothing. Playing the career mode will let players unlock more clothing that their character can use.
The actual gameplay consists of performing different dance moves. These moves are shown on the top screen and are done by playing a simple connect the dots puzzle game on the lower screen. Dots of different colour are shown across the screen and the player has to create shapes by connecting at least three dots of the same colour using the stylus. For each turn the player need to create as many shapes as possible before the time runs out. There is also special star shaped dots. If these are included in a shape the player will perform special moves and gain more points. It's also possible to create perfects, which is the largest possible shape of the turn. By creating multiple perfects the player will gain multipliers that will multiply the overall score.
There's a couple of game modes. The main one is the career mode where players get to battle against different b-boys with the goal to reach the final of the Red Bull BC One competition. There's also the free mode where players can improve their scores of a specific battle. The game also has a multiplayer mode where players can compete against friends in a one-on-one battle via multi card play.

game.name: Resident Evil - Deadly Silence
game.desc: Take the core story and gameplay of the original Resident Evil in all its blood soaked glory, and add a touch screen twist. That's Deadly Silence, a new and updated version of the original horror title.The story is much the same as the entire Resident Evi

game.name: Retro Arcade Toppers
game.desc: Retro Arcade Toppers est une compilation de jeux arcade sur Nintendo DS. Vous avez le choix entre un casse-briques, un puzzle-game et un shoot'em up pour tenter d'établir les plus gros high-scores.

game.name: Retro Atari Classics
game.desc: A collection of 10 old Atari games updated for the DS: Asteroids, Breakout, Centipede, Gravitar, Lunar Lander, Missile Command, Pong, Sprint, Tempest, and Warlords. The games have been updated for control with a touchscreen (though the D-pad is usually also available), optional new graphics, and networked play for Pong, Sprint, and Warlords.

game.name: Retro Game Challenge
game.desc:
Arino wants to be the greatest gamer in the world, but he's continually defeated by his friends at every new game that comes out. His obsession has spawned a digital version himself within his own Nintendo DS. This digital version of himself has come to be known as "Game Master Arino", who haunts gamers around the world with retro game challenges. You have been chosen by Game Master Arino, and are now trapped in the 1980s until you can defeat his game challenges.
Retro Game Challenge, based on the Japanese TV show Game Center CX, has you playing faithfully-recreated clones of popular NES-era games, attempting to complete challenges and freeing yourself from Game Master Arino. You are accompanied by Arino himself as a young lad, who will cheer you on as you're playing each game. You can also read the latest gaming mags for tips, cheats, and previews of upcoming titles.
There are eight games total, each modeled after 8-bit classics such as Galaga (Cosmic Gate), Dragon Warrior (Gaudia Quest), and Ninja Jajamaru-kun (Robot Ninja Haggle Man). Each game has multiple challenges from Arino to complete, such as clearing a certain stage or earning a set number of points, and can also be played in a free play mode once all challenges have been cleared.

game.name: Rhapsody - A Musical Adventure
game.desc: This is a remake of the original PSone game. While this version still sports the same storyline it features new additions and tweaks to the gameplay to suit the DS.The player uses the D-pad or the stylus to move their character and using the "X" button t

game.name: Rhythm Heaven
game.desc:
Get ready to feel the rhythm! Rhythm Heaven is a game based entirely around musical rhythm and timing. The game is a collection of games based around a song, where the player must perform actions in time to the music to successfully complete the game. All games are based around the simple motions of tapping, sliding and flicking the stylus.
As each game varies from each other, at the start of each game, you're given a brief tutorial to get the hang of how the game you'll be playing works. Tasks for games include (but are not limited to) flicking to construct machinery, releasing the stylus at the right time to belt out a loud note, sliding to rub a lizard's tail in time to a mating dance beat, tapping to gulp down dumplings, tapping and flicking to harvest vegetables and get rid of moles, and more. After every four games, a special "remix" game appears, which combines the previous games into a hectic mix, where you never know what will be up next.

game.name: Rhythm 'N Notes
game.desc: Rhythm'N Notes sur DS est un petit titre qui propose un apprentissage musical simplifié à base de mini-jeux. Apprendre à reconnaître des notes puis des accords en les écoutant, maîtriser le sens du rythme, voilà le programme qu'on nous propose à travers de multiples exercices qui se dérouleront sur des percussions et un piano virtuels.

game.name: Ridge Racer DS
game.desc:
Ridge Racer DS is a remake of Ridge Racer 64 with some changes and additions. All the same levels are there, but there are plenty of new cars, including Namco- and Nintendo-themed vehicles. There is also some new music that was not in the N64 version.
The Touch Screen on the Nintendo DS is put to use all throughout the game, including navigation through every menu and even a revolutionary new control where the player steers the steering wheel with the stylus or thumb ring.
Another addition to the game is the use of the Nintendo DS's Wi-Fi capabilities. Using wireless communication, up to 6 players can race against each other. In fact, up to 6 players can play with a Game Card in only one of the systems. The other 5 players don't even need the game. There will be more items, such as cars, available to play with if all of the systems have a Ridge Racer DS Game Card in though. So there is an advantage to having multiple Game Cards.

game.name: Rio
game.desc: Rio sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de rythme utilisant l'écran tactile. Il est inspiré du film du même nom qui raconte l'histoire de Blu, le dernier perroquet de son espèce, qui décide de quitter le Minnesota pour s'aventurer au coeur du Brésil, à Rio de Janeiro.

game.name: Rise of the Guardians
game.desc: Adapté du film d'animation du même nom, le titre vous propose d'emmener les héros dans leur quête pour retrouver la foi des enfants face au vil Pitch. On gagne de nouvelles techniques en montant de niveau.

game.name: River King: Mystic Valley
game.desc: Dans Harvest Fishing sur DS, le joueur partira à la recherche du Roi de la Rivière, seule personne capable de tirer la soeur du héros du sommeil profond dans lequel elle est plongée. A travers plusieurs tournois, ce jeu de pêche scénarisée met à profit les capacités de la console portable dont l'écran tactile pour pêcher et la connexion Wi-Fi pour jouer à plusieurs.

game.name: Robocalypse
game.desc: Robocalypse sur DS est un tower defense, c'est-à-dire un jeu de stratégie dans lequel il faut défendre une base contre des vagues successives d'ennemis. L'histoire met en scène une guerre entre deux clans de robots, qui s'affrontent au moyen d'une pléthore d'armes et de compétences évolutives. Une campagne solo et un mode multijoueur à 4 sont disponibles.

game.name: Robots
game.desc:
Based on the Blue Sky film (distributed by Fox) of the same name, Robots takes players on an adventure to save Robot city. When Rodney Copperbottom travels to Robot City to meet Big Weld, the famous inventor, he finds that something is wrong. Big Weld is missing and the evil Ratchet has taken over Big Weld Industries. With the help of his friends the Rusties, Rodney puts an end to Ratchet's villainous ways and restores order to the city.
Robots uses a unique perspective that combines 2D side-scrolling with 3D views. The game takes the player to locations from the movie like Robot City, Big Weld's Mansion, the Outmode, and Madame Gasket's Chop Shop. Using the invention mode, players build and upgrade Rodney's weapons including the wrench, scrap gun, electro zapper, and magno grenade. With a combination of navigation, jumping, and combat skills, players can make their way though the world of Robots and bring an end to Ratchet's tyranny.
In addition to the main story line, players will find robots in need all over the city. The parts these poor robots are missing can be found hidden in the numerous maps and returning the correct part rewards the player with power-ups and weapon upgrades. All of the maps are interconnected, so players can easily find their way back to a previous area to uncover additional secrets.The maps are connected with a transit ball mini-game, just like the transit system in the movie.
The DS version of the game features a map that can be annotated by the player, a unique 3D version of the transit ball game that utilizes the stylus for control, and 3D menus. In addition to the new features, the DS also includes high resolution maps that include more detail than the GBA version.

game.name: Rock Band 3
game.desc: Rock Band 3 sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de rythme qui vous invite à créer votre propre groupe et à interpréter différents morceaux. En sautant d'une piste à l'autre, le joueur peut suivre les pistes des différents instruments ou joindre une partie multijoueur dans laquelle chacun choisira son arme.

game.name: Rock Revolution
game.desc:
Like the console versions, Rock Revolution for the DS simulates the various instruments of a band. Songs can be played using a guitar (strum on the touch screen), bass (pluck the right string at the right time), drums (tap the right drum at the right time), and vocals (sing into the DS's microphone). Each of the 20 tracks can be played with any instrument.
Included is a Rock School, which is a tutorial for the four instruments, a free play mode, a media player, a multiplayer mode, allowing either competitive or cooperative play, and a career mode. The career mode starts you with no money and a garage band. Earn money by playing in gigs, and spend it on better equipment. Some gigs have special rules, like concerts which play two songs in a row.

game.name: Rockin' Pretty
game.desc: Rockin' Pretty est un jeu musical sur Nintendo DS. Le titre propose 4 instruments différents (guitare, basse, clavier et batterie) et vous vous servez du stylet pour pratiquer chacun d'eux. Dans les niveaux, vous récupérez des étoiles qui vous servent à personnaliser vos instruments et le style de votre personnage.

game.name: Rollin' Rascals
game.desc: Rollin' Rascals est un puzzle-game sur DS qui vous demande de réunir des animaux identiques deux par deux. Avec le stylet, vous pouvez faire rouler des pandas, des cochons ou encore des chiens sur l'écran tactile, votre objectif étant de les rassembler par paire. 4 modes de jeux et plusieurs niveaux de difficulté différents permettent de prolonger la durée de vie.

game.name: Rondo of Swords
game.desc:
The city of Egvard, capital of Bretwalde, has been overrun during the funeral for the late king. Prince Serdic is killed in the resulting battle, but not before he gives his legendary sword to his body double. Now, "Prince Serdic" and his followers must retake the kingdom.
The battles in Rondo of Swords use the unusual Route Maneuver System. Instead of walking up to an enemy and attacking, instead you will run through enemies to attack. This adds tactical considerations; you can easily attack multiple enemies in a turn, you can run through allies to get bonuses to your attack, and you can attack from the sides or behind to get an advantage.

game.name: Roogoo Attack!
game.desc: Roogoo sur DS est un jeu de réflexion dans lequel le but est de sauver une planète en évitant que des météorites ne s'écrasent dessus. Pour cela il faut les guider et les faire passer à travers les formes géométriques correspondantes. Bien sûr des ennemis viennent s'interposer tandis que la cadence des météorites s'accélère.

game.name: Rooms : The Main Building
game.desc: Rooms : The Main Building sur DS est un jeu de réflexion dans lequel vous devez sortir de pièces dans lesquelles vous êtes enfermé en faisant coulisser les salles à la manière d'un taquin. Le joueur doit se servir des objets mis à sa disposition pour passer d'une salle à l'autre jusqu'à la sortie. A noter qu'il est possible créer ses propres niveaux et de les échanger avec d'autres joueurs.

game.name: Rubik's World
game.desc: Basée sur le Rubik's Cube, la série de challenges de Rubik's Puzzle World vous fera bien cogiter devant votre DS. Les défis sont de niveaux variables et conviennent à toute la famille. L'option Wi-fi de la console permet de se connecter à une communauté de joueurs pour échanger avec eux.

game.name: Runaway : A Twist of Fate
game.desc: Runaway : A Twist of Fate sur DS constitue le troisième chapitre des aventures de Brian Basco et Gina Timmins. Ce célèbre jeu d'aventure en point'n click se base sur des décors façon dessin animé, des personnages atypiques et des dialogues amusants. Cet épisode ne constitue pas la suite du deuxième volet mais bien une histoire à part, sans pour autant négliger les clins d'oeil et références aux opus précédents.

game.name: Runaway : The Dream of the Turtle
game.desc: At the end of Runaway Brian and Gina finally had the time to be together on a tropical island called Mala, but the good times don't last long. One day they decide to go on a trip and fly over the island in a plane. Everything goes well until the engines s

game.name: Rune Factory - A Fantasy Harvest Moon
game.desc: As a wanderer in a town called Kardia, you are discovered by a mysterious girl named "Mist". She, seeing potential in your skills, offers you a house to live in as long a you work and maintain the farmland.As in other "Harvest Moon" titles, you grow and m

game.name: Rune Factory 2 - A Fantasy Harvest Moon
game.desc: Dans Rune Factory 2 : A Fantasy Harvest Moon, vous incarnez un jeune garçon qui a perdu la mémoire et qui se trouve recueilli par Mist, une fermière qui lui offre le gîte et le couvert contre son aide pour les travaux agricoles. Le héros développe ses capacités dans la capture et l'élevage d'animaux. Mais cette vie ne semble guère lui convenir. Et si sa destinée était ailleurs ?

game.name: Rune Factory 3 : A Fantasy Harvest Moon
game.desc: Rune Factory 3 : A Fantasy Harvest Moon sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de rôle qui reprend le concept lancé par le premier épisode de la série. Le jeu se déroule dans un univers heroïc-fantasy et vous pourrez toujours vous occuper de votre exploitation agricole ainsi que vous adonner aux plaisirs de la pêche et du combat. Mais cette fois-ci, votre héros pourra se transformer en monstre que vous combattez d'habitude, grâce à une mystérieuse ceinture magique.

game.name: Safecracker - The Ultimate Puzzle Challenge
game.desc: Safecracker sur DS est un jeu de réflexion dont l'objectif est de percer des codes de coffres-forts. Vous êtes engagé par une famille richissime pour retrouver un testament dans une magnifique villa. Récemment décédé, le patriarche à l'étrange sens de l'humour a rangé le document dans l'un des 35 coffres de la propriété. Ouvrez-les un par un jusqu'à la découverte du précieux sésame.

game.name: Sally's Salon
game.desc:
Sally dreams of opening her own beauty salon and it's up to the player to help her. Sally begins with a small shop in the local mall and when that is successful, she branches out to open more franchises in other areas.
Sally's Salon is a time management game where customers file in through the door desiring a variety of beautification services. These include hair washing, coloring, cutting, styling, drying, and eyebrow styling. Customers indicate what service they want next with a pictorial balloon above their heads. The player must guide them to the appropriate station in the salon and service the customer. The customers must have their needs met in a timely manner or else their satisfaction meters (measured in hearts) will decrease along with prospective tips. Customers will eventually leave if they are dissatisfied enough.
Between days at the beauty shop, Sally can use her profits to purchase upgrades for the beauty shop such as more stations, faster equipment, and waiting area amenities for keeping the customers patient. Sally can also hire assistants to staff various stations, thereby lessening her own burden.

game.path: ./Samantha Swift and the Hidden Roses of Athena (USA).zip
game.name: Samantha Swift and the Hidden Roses of Athena
game.marquee: ./wheel/Samantha Swift and the Hidden Roses of Athena (USA).png
game.image: ./boxart/Samantha Swift and the Hidden Roses of Athena (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Samantha Swift and the Hidden Roses of Athena (USA).mp4

game.name: Sands of Destruction
game.desc: Master storyteller Masato Kato of Chrono Cross fame and renowned composer Yasunori Mitsuda of the epic Chrono and Xeno franchises brings a new "classic" role-playing adventure to the Nintendo DS. In a world surrounded by a sea of sand, the fate of the world lies in the hands of a small band of warriors known as the World Annihilation Front. Play as Kyrie and venture through oceans of sand with Morte, a mysterious girl crusading for the World Annihilation Front on a rebellious mission with her troop of recruits. Fight colossal monsters, battle tyrannical beastmen, and ultimately... discover that Kyrie holds the key to world destruction. The future of the world now lies in your hands.

game.name: Santa Claus is Comin' to Town
Sarah - Keeper of the Unicorn
game.desc: La Licorne Magique sur DS est un jeu d'aventure dans lequel vous incarnez une jeune fille devant rassembler des éclats de cristaux afin de repousser les forces du mal. Il lui faut également s'occuper de la ferme léguée par son oncle mais aussi d'une licorne trouvée devant chez elle. Gérez les tâches fermières, prenez soin du cheval à corne, apprenez des sorts, explorez quatre mondes pour trouver les pierres précieuses et rétablissez l'ordre dans le pays de Sarah.

game.name: Satisfashion - Rock the Runway
game.desc: Satisfashion : Rock the Runaway sur Nintendo DS vous permet de prendre la tête de la maison Satisfashion Design et ainsi de devenir le véritable leader du monde de la mode. Vêtements, maquillage, choisissez les styles de demain.

game.name: SBK : Snowboard Kids
game.desc: Si l'appel des cimes se fait trop fort mais que la montagne est trop loin, saisissez votre DS et lancez SBK : Snowboard Kids. Choisissez votre personnage : Koyuki, Brad, Slash et les autres vous attendent de pied ferme et ils ne sont pas venus en touriste : décharges électriques, mines, bazookas et somnifères : tous les moyens sont bons pour être le meilleur !

game.name: Scene It Twilight
game.desc: Scene It ? Twilight sur Nintendo DS est un quiz cinématographique qui regroupe des centaines de questions portant sur les films de Catherine Hardwicke. Attendez-vous aussi à décortiquer des extraits vidéo de la série Twilight et à reconstituer des puzzles basés sur des images des films.

game.name: Science Papa
game.desc: Science Papa est un jeu éducatif sur DS proposant de réaliser une trentaine d'expériences scientifiques sous l'oeil attentif et avisé d'un professeur. Plusieurs modes de jeu permettent d'apprendre la science en s'amusant avec même un mode multijoueur pour défier un ami.

game.name: Scooby-Doo! : Who's Watching Who
game.desc: Scooby-Doo! : Qui Regarde Qui ? sur DS est un jeu d'action/plates-formes dans lequel vous incarnez la fameuse bande Mystère & Cie. Vous faites la une lors du prime time de l'émission Télé Mystère, qui traite de la chasse aux fantômes. Mais lorsque l'équipe rivale EPN remet en cause vos techniques parfois peu orthodoxes pour attraper les spectres, le concours du groupe qui va en attraper le plus commence.

game.name: Scooby-Doo!: Unmasked
game.desc: Dans le jeu de plates-formes Scooby-Doo! : Démasqué sur Nintendo DS, Jed, le cousin de Fred, a disparu. Ses Animatronics sont devenus incontrôlables et attaquent tout sur leur passage. Scooby-Doo et sa célèbre équipe partent à sa recherche et vont tenter d'élucider cette mystérieuse disparition.

game.name: Scribblenauts
game.desc:
Scribblenauts is a side-scrolling action game based on puzzles. The goal is to have the character Maxwell overcome obstacles by summoning objects based on a dictionary of more than 20.000 words, partly based on the concept of the real-life game Mad Libs. This is done by writing an object's name on the touchscreen, letter by letter. When the word is recognized, the object spawns in the world, where it can be manipulated or act on its own. This leads to an endless amount of possibilities to progress through the game. For instance, when an item needs to be retrieved from a tree, you could summon a ladder to get it out, a football to hit it, or just a helicopter or an albatross to fly over there. There are also more bizarre examples, such as summoning a time machine, going back in time to fetch a dinosaur egg, make it hatch and then use it in the future to defeat an army of robot zombies. The list also includes weapons, historical people, and even references to popular cultures and internet memes. Profanity and trademarked objects are not recognized. There is also a spelling checker included to offer suggestions.
This game is a logical sequel to the gameplay mechanics of Drawn to Life, an earlier title by 5TH Cell, relying on the same concept of emergent gameplay, where the actual game is more of a toolbox, shaped through the player's interaction and different in each session. During the game Maxwell needs to collect starites. To do this, two to four objects are often summoned at the same time. There are general, slow puzzle levels, but also faster action levels filled with enemies, platforms, switches and traps. Often, the summoned objects and characters need to interact with each other. Players can earn "merits" for not using weapons in a level for instance and finding a more creative approach. When a level is completed, a silver star is awarded and the Free Play mode for the level is unlocked. When the level is then completed three more times, using a different approach each time, a gold star is provided.
By solving puzzles, Ollars are awarded, the game's currency. It can be exchanged for different avatars or visual changes. The game includes a level editor and support for Wi-Fi to share the levels. The existing levels can also be edited and the way certain summoned objects interact with each other can also be modified.

game.name: Scripps Spelling Bee
game.desc: Scripps Spelling Bee est l'adaptation sur DS d'un concours d'orthographe qui se tient aux États-Unis. Épelez correctement les mots pour remporter la partie dans les différents modes de jeu.

game.name: Scurge - Hive
game.desc: Scurge Hive sur DS est un jeu d'action dans lequel vous incarnez la chasseuse de prime Jénosa Arma, envoyée pour enquêter sur l'émission de détresse d'un laboratoire étudiant un organisme terriblement virulent, le "Scurge". Armée de gants à projectiles top-secrets et d'une combinaison de combat, elle doit affronter plus de 50 sortes de créatures pour sauvegarder la technologie et empêcher le "Scurge" de se répandre.

game.name: Sea Monsters : A Prehistoric Adventure
game.desc: Sea Monsters is based on the National Geographic CGI documentary of the same name, where earth's underwater world from millions of years ago is portrayed as a dangerous environment with different kinds of predators keeping the ecosystem intact.Players tak

game.name: Secret Files : Tunguska
game.desc: Nina Kalenkow, a beautiful woman living in Berlin, Germany, reaches her father's workplace at the Museum one night just to find out he has disappeared without a trace. After finding out the carelessness of the police department about the case, she then de

game.name: Secret Files 2 : Puritas Cordis
game.desc: Secret Files 2 : Puritas Cordis est la suite directe de l'aventure point'n click Secret Files : Tungunska sur DS. Nous retrouvons l'héroïne Nina ainsi que Max qui enquêtent cette fois sur un prophète annonçant la fin des temps et sur des catastrophes naturelles survenant un peu partout dans le monde. Intrigues croisées, énigmes et réflexion sont au rendez-vous.

game.name: Secrets of the Titanic 1912-2012
game.desc: Les Secrets du Titanic 1912 - 2012 est un jeu d'objets cachés disponible sur Nintendo DS. Vous incarnez Eva, une jeune femme faisant une croisière avec sa famille et découvrant un médaillon qui lui permet de voyager dans le temps. A intervalles réguliers, on la retrouve dans la peau d'Elizabeth, sa grand-mère, partie en voyage sur le Titanic.

game.name: Sega Casino
game.desc:
Sega Casino features 11 staple casino games that include Blackjack, Roulette, Craps, Baccarat, and Texas Hold 'Em Poker, as well as 7 Card Stud, Video Poker, Keno, and Chuck a Luck as unlockable games. VIP Rooms for higher betting are also unlockable.
There are three modes - Free Mode, where you can play any of the unlocked games regardless of money, Casino Mode, where you play to win certain amounts of money to unlock games, and Wireless Mode, where up to five players can play single card download over local wi-fi. The controls are fully enabled for touch screen play with the stylus.

game.name: Sega Superstars Tennis
game.desc:
Sega's many franchises come together for a tennis tournament spanning the varied worlds created by them in the last twenty years. Sixteen characters over fifteen different Sega game series are represented, as are ten different courts based on those same franchises.
Exhibition and Tournament modes are included in the game. The first is a simple vs mode, whereas the tournament allows the player to unlock new characters and courts over a series of matches and other challenges, all related to tennis but also drawing heavily on the video game represented. Singles and doubles can be played by either humans or AI, with the player being able to choose his or her doubles partner.
Version differences are notable, as the Wii game misses out on online play in exchange for three different control modes utilising the Wii Remote (much like in Wii Sports tennis, the Wii Remote and nunchuck or the Classic Controller. Online play is included in the 360 and PS3 versions.
Each character has a special move to aid them with their tennis match, relating to the character. For example, Beat from Jet Set Radio has a power that allows the ball to grind against the net and shoot off at a random point, making it difficult to return.
Minigames are included as both one-offs and part of the tournament. These include a Target-hitting game, The House of the Dead zombie killing game (hit moving zombies around a court before the timer runs out), a Space Harrier game, a Puyo Puyo game, a Virtua Cop game and a Samba De Amigo-related game.

game.path: ./123 Sesame Street - Cookie's Counting Carnival - The Videogame (USA).zip
game.name: Sesame Street : Cookie's Counting Carnival
game.marquee: ./wheel/123 Sesame Street - Cookie's Counting Carnival - The Videogame (USA).png

game.name: Sesame Street : Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure
game.marquee: ./wheel/123 Sesame Street - Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure - The Videogame (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/123 Sesame Street - Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure - The Videogame (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/123 Sesame Street - Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure - The Videogame (USA).png

game.name: Shamu's Deep Sea Adventures
game.desc: Shamu's Deep Sea Adventures sur DS est un jeu d'action dans lequel vous incarnez un orque. Affrontez le diabolique Kraken ainsi que Poseidon le terrible dieu de la mer. Battez-vous pour débloquer des pouvoirs spéciaux, provoquez en duel de nombreuses et redoutables créatures sous-marines et explorez la cité de l'Atlantide pour découvrir tous ses secrets.

game.name: Shaun the Sheep : Off His Head
Shaun White Snowboarding
game.desc:
Shaun White Snowboarding is a snowboard racing game. To be able to win, you need to ride the way Shaun White does, meaning you have to score big tricks to gain speed boosts. You can choose up to 6 different characters and a variety of board with specifics statistics
The snowboarder is entirely controlled with the stylus. Move the stylus up to ride faster and precisely control the radius of your turns with the analog touch screen. Once in the air, perform trick by drawing patterns on the touch screen.
The choose your path system let you draw the path you want to ride down. Use it on four different mountains to complete races and challenges.
Pick up decals on the slopes and stick them on your board to finely tune your board.
Play with friends on different sets of events. You can also share and trade the decals you have collected with your friends.

game.name: Shawn Johnson Gymnastics
game.desc: Shawn Johnson Gymnastics est un jeu de sport sur Nintendo DS. Réalisé avec le soutien de la médaillée olympique Shawn Johnson, le soft nous invite à pratiquer la gymnastique à différents niveaux, en amateur ou en professionnel.

game.path: ./Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of Osborne House (USA) (En,Fr,Es).zip
game.name: Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of Osborne House
game.marquee: ./wheel/Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of Osborne House (USA) (En,Fr,Es).png
game.image: ./boxart/Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of Osborne House (USA) (En,Fr,Es).png
game.video: ./snap/Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of Osborne House (USA) (En,Fr,Es).mp4

game.name: Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor
game.desc: Shin Megami Tensei : Devil Survivor est un jeu de rôle tactique sur Nintendo DS. Tokyo est prise d'assaut par une horde de démons mais heureusement la Japan Ground Self-Defense Force a eu le temps de sceller temporairement la ville pour la protéger.Le joueur devra prendre le contrôle de certains démons et se battre régulièrement pour tenter de survivre.

game.name: Shin Megami Tensei : Strange Journey
game.desc: Shin Megami Tensei : Strange Journey est un jeu de rôle sur DS. Dans cet épisode, Atlus revient aux sources du soft, avec une vue subjective pour l'exploration. Le joueur doit aller enquêter sur l'apparition d'une faille spatio-temporelle démoniaque au Pôle Sud. Plus de 300 démons sont disponibles pour cette nouvelle quête, pour des fusions encore plus nombreuses.

game.name: Shorts
game.desc: Shorts sur Nintendo DS est une jeu de plates-formes tiré du film éponyme. Dans une banlieue typique américaine, tout le monde travaille pour Black Box, une entreprise de télécommunication. Mais lorsqu'une pierre multicolore qui exauce les voeux tombe sur la tête d'un jeune garçon, l'aventure peut alors débuter. Le titre permet d'incarner 4 des personnages du film et exploite le stylet de la console en offrant la possibilité de dessiner des plates-formes qui apparaissent à l'écran.

game.name: Showtime Championship Boxing
game.desc:
Named after the television boxing program airing on the US Showtime cable network, this game offers a mix of fourteen heavyweights and welterweights and four arenas to fight in (New York, Las Vegas, Los Angeles and Chicago). Basic moves include upper block, body block, dodging left and right, short punches and powered punches (hook, jab, uppercut, bodyshot). While playing, there are a few parameters to take into account. First there is a health meter that recharges when the boxer dodges hits for some time. Punches need to be thrown strategically, as an energy bar determines the effectiveness. Too many punches deplete the bar and the amount also determines if a boxer will be able to get up when knocked down. A round timer and knockdown lights are also shown. At certain times, a power-up indicator will become available. This allows a boxer to charge a heavy punch, but the opponent will have time to react. When the charging takes too long, the punch is lost.
The different game modes (different for heavyweight and welterweight) include:
1. Single Fights (Quick): fight for only one round until one of the boxers is knocked out.
2. Single Fights (Regular): play for 4, 6, 8, 10 or 12 rounds and choose to decide it by a KO, TKO or by points.
3. Points System: after each round each boxer is awarded points based on performance. At the end of a fight, or after a KO or TKO, the player with the most points wins.
4. Belts: series of three (Amateur), four (Contender) or six (Showtime) fights. Each fight lasts four rounds or three minutes and the aim is to win one of the belts.
5. King of the Ring: one boxer takes on all other boxers in his weight division in one long round.
Additional fighters are unlocked by winning competitions. Most of the modes can also be played with two players through a wireless connection (DS).

game.name: Shrek - Ogres & Dronkeys
game.desc: Shrek : Ogres and Dronkeys sur DS vous emmène dans l'univers de Fort Fort Lointain où vivent l'ogre vert et ses enfants. Incarnez au choix la descendance de Shrek et Fiona ou celle de l'Ane et jouez avec eux. Grâce à votre stylet, emmenez les enfants dans le monde de Shrek, visitez les lieux vus dans les films, participez à des mini-jeux, et apprenez aux petits monstres de nouvelles habiletés pour pouvoir progresser et devenir les nouvelles terreurs du marais.

game.name: Shrek - Super Slam
game.desc: Shrek : SuperSlam sur DS est un jeu de combat reprenant l'univers déluré et déjanté de l'ogre vert. A vous les joies du bourre-pif chaotique avec les personnages emblématiques de la série. Le jeu propose de se castagner avec vingt personnages dans treize arènes différentes.

game.name: Shrek Smash n' Crash Racing
game.desc: Shrek Smash N' Crash Racing has you racing through 12 environments with gameplay similar to Mario Kart, but set in the Shrek universe. Play as one of 12 different characters each with its own unique mount, such as Shrek and a Swamp Beast, Gingy and a Cup Cake Horse and Red Riding Hood and the Wolf. Battle your way around the tracks against 5 opponents with a range of different pick-ups such as pixie dust, ogre strength and swamp gas, both defensive and offensive, to help you fight your way to the lead. The tracks have many dynamic elements, large jumps and forks with multiple routes.

game.name: Shrek the Third
game.desc:
Shrek the Third for Nintendo DS is the only Shrek 3 game that does not follow the movie plot. It makes heavy use of the microphone and touchpad to make a unique gaming experience. You can play as Puss in Boots, Prince Artie, and, of course, Shrek. Player controls are almost entirely touch screen based. Each character has his own special ability, so you need to figure out little puzzles and switch characters in order to continue.
The game features local multiplayer, allowing up to 3 players to play and each control a different character. Multiplayer gameplay is the same as single-player. The game features 3D graphics and lots of VO.

game.name: Sideswiped
game.desc: Sideswiped est un jeu de courses complètement déjanté sur Nintendo DS. Ici, il est à peine question de terminer en tête de la course. L'objectif principal est de causer un maximum de destruction dans les cinq villes traversées (Las Vegas, New York...) et de ruiner les véhicules adverses, afin d'engranger un maximum d'argent.

game.name: Sightseeing Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unter
SimAnimals Africa
game.desc:
SimAnimals Africa was released for Wii and Nintendo DS on October 27, 2009 with these known animals:
African Bush Elephant Lowland Gorilla African Lion Nile Crocodile Black Rhinoceros Thomson's Gazelle Masai Giraffe Plains Zebra Nile Hippopotamus

game.name: SimAnimals
game.desc: In SimAnimals, players can engage with the wild world of animals in their natural surroundings in an immersive and tactile way. In this game you are challenged to engage, touch, move and try to control more than 60 animals as you journey deeper and deeper into the forest. You control an on-screen animated hand that allows you to reach out and touch, pick up and move everything in the game from foxes and bears to trees and flowers. Cohabitate with these animals in their natural surroundings, and based on how you treat them, the animals will come to know and love ? or dislike you! Have fun developing relationships with wild animals and their families, and experience the humor and drama of surviving in the wilderness.

game.name: SimCity - Creator
game.desc:
SimCity Creator for the DS is a continuation of the long-running SimCity series. Build up or destroy your city; you are the mayor, and whatever you say goes. This version features both the classic free-play mode, where there are no goals, and challenge mode, where you control your city from prehistoric times to the future. Each new era adds complexity, easing newcomers into the challenges of leadership, and changes the appearance of the buildings. By completing challenges, you'll unlock new time-periods and buildings for free-play.
Through the DS' wireless feature, you can send your friends pictures of your city, as well as sharing unlocked buildings.

game.name: SimCity DS
game.desc:
SimCity DS brings the classic series to the handheld consoles.
As the Mayor placed in charge of running their own city, players use the touchscreen to build up and run their town, providing commercial, residential and industrial zones, protection against crime and fire, entertainment areas and even airports, highways and railways for the SimCitizens to travel.
Players also have to contend with natural (and unnatural) disasters, the pressures of an ever-expanding city, and of course, public opinion, which can make a job very difficult if things get out of control.
New to this version is the inclusion of wireless communication with other Mayors via a Post Office. Players can send letters to each other, giving a short summary of the state of their city. When players send letters to each other, they earn special monuments for their cities. Additionally, when disaster strikes, the Mayor can take a more hands-on approach in directly rescuing their SimCitizens.

game.name: Six Flags Fun Park
game.desc:
Six Flags Fun Park is an open-world game set in an amusement park. The player can discover the history of the park and unlock new areas by completing quests for NPCs, or the player can simply explore the park and play minigames.
The park adventure gameplay is from a top-down perspective, and the player navigates the character around the park by using the stylus. The minigames have varied themes and controls, frequently incorporating buttons or the touch-screen.
The minigames can also be played in multiplayer mode via local wireless networking.

game.name: Skate it
game.desc: Skate It has Nintendo players riding with the skate pros, owning the best spots in San Vanelona and pulling off the sickest tricks using the popular FlickIt controls. The game unleashes the FlickIt revolution on to the Nintendo platforms, letting gamers use the Nintendo DS stylus to string together their best tricks for the ultimate skate line.

game.name: Slingo Quest
game.desc:
Slingo Quest is a progression of Slingo games; Slingo is a combination of slot machines and Bingo. The player is presented with a Bingo-style card (usually 5x5 squares) and is given a certain number of spins. Each spin triggers 5 wheels to spin, one corresponding to each column. The player then marks off squares on the card if they contain numbers from the spin. Jokers can also show up during spins which allow the player to mark off any square from the column.
Players can get extra points for various feats, such as clearing the entire card. Different cards have different Slingo patterns highlighted in red that are worth extra points if the player marks every square. Sometimes, slots can produce devils that take a percentage of the player's accumulated treasure (though the treasure might be safe if the player has demon protection).
Further, there are bonus rounds to be played against a pirate where a lot of treasure is at stake. The player and the pirate take turns spinning on the same board. Occasionally, a treasure chest pops up which may contain treasure or it may confiscate treasure. The player that discovers the chest has right of first refusal-- they can choose to open it or make the other player open it.
Other rounds present the player with a 7x7 game board, instead of a 5x5 board. Some rounds have 2, 3, or 4 5x5 boards that are played concurrently.

game.name: Smiley World : Island Challenge
game.desc: Smiley World : Island Challenge sur DS est un party-game proposant 14 activités différentes. Abandonné sur une île inconnue, le joueur doit partir explorer les lieux en évitant soigneusement les pièges tendus par des habitants belliqueux. Le jeu intègre des options multijoueurs avec la présence d'un mode Duel.

game.name: SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighters DS
game.desc: SNK vs. Capcom : Card Fighters DS est un jeu de combat de cartes sur Nintendo DS. Le titre se présente sous forme de plus de 300 cartes à collecter. Celles-ci vous permettent de relever les nombreux challenges qui vous attendent dans des affrontements au tour par tour.

game.name: Snood 2: On Vacation
game.desc: The sequel to Snood keeps the gameplay from the original game but takes it to locations around the world. In this puzzle game players need to line up groups of three or more adjacent Snoods to remove them, similar to the Bust-a-move series. They are launc

game.name: So Blonde : Retour sur l'Ile
game.desc: So Blonde : Retour sur l'Ile sur DS est un jeu d'aventure point'n click mettant en scène Sunny, une adolescente de 17 ans échouée sur une île après qu'elle soit tombée d'un bateau de croisière. L'île en question est remplie de corsaires et semble être bloquée au 17ème siècle. Si vous voulez espérer un jour revoir le continent et vos centres commerciaux favoris, il va falloir résoudre des énigmes et accomplir des mini-jeux.

game.name: Sokoban DS
game.desc:
Sokoban DS is a modern take on the classic Soko-Ban, first launched in Japan in 1982. Known as a maze-based transport puzzle game, the player has to move a number of boxes to designated positions on the map. Because of the limited movement possibilities and various obstacles this job requires logic to achieve the goal.
The Sokoban DS version contains a total of 250 levels of varying difficulty and has full usage of DS 3D graphics, that allows free panning and zooming within levels. For begiiners the basic game mechanics are explained in an included tutorial. It also includes an undo/redo function, individual characters and replays.

game.name: SolatoRobo : Red the Hunter
game.desc: Solatorobo : Red the Hunter est un jeu d'action/RPG sur Nintendo DS. Vous y incarnez Red Savarin, un chien anthropomorphe qui peut se transformer à loisir en humain pour combattre des robots géants et de nombreux ennemis au fil de ses explorations.

game.name: Solitaire
game.publisher: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG

game.name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing
game.desc: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de courses regroupant tous les personnages emblématiques de l'univers de SEGA. Tous ces personnages se donnent rendez-vous sur des circuits improbables pour des courses d'anthologie. De nombreux objets et bonus viendront pimenter la course et apporteront des moments inattendus et d'incroyables retournements de situation.

game.name: Sonic Chronicles - The Dark Brotherhood
game.desc: Le hérisson bleu plus rapide que l'éclair arrive avec un nouveau genre sur DS dans Sonic Chronicles : La Confrérie des Ténèbres. Finies les courses à fond les ballons, place au jeu de rôle et au combat tour par tour. Faites face à la confrérie des Maraudeurs et utilisez les attaques combinées de vos personnages pour en venir à bout.

game.name: Sonic Classic Collection
game.desc:
Sonic Classic Collection is a set of four games from the Sonic series on one cart. The games included on the cart are:
1. Sonic the Hedgehog 2. Sonic the Hedgehog 2 3. Sonic the Hedgehog 3 4. Sonic and Knuckles
The compilation also includes Knuckles in Sonic the Hedgehog 2 and Knuckles in Sonic the Hedgehog 3, which were originally accessed by connecting Sonic 2 or Sonic 3 into the Sonic and Knuckles cart. All multiplayer modes in the games have been removed, making this a single player only game.
In addition to the main game, an art gallery can also be accessed. This gallery features promotional art from Sonic 1, Sonic 2, Sonic 3, Sonic Spinball and Sonic Drift.

game.name: Sonic Colors
game.desc: An extraordinary amusement park has been seen orbiting around the home planet of Sonic the Hedgehog, and rumors are spreading that an alien race of Wisps, who have a unique colorful energy, are being held captive there by the evil Dr. Eggman. Soon after arriving at the amusement park, Sonic discovers he is able to use these mysterious alien forces to help the Wisps escape!

game.name: Sonic Rush Adventure
game.desc:
While flying in their plane across the ocean, looking for a strange energy source, Sonic and Tails' plane is struck by lightning! They plunge into the murky depths of the ocean...and awaken on a small island. A local, a raccoon named Marine, informs them that they are on Southern Island. With Marine and Tails' help, Sonic sets about to explore the nearby islands.
Sonic Rush Adventure is a side-scrolling adventure game, and the sequel to Sonic Rush. Sonic's goal through these platform levels is to zip through as quickly as possible. By pressing the B Button while in the air, Sonic can increase his Tension Gauge by performing aerial tricks. Pressing Y uses a Super Boost, which will allow him to plow through anything in his path at amazing speed, but drains the Tension Gauge.
When Sonic reaches the treasure chest at the end of each level, he will be given a material that can be used for construction of ships and other devices. At first, Sonic is stranded on Southern Island, but after the construction of the waterbike, he can travel to other islands and explore them. Similar to The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass, the player must plot a path to the next island using the stylus, and then provide limited control over the ship as it travels. However, Sonic has different ships, each of which are notably different from Link's steamboat.
Sonic Rush Adventure also features a Battle Mode, where players can either play locally with a friend, or across the world through Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection. Players can take each other on in a one-on-one race through various levels as each player aims to get to the end first.

game.name: Sonic Rush
game.desc:
Sonic's first outing on the Nintendo DS system features action in two screens with a story featuring Sonic getting involved in another one of Dr. Eggman's evil plots. A mysterious Emerald is left behind by Dr. Eggman, but an unfamiliar character makes off with it before Sonic can investigate! Sonic gives chase, and thus the adventure begins.
Playable characters in the game are Sonic the Hedgehog and new character Blaze the Cat. Appearances from other character include Miles "Tails" Prower, Amy Rose, Cream the Rabbit, and Knuckles the Echidna. Each playable character has four moves as well as a variety of "Trick actions" which, when performed, will raise your Tension Gauge. Filling the gauge allows you to do a Boost which will propel Sonic or Blaze at a high speed across the ground or along the air to defeat enemies or move certain blocks.
There are 14 levels that play out over both the top and bottom DS screens, giving you a bigger view of your surroundings. You will race through the levels collecting rings, using "gimmicks" such as bungee ropes and giant waterwheels, performing tricks, collecting power-ups, and defeating enemies. When you beat each level, or "act", you will face a Boss Act which is played out over the top screen in 3D. In addition to these levels, there are Special Stages. These are played on the touch screen, and unlike the rest of the game, feature control with the stylus.
Upon completion of the game, Time Attack mode will be available. In it, you play levels/boss acts for the best time record. Battle Play is a multiplayer mode in which two players compete to finish a level first. It can be played over single-card download or multi-card wireless.

game.name: Soul Bubbles
game.desc:
Soul Bubbles is very similar to Bubble Ghost and requires the player to save lost Spirits by transporting them in bubbles to the exit of each level.
The player takes over the role of a Spirit Herder who is tasked with ferrying souls to the underworld. To move the Spirits and keep them relatively save, they need to be be enclosed in soup bubbles. The Spirit Herder then can blow those bubbles through the level, deflate them if they are too big and even cut them into two bubbles and rejoin them later when required. If a bubble bursts, the Spirit will slowly suffocate and eventually die if the player can't draw a new bubble around it fast enough.
But the way to the Gateway Cube isn't an easy one and it's not just as simple as blowing the bubbles from start to finish in the 40 levels. Besides the natural dangers in form of rocks, plants or hungry critters that all destroy the bubble, there are also environment puzzles waiting to be solved like activating a switch which requires a big bubble. There is also Star Dust and so-called Calabash waiting to be collected. While the Star Dust will increase the light emitted by the Spirits and can be collected by simply drawing a new bubble around it, the Calabashs are well hidden but once the player found them all, he will unlock the eighth World called Agartha, the Land of the Dead.
To help with the search, the Spirits will change their shape to heart if a Calabash is near or turn into yellow triangles if there is imminent danger.

game.name: Space Bust-A-Move
game.desc: Disponible sur DS, Puzzle Bobble Galaxy est comme son nom l'indique un puzzle-game. Le but est simple, il vous faut assembler des bulles de même couleur par trois pour les faire disparaître avant que l'écran n'en soit trop rempli. Le titre propose aussi des mini-jeux ainsi qu'un mode multijoueur pour jouer avec trois autres amis.

game.name: Space Camp
game.desc: Space Camp sur DS est une collection de mini-jeux ayant tous un rapport à l'espace. Vous pourrez poser une navette spatiale ou encore réaliser des expériences en apesanteur. Un jeu vous permettra aussi de défendre la Lune d'une pluie d'astéroïdes.

game.name: Space Invaders Extreme 2
game.desc: Space Invaders Extreme 2 follows in the footsteps of last year's critically acclaimed Space Invaders Extreme, which was regarded by many as the best remake of the original classic. This year the iconic Invaders are back again and this time the action is even more extreme! The game combines the essence of the original game with a stunning alliance of futuristic graphic design and cutting-edge audio, overhauled gameplay and a whole new range of amazing power-ups.

game.name: Space Invaders Extreme
game.desc:
The pixelated aliens are back to celebrate their 30th anniversary!
Taking a cue from other recent arcade classic updates, Space Invaders Extreme takes the gameplay of the 1978 classic, and reinvents it, giving power-up blasters, boss aliens, and an electronic soundtrack that plays in sync with the onscreen action.
Basic gameplay remains the same: Players guide a ground based cannon either left or right, blasting an oncoming fleet of invaders before they reach the ground. The main objective is to get as many points as possible before running out of lives.
Space Invaders Extreme introduces new elements, such as invader fleets that break pattern from their left to right descent, boss aliens that require several hits to destroy, power-ups that enhance the cannon, allowing the player to wipe out multiple invaders at once, while racking up combos.
Wi-Fi play is also possible, allowing player to team up cooperatively, or compete against the other. The Nintendo DS version also has a feature for online ranking.

game.name: Space Invaders Revolution
game.desc:
Space Invaders marks a return to the gaming scene with both old and new versions of the classic arcade experience.
Revolution includes the shoot 'em up as it was originally released to arcades and consoles worldwide, as well as an update collection of modes featuring new visual effects and backdrops and harder enemies to defeat. The touch screen of the DS comes in handy to select new special weapons which can be used in the heat of battle to turn the tide.

game.name: Spanish for Everyone!
game.desc: Spanish for Everyone is a Nintendo DS video game published by Activision. It was created and developed by an independent company, Humagade. It gained notoriety when the cut scenes were released on to YouTube. One of the developing staff has commented on OverClocked ReMix in regards to the storyline and gameplay. The cut scenes contained subliminal stereotypical messages. The game also was mocked for its absurd storyline.

game.name: Spectral Force - Genesis
game.desc: Spectral Force Genesis sur DS est à la fois un jeu de rôle, un jeu de stratégie en temps réel et un wargame. A la tête d'une nation souveraine, le joueur devra lever une armée et recruter de nombreux officiers pour partir à la conquête du monde de Neverland. Selon ses prouesses sur la champ de bataille et sa façon de gérer son territoire, le scénario ne progressera pas toujours de la même façon.

game.name: Spectrobes
game.desc:
Junior Nanairo Interplanetary Patrol officers Rallen and Jeena are on a routine mission when they hear a strange distress call. They find the wreckage of an ancient escape pod. Its inhabitant is in cryogenic sleep and when revived tells them about a terrible new threat: the Krawl. The Krawl are an alien lifeform who consume whole planets, and they have already been spotted in this part of the galaxy.
Fortunately, there is a way to defeat them. This requires the help of an extinct lifeform called Spectrobes. Rallen and Jeena must visit planets to find fossils of these Spectrobes, excavate, awaken and train them. There are almost 500 different ones for the player to collect and trade. To excavate a Spectrobe, the player must first locate it using another Spectrobe. Using the stylus on the touch-screen, one can carefully remove layers of rock and soil to dig up the fossil, without damaging it.
The fossil must then be taken back to the space ship, put in a machine and awakened by using your voice or blowing in the microphone. The soil also contains various crystals and minerals, which can be used to feed and train the Spectrobes. They will evolve to stronger and more effective stages.
The Krawl are on the planets in the form of vortexes. Walking too close to them triggers a battle, in which two Spectrobes join Rallen against the enemy. With a combination of buttons and shoulderbuttons the Spectrobes can unleash special attack powers or combine their respective attacks in real time action.
Via WiFi and on a dedicated website players can battle against each other or exchange Spectrobes and items. Special collectibles can be downloaded. Items and Spectrobes can also be added to the game using game cards with holes through which the touch-screen must be touched in a specific order.

game.name: Speed Racer: The Videogame
game.desc: Speed Racer sur DS est le jeu vidéo adapté du film du même nom des frères Wachowski. Speed est un as du volant pour les courses risquées. Il participe au tournoi Crucible dans le seul but de montrer à tous les magouilles qui se trament derrière certaines courses. Incarnez ce pilote d'exception lors de courses pleines d'adrénaline où le crash peut survenir à n'importe quel moment.

game.name: Spelling Challenges and More!
game.desc: Spelling Challenges and More! sur DS est un titre dans lequel vos connaissances en matière d'orthographe vont être mises à contribution. La console va vous dicter des mots, de plus en plus durs, que vous devez tenter d'écrire sans faire de fautes. Plus vous êtes rapide et plus vous gagnez de points. Mais attention, les lettres dont vous vous servez peuvent vous jouer des tours et il devient alors plus difficile de les attraper pour former le mot souhaité.

game.name: Spider-Man - Battle For New York
game.desc: Spider-Man : Bataille pour New York est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur DS dans lequel vous dirigez l'incroyable monte-en-l'air qui doit cette fois s'occuper de la Grosse Pomme. Allez-vous la détruire ou la sauver ? Choisissez entre diriger l'ami Spidey ou l'horrible Bouffon Vert car vous avez le sort de la ville entre vos mains pleine de toiles ou de bombes.

game.name: Spider-Man - Friend Or Foe
game.desc: Un nouveau mal a fait son apparition dans le monde de Spider-Man qui doit du coup s'allier avec ses anciens ennemis. Dans le jeu d'action Spider-Man : Allié ou Ennemi, retrouvez les familiers de l'univers Marvel en compagnie de notre monte-en-l'air préféré. Parcourez différentes zones géographiques mondiales avec l'aide de Nick Fury et du SHIELD. Combattez à deux simultanément, entraidez-vous et lancez des attaques groupées pour vous débarrasser de vos assaillants et rétablir l'ordre.

game.name: Spider-Man - Shattered Dimensions
game.desc: Spider-Man : Shattered Dimensions est un jeu d'action sur Nintendo DS. Le titre offre quatre versions différentes de Spider-Man dont chacun de ces univers est menacé par un basculement entre l'Ordre et le Mal.

game.name: Spider-Man 2
game.desc: A pseudo 3D (game is played on a 2D plane, but the stages will rotate around Spider-Man at certain points) beat-em-up/adventure game. Vicarious Visions' first title on the Nintendo DS, the game puts the player into the role of Peter Parker (AKA Spider-Man) playing through various missions with varying objectives and pitting him against the likes of Mysterio, The Vulture, and the main villain, Doctor Octavius. The missions themselves vary from missions requiring you to find all hostages to bomb defusal missions and fast paced boss battles.

game.name: Spider-Man 3
game.desc:
Based off the 2007 movie of the same name, Spider-Man 3 puts players in charge of the titular hero as he tries to once again New York City safe from the combined menace of the New Goblin, the Sandman, and Venom.
This version of the game is a 2D side-scrolling platformer with 3D stylized elements. The action is primarily controlled using the touch screen. Players use the stylus for combat, webbing, and item interaction. The game also allows for players to adventure in storylines not explored in the third film, such as facing familiar Spider-Man villains from the comic book mythos.
One of the main focal points of the new game is the inclusion of Spider-Man's black symbiote costume. When Spider-Man's "Rage" meter builds up, the black suit automatically takes over, allowing Spider-Man to become faster, aggressive, and more powerful.

game.name: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows
game.desc: Spider-Man : Web of Shadows est un jeu d'action sur Nintendo DS. Le titre vous permet de pouvoir alterner entre l'agilité du costume rouge ou la puissance du costume noir de Spider-Man. Vos choix ont un impact direct sur l'histoire et sur la façon dont vous êtes vu par les habitants. Il est également possible de débloquer des pouvoirs surpuissants et de créer de nouveaux combos.

game.path: ./Spitfire Heroes - Tales of the Royal Air Force (USA).zip
game.name: Spitfire Heroes : Tales of the Royal Air Force
game.desc: Spitfire Heroes : Tales of the Royal Air Force est une simulation de combats aériens en trois dimensions sortie sur Nintendo DS. Le jeu est basé sur la série de livres du même nom. L'action prend place durant la Seconde Guerre mondiale : en tant qu'as de l'aviation, vous êtes chargé de défendre l'Europe des attaques allemandes. Les missions sont variées : destruction de cibles au sol, défense de base, ou encore résistance face à des vagues d'attaques ennemies.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Spitfire Heroes - Tales of the Royal Air Force (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Spitfire Heroes - Tales of the Royal Air Force (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Spitfire Heroes - Tales of the Royal Air Force (USA).png

game.name: Splinter Cell Chaos Theory
game.desc: Splinter Cell Chaos Theory sur DS est un jeu d'infiltration dans lequel vous incarnez une nouvelle fois Sam Fisher. De Panama à la Corée en passant par les USA, le but reste sensiblement le même, s'approcher le plus discrètement possible de sa cible grâce à une panoplie de mouvements étendue. Accrochez-vous au plafond puis suspendez-vous au-dessus d'une voie truffée de lasers détecteurs de mouvements. A moins que vous préfériez vous glisser dans ce petit conduit étroit ?

game.name: SpongeBob and Friends - Battle for Volcano Island

game.path: ./SpongeBob SquarePants - Creature from the Krusty Krab (USA).zip
game.name: SpongeBob SquarePants - Creature from the Krusty K
game.marquee: ./wheel/SpongeBob SquarePants - Creature from the Krusty Krab (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/SpongeBob SquarePants - Creature from the Krusty Krab (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/SpongeBob SquarePants - Creature from the Krusty Krab (USA).png

game.name: SpongeBob SquarePants Featuring Nicktoons - Globs of Doom
game.marquee: ./wheel/SpongeBob SquarePants featuring Nicktoons - Globs of Doom (USA) (En,Fr) [b].png
