game.name: Spongebob Squarepants: The Yellow Avenger
game.desc: After a bungled attempt by the Dirty Bubble to kidnap the heroes to show off for the Super Villain Reunion, Bikini Bottom becomes plagued by hundreds of fiendish

game.path: ./SpongeBob vs the Big One - Beach Party Cook-Off (USA) (En,Fr) [b].zip
game.name: SpongeBob vs The Big One: Beach Party Cook-Off
game.marquee: ./wheel/SpongeBob vs the Big One - Beach Party Cook-Off (USA) (En,Fr) [b].png
game.video: ./snap/SpongeBob vs the Big One - Beach Party Cook-Off (USA) (En,Fr) [b].mp4
game.image: ./boxart/SpongeBob vs the Big One - Beach Party Cook-Off (USA) (En,Fr) [b].png

game.name: SpongeBob's Boating Bash
game.desc: SpongeBob's Boating Bash est un jeu de courses Bob l'Eponge sur Nintendo DS. Retrouvez Bob l'Eponge et tous ses amis dans ce jeu de courses déjanté où vous devez arriver premier et éviter les requins qui patrouillent sur les circuits.

game.name: SpongeBob's Surf & Skate Roadtrip
game.desc: Bob L'Eponge : Surf & Skate Roadtrip sur DS est un jeu de sport. Celui-ci permet au joueur d'incarner tous les héros du dessin animé dans des épreuves de surf, de skate et de snowboard.

game.name: Spore Créatures
game.desc:
Life begins as a simple Oogie, a primitive hatchling that falls into the ocean from a fallen spaceship. Soon, this helpless Oogie is thrust into a new world and must evolve to face its challenges.
In Spore Creatures, players must find new body parts and customize their creature to help survive the often-harsh environment. The game's Creature Creator offers a near-infinite number of possibilities with hundreds of options that can improve and alter your creature. Players can choose to create aggressive carnivores, cute and cuddly herbivores, or anything in between.
As the story unfolds, your creature will discover six new planets to explore, as well as dozens of bizarre species to befriend, intimidate, or eliminate. Spore Creatures is entirely touch screen based, with activities for dancing, cuddling, and fighting other species. Players can also collect 50 achievement badges to unlock new game modes, parts, and features.
Spore Creatures allows players to upload their favorite creatures to the internet using the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection. Other players' species will "pollinate" the Nintendo DS game, appearing throughout the game's story.

game.name: Sports Collection
game.desc: Sports Collection sur Nintendo DS est une compilation d'activités sportives. Vous pourrez vous adonner à 15 épreuves différentes, en utilisant uniquement le stylet de la console. Trois tournois sont accessibles, et un multijoueur accessible à 2 avec deux cartouches complète l'aventure.

game.name: Sprung: A Game Where Everyone Scores

game.path: ./Spy Kids - All the Time in the World (USA).zip
game.name: Spy Kids : All the Time in the World
game.desc: Spy Kids : All the Time in the World est un jeu de plates-formes sur Nintendo DS basé sur le film éponyme. Dans la peau de Rebecca ou de Cecil, les joueurs doivent traverser huit niveaux infestés d'ennemis et de pièges afin de sauver le monde. A cette fin, ils peuvent utiliser de nombreux gadgets et des techniques de combat avancées mais seule leur sagacité leur permettra de résoudre les nombreux puzzles qui se présenteront à eux.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Spy Kids - All the Time in the World (USA).png
game.image: ./boxart/Spy Kids - All the Time in the World (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Spy Kids - All the Time in the World (USA).mp4

game.name: Spyro - Shadow Legacy
game.desc: The first Spyro game for the Nintendo DS brings rpg-lite features to the series. Spyro's friends have been sucked into the Shadow Realm and their magic is slowly being drained. Spyro must use his flame and ice breath, his magic, and his chi abilities in

game.name: Squinkies - Surprise Inside
game.desc: Basé sur une franchise de jouets populaires outre-Manche, Squinkies nous invite à collectionner plus de 250 créatures virtuelles sur notre DS. Dans la peau d'une princesse, on devra réussir des mini-jeux afin de libérer ses petits compagnons et de compléter un beau catalogue animé.

game.name: Squishy Tank
game.desc: Squishy Tank est un puzzle game sur DS qui nous invite à éliminer des tuiles avant le temps imparti. Les joueurs auront toutes sortes d'objets à leur disposition pour les aider dans leur tâche et un mode Histoire leur permettra de faire la connaissance de nombreux personnages farfelus.

game.name: Star Fox Command
game.desc:
Fox McCloud is back for more!
General Pepper has fallen ill, and requests that (the now elderly) Peppy Hare take his place. Meanwhile it is discovered that Venom has acid oceans, which are home to the dangerous Anglars. Now the team must save the Lylat system again!
The single player mode is split into thirty map-based combat and Battle combat missions. During map mode you control your Arwings with the stylus. During combat, you move your Arwing by sliding your stylus to the left/right. Bombs are controlled with the touch screen. You may fire the cannons with any button but Start/Select.
Star Fox Command's six-player Wi-Fi mode plays like the Shine Runner mode from Mario Kart DS and the Star Fox 64 multiplayer game. You shoot your friends down for stars.
Star Fox Command has new pilots (Octoman is one of the CPU pilots) and ships, multiple endings, and a new gibberish generator (make your own pilot noises). It also has support for the brand new DS rumble pak.

game.name: Star Trek : Tactical Assault
game.desc: In Star Trek Tactical Assault, you play either a Starfleet or Klingon captain who must wade through a high volatile situation between the Klingons and Romulans. As captain, your decisions will change how other captains react, either as potential allies or

game.name: Star Wars - Lethal Alliance
game.desc: Dans Star Wars : Lethal Alliance sur PSP, incarnez Rianna Saren, une mercenaire Twi'Lek. Avec l'aide de votre droïde Zeeo, frayez-vous un chemin parmi les lignes ennemies et volez les plans de l'Etoile Noire, l'arme la plus redoutable de l'Empire ! Combattez aux côtés de Zeeo, créez un hologramme pour tromper l'ennemi et échappez à leur vigilance afin de réussir votre mission. Jouez en mode sans fil à plusieurs mini-jeux : shoot de droïdes, cache-cache et bien plus... Et ce jusqu'à 4 joueurs !

game.path: ./Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).zip
game.name: Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes
game.desc: Inspiré par la série télé Star Wars The Clone Wars, le jeu d'action Les Héros de la République sur DS se charge de décrire les événements qui conduiront à la deuxième saison. Vous contrôlez ici des chevaliers Jedi et des soldats de l'Armée des Clones au service de la République Galactique. Une petite sélection de missions vous attendent et mêlent des combats au sabre, des fusillades à coups de laser et de petites énigmes.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png
game.image: ./boxart/Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).png
game.video: ./snap/Star Wars - The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).mp4

game.name: Star Wars - The Force Unleashed II
game.desc: Star Wars : Le Pouvoir de la Force II est un jeu d'action sur Nintendo DS. Vous incarnez Starkiller qui fuit son ancien maître Dark Vador et l'usine de clones dont il était prisonnier. S'ensuit un parcours initiatique en quête de son identité sur des planètes hostiles, dans un univers tout en 2D.

game.name: Star Wars - The Force Unleashed
game.desc: Star Wars : Le Pouvoir de la Force sur DS est un jeu d'action situé quelque part entre l'épisode III et l'épisode IV de la célèbre franchise Star Wars. Le titre raconte l'histoire d'un apprenti Sith formé par Dark Vador dont la mission est d'éliminer les Jedi jusqu'au dernier afin d'assurer l'ascension de son maître. Maîtrisez la Force et affrontez de puissants ennemis.

game.name: Star Wars Battlefront : Elite Squadron
game.desc: Disponible sur DS, Star Wars Battlefront : Elite Squadron est un jeu d'action qui vous embarque dans l'univers Star Wars. Dans cet opus, les chasseurs X-Wing, les croiseurs stellaires et les Jedi sont bien présents. Le titre vous permet d'incarner un personnage de votre choix et de sélectionner ses armes parmi celles pré-définies pour l'envoyer dans des batailles épiques sur terre et dans l'espace. Succomberez-vous au côté obscur de la force ?

game.path: ./Star Wars - Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).zip
game.name: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
game.desc: Star Wars Episode III : La Revanche des Sith sur DS vous entraîne au coeur de la trame obscure du film, aux côtés d'Obi-wan Kenobi ou d'Anakin Skywalker. Force et sabres lasers seront de mise, face à des hordes d'ennemis prêts à en découdre. Votre personnage évolue grâce à des points d'expérience octroyés à la fin de chaque niveau.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Star Wars - Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).png
game.video: ./snap/Star Wars - Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Star Wars - Episode III - Revenge of the Sith (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).png

game.name: Steal Princess
game.desc: While exploring the thought-to-be-long-abandoned palace of the Ancient Demon King, the young thief Anise stumbles upon a startling discovery: the palace isn't abandoned at all, and it's crawling with demons, no less! Equally startling is the deadly booby trap she triggers in the process of opening a locked door. She barely outruns the giant boulder bearing down on her, escaping the palace only to fall into a surging river, unconscious. The fairy Kukri, imprisoned for centuries in the chamber Anise inadvertently unlocked, rescues her and takes her to the Castle of Albyon. Anise awakens in the presence of the King, whose son is being held by demons in the very palace Anise narrowly escaped from. Recent events have unshakably convinced the King that this thief is descended from the Legendary Hero of Albyon, he who slew the Ancient Demon King centuries ago, and so he commands her thusly: free the Prince from the vile demons... or be tried and convicted as a thief and locked away for life.

game.name: Steel Horizon
game.desc: Steel Horizon sur DS est un jeu de stratégie mettant en scène des navires pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Choisissez votre bateau au départ et vous voilà aux commandes de votre flotte, prêt à mettre à mal celle d'en face. En dehors des 21 missions disponibles il est possible d'affronter un ami en mode multi.

game.name: Stratego Next Edition
game.desc: Stratego sur DS est un vieux jeu de stratégie et de réflexion opposant deux adversaires sur un plateau. Le but de la partie est de trouver et de capturer le drapeau ennemi. Pour cela chaque joueur dispose de troupes et d'unités spécialisées qu'il déplace au tour par tour.

game.name: Strawberry Shortcake - The Four Seasons Cake
Subbuteo
game.desc: Subbuteo sur Nintendo DS est le jeu officiel du célèbre jeu de plateau du même nom. Toutes les règles sont présentes et un didacticiel complet peut vous les enseigner au besoin. Il est possible de diriger ses joueurs au stylet mais également au doigt ! Trois modes de jeu sont présents : Libre, Championnat et Tournoi. Il est également possible de jouer à deux, via la connexion Wi-Fi de la console.

game.name: Sudoku Ball: Detective
game.desc: Sudoku Ball : Detective sur DS vous propose un concept original : mener une enquête policière tout en résolvant des grilles de sudoku ! Le titre comprend 240 puzzles différents échelonnés sur 3 niveaux de difficulté, et une vingtaine de chapitres à parcourir en mode Aventure. Résolvez les énigmes et aidez le détective à trouver le meurtrier de Jonathan Coleridge !

game.name: Sudoku Gridmaster
game.desc: Devenez champion de sudoku avec Sudoku Master sur DS. Le jeu de réflexion s'invite chez nous avec pas moins de 400 grilles originales pour des heures et des heures de réflexion. Jouez de manière intuitive et progressive grâce aux quatre niveaux de difficultés disponibles et aux différents conseils et astuces qui vous seront fort utiles en cas de blocage.

game.path: ./Sudoku Mania - Enhance Your Critical Thinking Skills! (USA).zip
game.name: Sudoku Mania - Enhance Your Critical Thinking Skil
game.desc: SudokuManiacs sur DS vous propose de multiples grilles du fameux casse-tête avec plusieurs environnements. Cinq thèmes sont disponibles, chacun ayant son ambiance sonore et visuelle, afin de mieux appréhender les grilles : jungle, mer, techno, industriel et Japon. Choisissez entre les chiffres ou les symboles et augmentez le challenge au fur et à mesure.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Sudoku Mania - Enhance Your Critical Thinking Skills! (USA).png
game.image: ./boxart/Sudoku Mania - Enhance Your Critical Thinking Skills! (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Sudoku Mania - Enhance Your Critical Thinking Skills! (USA).mp4

game.name: Sudokuro - Sudoku & Kakuro Games
game.desc:
Sudokuro is a puzzle game featuring two different puzzles in the same game, which are Sudoku and Kakuro. Each kind of puzzle has different difficulty levels and all of them are automatically generated, with thousands of puzzles to choose from. You can enter the numbers to solve the puzzles using the buttons to add them or just write them with your stylus.
In Sudoku the player has to put numbers in a grid in a way that no number is twice in a single row or column. In Kakuro the numbers have to be placed so that lines and columns equal the number next to it when all values are added together.

game.name: Suikoden - Tierkreis
game.desc:
The 108 Stars of Destiny are back! In this game the player takes on the role of the young hero from Citro Village, and with Marica, Liu and Jale (and other more), the player will explore the world looking for the True Chronicles and stop the evil forces of The Order of the One True Way, lead by the One King!
Suikoden Tierkreis is a classical turn-based console Role Playing Game with some interesting Ideas, like mini-quest using specific (or not) character for complete it. The world is completely 3D and the game focuses on story elements. Movement is done with the directional pad or stylus.
Like most console RPGs the game has the player interacting with NPCs and fighting random encounters.
Items and characters can be exchanged with other players through Wi-Fi.

game.path: ./Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Circle of Spies (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).zip
game.name: Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Circle of Spies
game.marquee: ./wheel/Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Circle of Spies (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).png
game.video: ./snap/Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Circle of Spies (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Circle of Spies (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).png

game.name: Summon Night : Twin Age
game.desc: As the story is told, Reiha was a powerful magician as a child, but an accident sent her and Aldo to a island called Jarazi wi

game.name: Super Black Bass Fishing
game.desc: Super Black Bass Fishing sur DS est une simulation de pêche qui se joue au stylet. Vous incarnez un jeune homme qui décide de participer à un concours de pêche mais qui se fait recaler à l'entrée. A vous de faire vos preuves en choisissant les bons appâts, les bons leurres et les coins de pêche qui regorgent de poissons. Maniez le stylet comme une canne à pêche et devenez un grand de ce sport.

game.name: Super Collapse! 3
game.desc:
The third game in the Collapse! series has the same core gameplay as previous games but features several new modes including for the first time a quest mode. The following eight game modes are available:
1. Classic
Quest
Relapse
Strategy
Puzzle
Slider
Continuous
Countdown
Initially, only classic and quest modes are available. The rest can be unlocked by playing the quest mode. The classic mode works in the same way as in previous games. The player is presented with a grid that is partially filled with coloured blocks. More blocks are added to grid, one row at a time, from the bottom of the grid. The aim of the game is to remove these blocks before they reach the top of the screen. To remove blocks the player simply clicks a group of three or more like coloured blocks. Some special pieces exists such as bombs that blows up surrounding blocks.
In the quest mode the player enters a strange world where he progresses from level to level. For each level that is completed a new is made available. The quest mode features a store where the player can purchase different things for the money he earns for completing each level. For more money it's also play different casino mini games such as slot machines. All of the game modes are available in the quest mode and after a number of them have been completed they become unlocked for the player to play at any time.
The relapse mode works like classic but new blocks come in from both top and bottom. In the strategy mode new block will only come in when the player clicks. In the puzzle mode the player has to clear all blocks from the screen and no new appear. In the slider mode the rows of blocks will slide left and right so that the groups changes. The continuous mode is an endless variant of the classic mode and the player has to last as long as possible. In the countdown mode the player has to score as many points as possible in two minutes.

game.name: Super Dodgeball Brawlers
game.desc:
Super Dodgeball Brawlers is a remake of the classic dodgeball sports NES title with characters that resembles those from River City Ransom and Double Dragon.
The original mode still exists, but now has new rules that allow punching, kicking and using weapons against the opposing team. There is a create-a-character option as well.
There are also over a hundred special attacks that can be used against opponents such as Cactus Attack, Panda Shot and Spear to name a few. The new Super Gauge System, when filled, can be given to a player on the court to boosts stats or unleash an "Instant Kill" against an opponent.
Friends can go head-to-head against a friend or even join up against eight people using Wi-Fi.

game.name: Super Fruit Fall
game.desc: Super Fruit Fall sur DS est un puzzle-game au concept original. Le but est de faire disparaître les fruits en les déplaçant à travers la grille jusqu'à ce qu'ils soient tous regroupés. Ils doivent être soit au-dessus, à gauche ou à droite d'un autre fruit similaire pour pouvoir disparaître. Un bonus est accordé si l'on fait disparaître un groupe de plusieurs fruits en même temps.

game.name: Super Mario 64 DS
game.desc:
Mario, Luigi, and Wario have all gone to the Mushroom Palace for some of Princess Peach's famous home made cake. However, when they don't return its up to the heroic dino Yoshi to find out what's wrong.
In this portable remake of the original Super Mario 64 You' are able to play as different characters from the Mario franchise. Wario, Yoshi, Luigi, and of course Mario. Each character has different abilities to be made use of during the games expanded quest.
The game now features 150 Stars to collect up from the previous 120, new stages with new bosses, changes to old stages and bosses, and a multiplayer in which player compete to get the most stars.
The game also includes over two dozen mini games that make use of both screens and the touch pad.
The DS touch screen can be used to mimic analog control.

game.name: Super Monkey Ball: Touch & Roll
game.desc: Those cute little monkey's rolling around in their bubble like balls have returned for their latest adventure, this time taking advantage of the Nintendo DS touch screen/stylus combo to provide a new level of control over your Super Monkey Ball!As with th

game.name: Super Princess Peach
game.desc:
For once, Bowser has changed his tactics. Instead of grabbing the Princess every chance he gets, he's gone straight to the source of all his problems this time around. The two people who always get in his way and halt his chances of owning Mushroom Kingdom all himself. Mario and Luigi are suddenly whisked away, and only one person can save them...
Princess Peach, always the one in distress, will use all her unique abilities and items to travel the length of the Kingdom to save her heroes. Her main attack uses a parasol on enemies, which can also double as the perfect way to float down from the heights.
Princess Peachs' emotions will also come into play. Make her cry to drench enemies or help plants grow to reach higher ground, meanwhile her happy singing can distract many foes and open up further areas.

game.path: ./Super Robot Taisen OG Saga - Endless Frontier (USA).zip
game.name: Super Robot Wars OG Saga : Endless Frontier
game.desc: Derrière son titre à rallonge se cache un épisode de la série de jeux de rôle tactique Super Robot Taisen. Cette nouvelle version pour DS introduit une modification sensible au gameplay : si l'aspect RPG est toujours prédominant, le côté tactique laisse un peu plus de place à l'action.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Super Robot Taisen OG Saga - Endless Frontier (USA).png
game.image: ./boxart/Super Robot Taisen OG Saga - Endless Frontier (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/Super Robot Taisen OG Saga - Endless Frontier (USA).mp4

game.name: Super Scribblenauts
game.desc: Super Scribblenauts est un jeu d'aventure sur Nintendo DS mêlant puzzle et énigmes. Vous devrez aider le jeune Maxwell à se sortir de 126 situations des plus étonnantes en écrivant des mots sur l'écran tactile de la console. Non seulement, vous pourrez ainsi faire apparaitre toute sorte d'objets dans les décors mais vous pourrez également modifier leur caractéristiques avec des adjectifs.

game.name: Super Speed Machines
game.desc: Super Speed Machine vous embarque à bord de voitures de compétition pour des courses de folie. Choisirez-vous un véhicule musclé mais lourd, un engin tout-terrain, ou une voiture de course modifiée ? Réalisé en 3D en vue plongeante, le jeu vous permet de contrôler l'un des 30 véhicules disponibles, et d'affronter des adversaires bien réels, mais aussi les caprices de la nature (ouragans, tremblements de terre...).

game.name: Superman Returns
game.desc:
Based on the movie of the same name, Superman Returns puts you behind the cape of the man of steel as he returns to the earth after his exile in outer space.
Your main objective is to protect Metropolis from the attacks of several enemies ripped right from Superman's comics. The main campaign gives you a hexagonal map of Metropolis which pinpoints your location as well as your current enemy's location and any disaster areas he may have caused. Since Superman himself is invulnerable, Metropolis itself has a health bar that keeps track of just how much damage the city is enduring, and which measures your level of success/failure.Your objective thus is to move around the map each turn to try and take control of each disaster area which triggers a timed 3rd person perspective sequence in which you control Superman as he flies through the city and uses his powers to solve whatever task is at hand (blowing out fires with his super-breath, destroying mind-control beacons with his heat vision, saving people, etc. etc.) catching up with your enemies triggers a fight sequence in which you must input the correct button-presses on cue to defeat your opponents. In between these rounds story segments that follow the movie's plot play out, which involve a unique 3D action sequence that mimics the movie's counterpart.
Features a single-player campaign as well as two wireless multiplayer modes in which you can face-off against four other Supermen in unique disaster areas to see who gets to clear the objectives faster than the rest. Also includes a gallery of Superman comic covers that are unlocked by collecting Krypton crystals in the game.

game.name: Surf's Up
game.desc:
Surf's Up is based on the 2007 animated film of the same name, featuring surfing penguins and wacky hijinks.
Surf's up for DS and PSP is a racing game that brings the player through an interesting adventure featuring all the characters from the CGI movie.
The player can choose from a bunch of the movie characters and compete in races against other movie characters. Each character has their own specific skills and their own surf boards. The different levels/races contain jumps/ramps which enables the player to perform tricks using either the stylus to draw objects (DS) or repeating a button sequence (PSP). Performing tricks will give you a speed boost which might just help you finish the race first and move on to the next round.
The levels also contain shortcuts and the race track is populated with different objects that can be used to gain a speed boost, distract or hit opponents and ultimately will help you finish the race first.
The game also offers a multi-player mode which enables you to play with friends who have the game and even friends who don't have the game (but have a console).

game.name: Sushi Academy
game.desc:
Time management game.
Old Sushi Master, runs a world-famous restaurant. His snacks are enjoyed by an array of fans who would love to know the secrets of sushi making. Under the Master's guidance, learn to chop vegetables, cut fish and decorate and serve meals. Create more complicated dishes, and maybe you will surpass your master.

game.name: Sushi Go Round
game.desc: Sushi Go Round sur Nintendo DS vous propose de vous occuper d'un petit restaurant à sushis afin de le faire évoluer en véritable entreprise. Vous devrez mémoriser des recettes pour satisfaire chacun de vos clients et faire attention à votre budget et vos stocks de nourriture. Prenez garde à bien respecter les commandes si vous ne voulez pas que votre sushi bar tombe dans l'oubli !

game.name: Syberia
game.desc:
You are Kate Walker, a lawyer that has been entrusted by the Universal Toy Company to negotiate the takeover of an old luxury toy and automaton factory. Over the centuries, the factory has been developing clockwork devices, specializing in perpetual mechanical movement. The factory's ambitions, however, are ill-suited to the contemporary economic climate, and the elderly Anna Voralberg, at the helm of the Valadilene factory for more than half a century, has decided to sell up.
It turns out that the takeover might not be as straightforward as expected. The day that Kate Walker arrives, Anna Voralberg is being buried. What is more is that she has left an heir  her brother Hans. But Hans had left the valley at the end of the thirties and never returned, and was actually believed to be dead. However, a letter written by Anna in the days leading up to her death reveals that Hans is well and truly alive and living somewhere in Siberia! Valadilene's elderly notary entrusted to take care of Anna's affairs suggests that Kate find Hans Voralberg as he is now the only person in a position to ratify the sale of the family business. You are on your way...

game.name: Tac Heroes : Big Red One
game.desc: Tac Heroes : Big Red One est un jeu de guerre sur Nintendo DS qui invite les joueurs à revivre les plus grandes batailles de la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Il s'agit en effet de mener vos troupes au combat afin d'occuper des positions ennemies, capturer des officiers et détruire des colonnes de véhicules. Le soft permet d'ailleurs de customiser l'infanterie en usant d'armes authentiques. Le tout est complété par un mode multi "Hot Seat" pour deux généraux en herbe.

game.name: Tak - The Great Juju Challenge
game.desc: Tak : The Great Juju Challenge sur DS est un jeu d'action/plates-formes dans lequel vous incarnez Tak et Lok pour des épreuves délirantes. Les dix meilleures équipes du monde se rejoignent pour participer au Grand Défi ! Avec des puzzles, de la réflexion stratégique, des combats et des pouvoirs magiques, défendez l'honneur de votre tribu ! Jouez seul ou en coopération avec un deuxième joueur dirigé par la console ou par un ami.

game.name: Tales to Enjoy! : The Ugly Duckling
Tamagotchi Connection - Corner Shop 2
game.desc: Tamagotchi Connexion : Corner Shop 2 est un party-game sur Nintendo DS qui propose une multitude de mini-jeux afin d'aider Memetchi et Kuchipatchi à ouvrir leurs propres magasins dans un centre commercial en perpétuelle expansion. Ces mini-jeux permettent au fur et à mesure d'atteindre les quatre seuils d'agrandissement nécessaires pour chaque boutique.

game.name: Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop 3
game.desc: Tamagotchi Connexion : Corner Shop 3 sur DS propose toujours au joueur de gérer des boutiques. Au programme : 13 nouveaux magasins à gérer, dont le boulanger et le marchand de glaces, mais aussi un parc à décorer et à visiter, et la possibilité d'échanger par Wi-Fi des objets ou des journaux tenus par les joueurs.

game.name: Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop
game.desc: The three Tamagotchi - Mametchi, Kuchipatchi and Memetchi - are itching to get into business! And you get to partner up with them! Choose your favorite Tamagotchi, and start up your very own shop together - work hard to earn a good reputation with your

game.name: Tangram Mania
game.desc: Un antique casse-tête chinois débarque sur Nintendo DS ! Tangram Mania est un jeu de réflexion qui va vous faire cogiter sur plus de 400 modèles différents. Le principe du tangram est simple : il faut utiliser sept pièces de bois pour reproduire un dessin, sans les superposer. Faites chauffer vos neurones!

game.name: Tank Beat
game.desc: Tank Beat is entirely stylus-based. As you draw tracks and fire on the DS's bottom screen game map, your tank appears and responds on the top screen. Players engage in a variety of missions and commandeer a full range of tanks: from tiny scrappers, to missile carriers, to giant Panzers.

game.path: ./Tao's Adventure - Curse of the Demon Seal (USA).zip
game.name: Tao's Adventure : Curse of the Demon Seal
game.desc: The game premise is quite simple. You control the young Air Speller by the name of Tao. When his village gets attacked by Ancient Monsters, he is sent by the council over to the town of Mondominio to seek the help of a friend of his father. Mondominio is

game.name: Tecktonik World Tour
game.desc: Tecktonik sur DS vous propose de plonger dans le mouvement Electro made in France. Dans cette simulation de danse, affrontez dans des battles endiablés les meilleurs danseurs de Tecktonik : Treaxie, Blind et bien d'autres ! Votre objectif est d'être dans le rythme pour effectuer les plus beaux mouvements possible et ainsi progresser dans la hiérarchie des danseurs. En augmentant votre notoriété, vous devenez une figure incontournable du mouvement et intégrez une team officielle : Eklesiast.

game.name: Tecmo Bowl : Kickoff
game.desc: Série mythique pour les fans de football américain, Tecmo Bowl refait surface sur DS après des années de silence. Cette version Kickoff permet de personnaliser son équipe (couleur, nom, ville) et de contrôler le jeu au stylet. 32 équipes et de nouvelles cinématiques répondent présentes pour des matches seul ou à plusieurs via la connexion Wi-Fi.

game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Arcade Attack
game.desc: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles : Arcade Attack sur DS permet d'incarner les quatre célèbres tortues mangeuses de pizzas. Utilisez les capacités propres à chacune et battez leurs ennemis jurés dans un beat'em all endiablé.

game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3 - Mutant Nightmare
game.desc: Different from its console cousins, this one is reminiscent of the old side-scrolling days of the arcade and NES versions, but with the same story. There are 50 stages to play and not only includes fighting, but also utilizing the stylus and dual screen

game.name: Tenchu: Dark Secret
game.desc: Tenchu : Dark Secret sur DS est un jeu d'action/infiltration dans lequel vous incarnez un duo de ninjas : Rikimaru et Ayame. Votre but est de protéger la fille d'un puissant seigneur avide de pouvoir. Utilisez votre équipement de shinobi, votre discrétion et votre lame pour réussir. Il est également possible de fabriquer son propre inventaire ou de s'échanger des objets via les fonctions sans-fil de la console.

game.name: Tennis Elbow
game.desc: Tennis Elbow sur Nintendo est, comme son nom l'indique, un jeu de tennis qui propose au joueur d'affronter l'ordinateur dans l'un des 90 tournois proposés. Il est possible de personnaliser son joueur (gaucher, droitier, couleur de cheveux...) et de remporter la victoire sur 5 surfaces différentes.

game.name: Tetris DS
game.desc:
At its base, Tetris DS is the same Tetris gameplay that's been around for years: rotate and arrange Tetriminos to create full lines and make them disappear. However, it also has a style very different from earlier Tetris games, new play modes, and online play.
Graphically and aurally, Tetris DS is based on classic NES games. A portion of the graphics are sprites directly ripped from Mario Bros., Super Mario Bros., Super Mario Bros. 3, Donkey Kong, Balloon Fight, Metroid, Yoshi's Cookie, and The Legend of Zelda. Remixes of music from these games are also used.
Standard mode includes the standard endless play option, the standard "get 25 lines to win" option, and the standard versus mode where clearing multiple lines at once adds lines to the bottom of your opponents' well.
Push mode is a versus game with a twist. The player's moves and pieces are shown on the top screen, while the opponent's are on the bottom screen, both with gravity moving towards the center. Instead of multiple line clears adding extra lines to the bottom of your opponent's well, though, the center is pushed towards their end, giving them a smaller play area. Push back and forth until one side loses.
Touch mode presents you with a tall uneven stack of large Tetriminos. The goal is to nudge or rotate them by dragging or tapping on the touch screen to create full lines and eventually clear the stack.
Puzzle mode offers 200 Tetris scenarios and presents you with a number of pieces. You choose the order and rotation of the pieces to try and empty the well.
Mission mode gives you specific goals like "Use a square block to clear a line" or "Clear 3 lines with an L piece". Finish the mission and you'll be given another. Don't finish the mission and several rows of random blocks will be added to the bottom of the well before being given another mission.
Catch mode has the Tetriminos falling without direct player control. Instead, the player controls a moving core of blocks which can rotate as a whole, as well as latch on to the falling Tetriminos. The goal is to create a square of at least 4x4, causing an explosion which keeps the size of your core small. Lose by allowing your core to get too large, or by losing enough energy; which occurs when you allow a Tetrimino to scroll past the bottom of the screen, your rotating core smacks into and destroys a Tetrimino, or you hit a falling enemy.
Multiplayer Standard, Mission, and Push modes can be played locally using one copy of Tetris DS. Mission allows for up to 10 players competing for a high score. Standard allows for up to 10 players, and has an option for Mario Kart-like items to aid you or harm your enemies. Push mode remains a one-on-one experience. With Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection, you can play a two-player Standard game without items, a four-player Standard game with items, or a two-player Push mode game.

game.name: Tetris Party Deluxe
game.desc: Tetris Party Deluxe sur DS est une version du fameux puzzle-game. Le principe consiste globalement à empiler des formes géométriques pour compléter des lignes et les voir disparaître mais plus de 20 modes de jeu sont ici disponibles pour varier les plaisirs seul ou à plusieurs. 130 récompenses sont aussi là pour encourager vos progrès.

game.name: Texas Hold 'em Poker Pack
game.desc: Télé 7 Jeux : Texas Hold'em Poker sur DS vous propose de jouer à la variante en Limit du célèbre jeu de cartes. Saurez-vous plumer vos adversaires ou serez-vous le dindon de la farce ?

game.path: ./That's So Raven - Psychic on the Scene (USA).zip
game.name: That's So Raven - Psychic on the Scene
game.marquee: ./wheel/That's So Raven - Psychic on the Scene (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/That's So Raven - Psychic on the Scene (USA).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/That's So Raven - Psychic on the Scene (USA).png

game.name: The Aly & AJ Adventure
game.desc:
Alyson Renae "Aly" Michalka and Amanda Joy "AJ" Michalka are a teen pop duo who write music and act in movies. In this game they start a tour to perform in four different cities around the world (Los Angeles, New York, Tokyo, and London). Players take on the role of their new assistant who has to see to all their needs through a collection of mini-games. After creating a customized character, the player needs to complete different mini-games to prepare for the concert. Based on the performance, a thermometer fills up with a ranking of stars. A minimum of stars is needed to enter the final change and all games on the map need to be completed with at least an "A". When all the games in the buildings have been completed, the concert in that city becomes available where a rhythm game needs to be completed in the vein of Elite Beat Agents.
The games require the player to clean graffiti, help with the rehearsals through dance sessions and even educate the girls primary school skills by having them recognize their own photographs and match objects. Multiplayer is available for two players and in the A&A Player mode, players can listen to the unlocked songs and play any mini-game.

game.name: The Bee Game
game.desc: Maya l'Abeille sur DS est un jeu d'aventure qui met en scène la malicieuse Maya l'abeille, son ami Willy et Flip la sauterelle. Vous devez partir à la recherche de vos amis qui ont été éparpillés un peu partout dans le champ de blé suite à une énorme tempête. Participez à des mini-jeux et plein de petits challenges pour trouver des indices permettant de localiser les autres abeilles et ainsi les sauver. Le titre, très coloré, est évidemment destiné aux plus petits.

game.name: The Bigs 2
game.desc: The Bigs 2 sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de base-ball très arcade qui propose plusieurs bonus pour décupler les performances de joueurs. Ces derniers pourront envoyer des balles à la vitesse de la lumière ou encore sauter à des hauteurs incroyables. Le titre permet de disputer chacun des 162 matches d'une saison, un championnat ou encore de prendre part au mode "Deviens une Légende".

game.name: The Chase - Felix Meets Felicity
game.desc: The Chase : Felix Meets Felicity est un jeu de plates-formes sur Nintendo DS. Dans la peau de Felix ou de Felicity, vous devrez tracer vos propres plates-formes à l'aide du stylet et tenter d'arriver à l'heure pour votre rendez-vous de la St Valentin. Le soft propose près de 40 niveaux répartis dans 8 mondes aux thématiques différentes.

game.name: The Chronicles of Narnia - Prince Caspian
game.desc: This version utilizes the DS' dual-screen technology and stylus pen, with a RPG-style battling system, using the pen to pick a cha

game.name: The Clique - Diss and Make Up
game.desc: Adapté des livres pour adolescentes du même nom, The Clique : Queen Teen vous permet sur Nintendo DS d'incarner une nouvelle élève à l'école de Massy. A travers plusieurs défis et mini-jeux, votre objectif sera d'intégrer la bande de filles les plus en vue de ce quartier nord de New York.

game.name: The Daring Game for Girls
game.desc: The Daring Game for Girls sur DS s'inspire du recueil d'activités du même nom et propose donc aux joueuses des tas de choses à faire pour tromper l'ennui en s'amusant et en apprenant.

game.name: The Dark Spire
game.desc:
In this throwback to the early days of CRPGs you must explore the Dark Spire dungeon with a party of up to four characters.
Party creation is basic by most modern standards. Four races, three alignments, four classes along with five different stat points are all there are to decide what your character is.
These four characters begin the game inexperienced and weak like almost every RPG. They gain skills, power and better quality items as they progress through the various dungeons.
Experience points are spent on skills for the characters, some of these opening the choice to upgrade one of the 4 basic classes to become a different prestige class, offering different abilities.
The game is played without use of the touchscreen and only uses the direction pad and buttons. The top screen displays the party location in 3d and the bottom screen has info on their status.

game.name: The Golden Compass
game.desc: A la Croisee des Mondes : La Boussole d'Or sur DS est un jeu d'action/aventure reprenant la trame du long métrage portant le même nom. Incarnez Lyra la petite fille malicieuse, Pan son compagnon Daemon ou Iorek l'ours polaire en armure, trois personnages pour trois styles différents : exploration, énigme et force brute. Maîtrisez la boussole d'or et ses mystérieux pouvoirs pour découvrir des informations sur le monde de Lyra et débloquer de nombreux bonus.

game.path: ./Dr. Seuss - How the Grinch Stole Christmas! (USA).zip
game.name: The Grinch who Stole Christmas
game.desc: Si Noël n'est définitivement pas fait pour vous, alors par contre The Grinch who Stole Christmas sur DS l'est. Dans ce jeu d'aventure, incarnez le monstre vert et aigri reclus dans ses montagnes et descendez une fois par an pour anéantir complètement cette fête ridicule. Traversez les lieux aperçus dans le film avec Jim Carrey et rencontrez tous les personnages que vous avez pu aimer ou détester.

game.name: The Guild DS
game.desc: The Guild DS est un jeu de gestion et de stratégie économique dans un univers médiéval. Marchandage, commerce avec d'autres contrées : devenez le plus puissant des marchands ! Le jeu propose également des éléments de jeu de rôle, puisque vous pouvez choisir plusieurs classes de personnages, du plus honnête des marchands jusqu'à la pire des crapules.

game.name: The Incredible Hulk
game.desc: Bruce Banner débarque avec fracas sur DS et il n'est pas content. Alors il se transforme en Hulk. The Incredible Hulk donc, met en scène le géant vert au caleçon indéchirable dans une adaptation fidèle du long métrage. Le tout dans des environnements en grande majorité destructibles pour un jeu d'action 100% furieux garanti avec OGM.

game.name: The Legend of Spyro : A New Beginning
game.desc: The Legend of Spyro : A New Beginning sur DS fait découvrir aux joueurs les origines du petit dragon violet. Grâce aux attaques améliorables, à votre souffle et vos ailes, faites-en baver à vos ennemis. A vous de choisir la stratégie qui vous plaît le plus et d'améliorer à loisir votre souffle magique.

game.name: The Legend of Spyro : The Eternal Night
game.desc: The Legend of Spyro : The Eternal Night sur DS est un jeu de plates-formes orienté action dans lequel vous incarnez le petit dragon violet, héros de la franchise. Vous devez empêcher Gaul, le roi maléfique, de ressusciter le maître des ombres. Confronté à une course contre-la-montre et à de nombreux ennemis, Spyro doit se frayer un chemin dans ce voyage semé d'embûches.

game.name: The Legend Of Zelda - Phantom Hourglass
game.desc:
Continue the Wind Waker adventure in Link's first DS game.
The epic story of The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker continues as Link finds himself lost and alone in unknown seas in a new adventure. Featuring intuitive touch-screen controls and innovative puzzles, The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass offers new challenges for fans of the series and an easy-to-grasp introduction for gamers new to The Legend of Zelda. But time grows short, and only the Phantom Hourglass can buy Link the minutes he'll need to survive.
Many months have passed since the events of The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker, and Link, Tetra and Tetra's band of pirates have set sail in search of new lands. They come across a patch of ocean covered in a dense fog, in which they discover an abandoned ship. Tetra falls into danger when she explores the ship alone, and Link falls into the ocean when he attempts to rescue her. When he washes up unconscious on the shores of a mysterious island, he is awakened by the sound of a fairy's voice. With the aid of this fairy, he sets off to find Tetra and his way back to the seas he once knew.

game.name: The Legend of Zelda: Spirit Tracks
game.desc:
Ride into adventure with Link and Princess Zelda.
? Wield weapons and solve puzzles, all with your stylus
? Duke it out with friends in multiplayer battle mode
? Link and Zelda adventure together for the first time
The Legend of Zelda: Spirit Tracks sets hero Link on a daring new adventure. The game provides players with a new story, more puzzles and even a new mode of transportation. In this game, Link voyages by train, which offers up new possibilities for problem-solving. The game has the same look and feel established in the hit Nintendo DS game The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass.
? Link has a valuable new companion. While navigating dungeons, he?s accompanied by a Phantom, a hulking suit of armor that responds to his commands. Players can tap the Phantom to take command of him, then draw a line on the touchscreen to direct him where to go. The stout Phantom can walk through fire or lava, be used as a platform to carry Link above dangers, or even run interference to block Link from harm.
? When Link conducts the train, players enjoy a satisfying combination of action and real-time puzzle solving as they determine which track to take and how to best manipulate their speed. When on the train, Link must plot the best route to the end of the line around ever-moving obstacles. While en route, Link might need to fire an onboard cannon at enemies who attack the train or sound the whistle to scare animals off the tracks.
? Link uses a variety of new items and weapons, including the Whirlwind, which players activate by blowing into the microphone of the Nintendo DS system.
? As with The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass, players can draw notes on the in-game maps using the stylus on the touch screen.

game.name: The Lost Treasures of Alexandria
game.desc: The Lost Treasures of Alexandria est un puzzle-game sur Nintendo DS nous invitant à relever 200 défis à travers 10 environnements distincts. Dans la peau d'une jeune archéologue, le joueur devra former des groupes de trois sphères colorées ou plus pour atteindre divers objectifs. Quelques variantes de jeu, des sphères spéciales mais aussi des tableaux alternatifs et des pouvoirs spéciaux nous réservent de nombreuses surprises.

game.name: The New York Times Crosswords
game.desc: One thousand New York Times crossword puzzles available for play on the DS. Features include "puzzle week" which unlocks extra hard brain-buster puzzles when you complete a week of puzzles, random puzzle, and the ability to choose any puzzle by day. Interface is simple use of touch screen (character recognition or qwerty keyboard).

game.path: ./Original Rummikub, The - Brings People Together (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (DTP Entertainment AG).zip
game.name: The Original Rummikub - Brings People Together
game.desc: Rummikub sur Nintendo DS est l'adaptation du célèbre jeu de plateau, variante lui-même du rami. Le but est d'être le premier à se débarrasser de toutes ses tuiles, en les posant de manière à former des combinaisons. Il faut faire soit des suites de nombres qui se suivent, soit des séries de mêmes chiffres mais de couleur différente. On ne peut démarrer que si on peut poser une ou plusieurs combinaison totalisant au moins 30 points.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Original Rummikub, The - Brings People Together (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (DTP Entertainment AG).png
game.image: ./boxart/Original Rummikub, The - Brings People Together (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (DTP Entertainment AG).png
game.video: ./snap/Original Rummikub, The - Brings People Together (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (DTP Entertainment AG).mp4

game.name: The Princess and the Frog
game.desc: La Princesse et la Grenouille sur DS est directement adapté du film d'animation de Disney. Partez à la découverte de l'univers magique et jazzy de la Nouvelle-Orléans dans les années 1920. Vous incarnez la jeune princesse Tiana qui rêve d'ouvrir un nouveau restaurant mais qui va être confronter à de nombreux obstacles. Telle est l'histoire de ce soft émaillé de mini-jeux.

game.path: ./Quest Trio, The - Jewels, Cards and Tiles (USA) [b].zip
game.name: The Quest Trio - Jewels, Cards and Tiles
game.marquee: ./wheel/Quest Trio, The - Jewels, Cards and Tiles (USA) [b].png
game.video: ./snap/Quest Trio, The - Jewels, Cards and Tiles (USA) [b].mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Quest Trio, The - Jewels, Cards and Tiles (USA) [b].png

game.name: The Rub Rabbits!
game.desc:
The sequel to DS launch title, Feel the Magic. As with the first title, your aim is to guide your lovestruck hero through a number of challenges and puzzles to gain the heart of his true love. However, on this occasion, not only do you have to win her heart, you have to keep a hold of it. Others will attempt to attract her attention, spawning the possibility of love triangles.
Only your stylus skills will protect your heart and love from the possibility of losing her forever across 35 episodes, where you'll rub, sing, shoot down and battle against the opposition. Once you've got the girl, you can also take on your friends in multiplayer modes that range from the straight forward high score mini games to the crazy, such as making babies!

game.name: The Settlers
game.desc:
The Settlers is a remake of The Settlers II: Veni, Vidi, Vici for the Nintendo DS.
The premise of the game is set to ancient Rome, with you taking control of the Romans in the main campaign, or additionally the Vikings, Nubian and Asian empires in Free Play mode.
The game works very differently from most general strategy games. Your goal is to reach the gateway at the end of each map, usually hidden amidst the enemy lines. You must build military buildings to expand your borders that you can reach the resources that are initially out of your reach. Eventually reaching the gateway to proceed onto the next level. Your city needs roads to optimize the trade routes and allow different buildings to get the resources they need for production.
The game is highly based on gathering resources and optimizing the roads to provide maximal resource gathering. In example, you need a woodcutter to provide a sawmill with logs in order for the builders to build new structures and harbors to build ships for your expeditions.
The game is almost a 1:1 recreation of the original Settlers II game, but it adds few new things to the game such as new music and new GUI to support the stylus.

game.name: The Sims 2
game.desc: Les Sims 2 sur DS est un simulateur de vie dans lequel vous créez autant d'avatars virtuels que voulus. A vous de construire le monde qui les entoure et de fonder votre famille, trouver un travail, vous faire des relations, trouver un hobby... bref, vivre ! Profitez de nombreuses options de personnalisation afin de créer votre Sims idéal et lui faire vivre la vie que vous souhaitez !

game.name: The Sims 2: Castaway
game.desc: Les Sims 2 : Naufragés sur DS est un titre de la célèbre franchise de simulation de vie virtuelle. Cette fois vos Sims sont dans une situation assez embêtante : ils se sont échoués sur une île déserte ! Assurez votre survie en vous aidant de tout ce qui vous tomber sous la main, ne devenez pas un sauvage et pensez à vous laver de temps en temps, entraidez-vous en découvrant de nouveaux rescapés qui peuvent vous filer un coup de main. Enfin, faites tout pour essayer de revenir à la civilisation.

game.name: The Smurfs
game.desc: Les Schtroumpfs sur DS est un party-game proposant 6 mini-jeux et un mode histoire interactif. Le joueur décide des actions des protagonistes et est amené à réaliser divers défis afin de gagner des accessoires pour ses Schtroumpfs favoris.

game.path: ./Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Tipton Trouble (USA) (En,Fr).zip
game.name: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody : Tipton Trouble
game.desc: Basé sur la série télé de Disney, The Suite Life of Zack & Cody : Tipton Trouble sur DS est un jeu d'action et d'aventure retraçant les aventures des deux jumeaux. Aidez-les à se sauver des quatorze situations catastrophiques qu'ils rencontrent. Faites-les sauter, escalader et courir pour réussir à éviter les ennemis. Vous pouvez aussi faire du skateboard et débloquer des mini-jeux.
game.marquee: ./wheel/Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Tipton Trouble (USA) (En,Fr).png
game.video: ./snap/Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Tipton Trouble (USA) (En,Fr).mp4
game.image: ./boxart/Suite Life of Zack & Cody, The - Tipton Trouble (USA) (En,Fr).png

game.name: The Wild West
game.desc: Disponible sur DS, The Wild West est un jeu d'action qui prend place dans le Far West et qui mêle deux univers à priori opposés : le western et les robots. Armé de votre stylet, faites parler votre six coups ou faites sauter les ennemis à coups de dynamite. Le titre propose aussi des mini-jeux orientés western puisque vous pouvez faire du rodéo, des fléchettes et même jouer au barman.

game.name: The World Ends With You
game.desc:
The World Ends With You is an action-RPG that puts players in the role of Neku Sakuraba, a sullen, loner of a teenager who wakes up to find himself in modern day Shibuya, Japan, with no memory of how he got there and a ticking clock in his hand that tells him to complete the mission... or face erasure.
Neku and his partner Shiki Misaki find themselves as "Players" in a game that lasts seven days. Each day, players are given various missions to perform by the "Reapers" within a certain time limit, or be erased from existence.
Players use collectible pins to amplify their combat powers against "The Noise", animal-like creatures which can corrupt the people and environment around them. Each pin is activated in a different manner, from tapping the touchscreen, making sweeping motions with the stylus, or even blowing into the DS microphone. Neku fights on the lower screen of the DS, while his partner fights on the upper screen. Their combat styles are different, but can be combined to form more powerful attacks.
Players can purchase clothing to increase the effectiveness of their attacks, and gain PP points to enhance their pin abilities. PP is usally gained through combat, but can also be gained by coming into wi-fi contact with another person's DS.
There is also a wi-fi mini-game called "Ten Pin Slammer", where players can use one pin at a time to knock the other players' pins off the gameboard.

game.name: Theme Park
game.desc:
Dominating the exciting world of Theme Park ownership is your goal in this strategy game from Bullfrog. The first task is to set up your rides within the available land, structuring convenient paths and queues and ideally leaving some space for bigger rides once they become available, and include some lakes and trees to increase the park's allure. Rides range from Teacups and Haunted Houses to the biggest most elaborate roller-coaster you can design, and water rides that loop around other rides.
Shops must also be included, so that the visitors can buy food, drinks and souvenirs - the cunning player will combine salt, sugar and caffeine settings to maximize consumer interest. Staff must be hired to keep everything running smoothly, and they will only work for what they consider a fair rate of pay.
You are competing against other Theme Parks, so don't let them get an advantage over you - monitor your success in attracting customers and financial viability closely using the supplied statistics pages. More important, ensure that research is adequately funded to produce new rides.
It can be played in three modes - Sandbox level lets you concentrate on the park design elements, while Sim and Full add more strategic features.

game.name: Theresia..
game.desc:
theresia is a horror adventure game. The game incorporates two distinct types of gameplay: three dimensional first person segments and two dimensional point & click adventure segments. The player has to find and combine items and avoid traps to survive.
The game has two parts; The first puts you in the role of Emile, a young girl who wakes up in a dark, abandoned prison with no memory how she got here. You must guide Emile through the prison while uncovering items that help her regain her lost memory and eventually to escape the prison. The second part puts you in control of Martel, who must escape an orphanage where a brilliant doctor had developed a treatment to a fever ravaging the orphanage which turned out to become a bigger threat than the fever itself.

game.path: ./Think - Training fuer den Kopf - Sinnes Trainer (Europe) (En,Fr,De,It) [b].zip
game.name: Think - Train Your Brain - Logic Trainer
game.marquee: ./wheel/Think - Training fuer den Kopf - Sinnes Trainer (Europe) (En,Fr,De,It) [b].png

ThinkSmart - Power Up Your Brain! - Kids 8

game.name: ThinkSmart Games - Scotland Yard - Hunting Mister X

game.image: ./boxart/ThinkSmart Games - Scotland Yard - Hunting Mister X (USA).png
game.video: ./snap/ThinkSmart Games - Scotland Yard - Hunting Mister X (USA).mp4

game.name: Thomas & Friends : Hero of the Rails
Thundercats
game.desc: The hit animated high-action series claws its way onto the Nintendo DS! Become Lion-O and battle Mumm-Ra and his evil forces as you run, jump, and slash your way through action ripped straight from the new animated series. Wield the incredible power of the Sword of Omens in this epic side-scrolling adventure.

game.name: Tierbabys Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwe
Tiger Woods PGA Tour 08
game.desc:
Tiger Woods PGA Tour 08 is the second game in the series to appear on the Nintendo DS. The game features touch swing controls where the player drags the stylus downwards to backswing and then back upwards again to shoot. A smooth motion leads to a more accurate shot, while the power of the shot is determined by how long the backswing is and the speed of the motion. At the same time the accuracy of the shot is determined by the angle of the swing. By sliding the stylus right or left, the ball may draw or fade although too much will lead to a hook or a slice. Once the ball is in the air, a close-up image of it appears on the bottom screen. By sliding the stylus repeatedly across the ball, the player is able to make it rotate.
A more traditional tap control is also available. With it the player swings by pressing a button to begin a backswing. The swing meter bar will then increase until the player presses the button again to decide the power of the shot. After that the player has to press the button a third time to decide the alignment of the shot.
The game feature a number of game modes. The play now mode allows the player to play a quick match. The player can customize the game by choosing rules (for example stroke play, match play or skins), course and number of holes. The courses are eight in total and include for instance Pebble Beach and St. Andrews. Up to four players can compete in the play now mode and team play is also an option.
The practice mode allows the player to try out the game in his own pace without any opponents or other distractions. In the Tiger Challenge mode the player gets to compete against the best player in the world for a chance to take on Tiger Woods himself. By winning challenges, more are unlocked as progress is made through the game. The player earns money by winning matches and these can be used to upgrade skills. Last, there is the PGA Tour mode where the player goes through a full season of golf with the goal of reaching number one on the ranking.
Multiplayer exist too for up to four players, both locally on one DS, through single or multi card wireless play or online through wi-fi connection.

game.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour
game.desc:
Tiger Woods PGA Tour is the first game in the long running golf series to appear on the Nintendo DS. The game features a Quick Play mode and a Legends Tour mode. In the Quick Play mode the player gets to play single matches either alone or against three opponents. Five authentic courses and one fantasy course are available in the game and the player can choose to play stroke play, match play or skins. The Legends Tour allows the player to take on the best players from around the world. The player starts out on the Rookie Tour but by earning Tour Cards the Pro and Legend Tours are unlocked. By completing events on the tours the player earns cash that can be used to upgrade the golfer's attributes.
The game features an analog control method using the touch screen of the DS. Before taking the shot the player is presented with a top down overview of the course that allows the player to adjust his aim. Once that is done two meters appear on the touch screen. One is u-shaped and controls the swing. The power of the shot is determined by how the player draws the stylus on the right side of the meter while the left side determines how straight the shot gets. There is also a boost meter that has to be rubbed repeatedly to add some distance to the shot. Once the ball is in the air the player can influence its rotation by dragging the stylus in the right direction.
Multiplayer exists for up to four players through wireless communication. All players can play the game simultaneously so no-one has to wait for their turn.

game.name: Time Ace
game.desc:
In Time Ace, the player takes control of an eccentric inventor, Dr. Hugo Clock, in the year 1914 who invents a time machine and travels three years into the future, straight into the first World War. Upset by witnessing devastation that the first World War will cause, he is determined to stop it at all costs, however, his backstabbing assistant Dr. Klaus Scythe takes the time machine and plans to acquire weapons from the future to rule the world for himself and it is up to Dr. Clock to stop him.
The main idea of the game is to fly in 3-D modeled planes, ranging from World War II fighter planes, to modern day jet fighters and up to space fighters of the future. There are 19 levels to explore, picking up various power-ups scattered throughout the level to upgrade armor, firepower and speed.
There is also multiplayer ability using Wi-Fi where players can dogfight head-to-head in the plane of their choice or four players can play in a variety of minigames like racing.

game.name: Time Hollow
game.desc:
Time Hollow is an interactive novel in the vein of games like Phoenix Wright where the player talks to characters and examine areas to find clues and items to help them in their quest.
The story takes place with the player taking control of a young man by the name of Ethan Kairos, who discovers that his family has mysteriously disappeared and sets off to find them. He then comes across a strange looking hollow pen and acquires it where he learns its unique and magical property: the ability to open portals to the past. Using this pen, the player will take Ethan to the past in search of clues for his family and hopefully prevent the awful tragedy.
The gameplay mostly consists of exploring areas, searching for clues and items and encountering a plethora of different characters that can be talked to. Using these items and conversations with the various characters, the player must solve puzzles throughout the stages while using the stylus pen to draw portals to link the past and present and travel between the time rift.
Junko Kawano (most notably responsible for the script of some of the Suikoden games, lends his talents for the character scripts for the game.

game.name: Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue
game.desc: Play as the beloved Tinker Bell as you discover the mystical world of Pixie Hollow and help all your fairy friends prepare the seasons. Create and customize over 100 dresses and accessories. Experience all the fun in a dynamic world where your activities change during certain hours of the day, holidays, and seasons. Believing is just the beginning...

game.name: Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue

Create and customize over 100 dresses and accessories. Experience all the fun in a dynamic world where your activities change during certain hours of the day, holidays, and seasons. Believing is just the beginning...
